  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1229">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1229">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1230">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1230">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1231">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1231">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1232">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1232">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1233">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1233">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1234">値の名前: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1234">Value Name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1235">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1235">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1236">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1236">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1237">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1237">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1238">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1238">Preference Key Name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1239">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1239">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1240">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1240">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1241">DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1241">DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1242">既定の画像の設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1242">Default images setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1243">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1243">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1244">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1244">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1245">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1245">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1246">Web サイトが画像を表示できるどうかを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1246">Set whether websites can display images.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1247">すべてのサイトで画像を許可する ('AllowImages') か、すべてのサイトで画像をブロックする ('BlockImages') かを選択することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1247">You can allow images on all sites ('AllowImages') or block them on all sites ('BlockImages').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1248">このポリシーを構成していない場合、既定で画像が許可され、ユーザーはこの設定を変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1248">If you don't configure this policy, images are allowed by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1249">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1249">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1250">AllowImages (1) = すべてのサイトに対してすべての画像の表示を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1250">AllowImages (1) = Allow all sites to show all images</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1251">BlockImages (2) = すべてのサイトに対して画像の表示を許可しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1251">BlockImages (2) = Don't allow any site to show images</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1252">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1252">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1253">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1253">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1254">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1254">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1255">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1255">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1256">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1256">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1257">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1257">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1258">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1258">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1259">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1259">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1260">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1260">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1261">GP 固有の名前: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1261">GP unique name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1262">GP 名: 既定の画像の設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1262">GP name: Default images setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1263">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1263">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1264">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1264">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1265">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1265">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1266">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1266">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1267">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1267">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1268">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1268">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1269">値の名前: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1269">Value Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1270">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1270">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1271">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1271">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1272">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1272">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1273">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1273">Preference Key Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1274">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1274">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1275">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1275">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1276">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1276">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1277">安全でないコンテンツの例外の使用を制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1277">Control use of insecure content exceptions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1278">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1278">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1279">Windows と macOS での 80 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1279">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1280">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1280">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1281">特定のサイトの混在したコンテンツを許可するために、ユーザーが例外を追加できるかどうかを設定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1281">Allows you to set whether users can add exceptions to allow mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1282">特定の URL パターンに対するこのポリシーは、[InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) と [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls) ポリシーを使用して、上書きすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1282">This policy can be overridden for specific URL patterns using the [InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) and [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1283">このポリシーが設定されていない場合、ユーザーは、ブロック可能な混在したコンテンツを許可するための例外を追加し、任意でブロック可能な混在したコンテンツの自動アップグレードを無効にすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1283">If this policy isn't set, users will be allowed to add exceptions to allow blockable mixed content and disable autoupgrades for optionally blockable mixed content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1284">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1284">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1285">BlockInsecureContent (2) = 混在したコンテンツの読み込みを、どのサイトにも、許可しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1285">BlockInsecureContent (2) = Do not allow any site to load mixed content</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1286">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = ユーザーが例外を追加して、混在したコンテンツを許可できるようにする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1286">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = Allow users to add exceptions to allow mixed content</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1287">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1287">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1288">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1288">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1289">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1289">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1290">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1290">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1291">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1291">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1292">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1292">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1293">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1293">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1294">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1294">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1295">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1295">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1296">GP 固有の名前: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1296">GP unique name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1297">GP 名: 安全でないコンテンツの例外の使用を制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1297">GP name: Control use of insecure content exceptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1298">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1298">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1299">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1299">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1300">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1300">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1301">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1301">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1302">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1302">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1303">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1303">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1304">値の名前: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1304">Value Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1305">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1305">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1306">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1306">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1307">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1307">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1308">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1308">Preference Key Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1309">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1309">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1310">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1310">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1311">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1311">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1312">既定の JavaScript の設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1312">Default JavaScript setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1313">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1313">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1314">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1314">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1315">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1315">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1316">Web サイトが JavaScript を実行できるどうかを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1316">Set whether websites can run JavaScript.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1317">すべてのサイトで使用できるようにする (' AllowJavaScript ') か、すべてのサイトに対してブロックすることができます (' BlockJavaScript ')。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1317">You can allow it for all sites ('AllowJavaScript') or block it for all sites ('BlockJavaScript').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1318">このポリシーを構成していない場合、既定ですべてのサイトでの JavaScript の実行が許可され、ユーザーはこの設定を変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1318">If you don't configure this policy, all sites can run JavaScript by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1319">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1319">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1320">AllowJavaScript (1) = すべてのサイトで JavaScript の実行を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1320">AllowJavaScript (1) = Allow all sites to run JavaScript</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1321">BlockJavaScript (2) = すべてのサイトで JavaScript の実行を許可しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1321">BlockJavaScript (2) = Don't allow any site to run JavaScript</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1322">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1322">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1323">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1323">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1324">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1324">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1325">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1325">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1326">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1326">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1327">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1327">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1328">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1328">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1329">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1329">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1330">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1330">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1331">GP 固有の名前: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1331">GP unique name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1332">GP 名: 既定の JavaScript の設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1332">GP name: Default JavaScript setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1333">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1333">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1334">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1334">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1335">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1335">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1336">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1336">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1337">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1337">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1338">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1338">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1339">値の名前: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1339">Value Name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1340">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1340">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1341">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1341">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1342">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1342">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1343">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1343">Preference Key Name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1344">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1344">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1345">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1345">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1346">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1346">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1347">既定の通知の設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1347">Default notification setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1348">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1348">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1349">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1349">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1350">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1350">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1351">Web サイトがデスクトップ通知を表示できるどうかを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1351">Set whether websites can display desktop notifications.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1352">デスクトップ通知を既定で許可したり ('AllowNotifications')、既定で拒否したり ('BlockNotifications')、Web サイトが通知を表示するたびにユーザーに確認を求めたり ('AskNotifications') することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1352">You can allow them by default ('AllowNotifications'), deny them by default ('BlockNotifications'), or have the user be asked each time a website wants to show a notification ('AskNotifications').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1353">このポリシーを構成していない場合、既定で通知が許可され、ユーザーはこの設定を変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1353">If you don't configure this policy, notifications are allowed by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1354">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1354">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1355">AllowNotifications (1) = サイトがデスクトップ通知を表示できるようにする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1355">AllowNotifications (1) = Allow sites to show desktop notifications</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1356">BlockNotifications (2) = サイトがデスクトップ通知を表示できないようにする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1356">BlockNotifications (2) = Don't allow any site to show desktop notifications</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1357">AskNotifications (3) = サイトがデスクトップ通知を表示するたびに確認を求める</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1357">AskNotifications (3) = Ask every time a site wants to show desktop notifications</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1358">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1358">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1359">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1359">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1360">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1360">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1361">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1361">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1362">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1362">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1363">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1363">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1364">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1364">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1365">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1365">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1366">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1366">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1367">GP 固有の名前: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1367">GP unique name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1368">GP 名: 既定の通知の設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1368">GP name: Default notification setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1369">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1369">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1370">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1370">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1371">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1371">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1372">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1372">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1373">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1373">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1374">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1374">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1375">値の名前: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1375">Value Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1376">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1376">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1377">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1377">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1378">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1378">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1379">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1379">Preference Key Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1380">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1380">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1381">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1381">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1382">DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1382">DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1383">既定の Adobe Flash 設定 (不使用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1383">Default Adobe Flash setting (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1384">不使用: このポリシーは廃止されており、Microsoft Edge 87 以降は機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1384">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1385">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1385">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1386">Windows と macOS での 77 以降、87 まで</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1386">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1387">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1387">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1388">Flash は Microsoft Edge でサポートされなくなったため、このポリシーは機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1388">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1389">[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) と [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) が最初にチェックされ、その後、このポリシーがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1389">[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) and [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) are checked first, then this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1390">[ClickToPlay] と [BlockPlugins] のどちらかを選択できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1390">The options are 'ClickToPlay' and 'BlockPlugins'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1391">このポリシーを ' BlockPlugins ' に設定すると、すべての web サイトでこのプラグインが拒否されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1391">If you set this policy to 'BlockPlugins', this plugin is denied for all websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1392">[ClickToPlay] は、フラッシュプラグインを実行しますが、ユーザーはプレースホルダーをクリックして起動します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1392">'ClickToPlay' lets the Flash plugin run, but users click the placeholder to start it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1393">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーはこの設定を手動で変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1393">If you don't configure this policy, the user can change this setting manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1394">注: 自動再生は、[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) ポリシーに明示的にリストされているドメインにのみ許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1394">Note: Automatic playback is only for domains explicitly listed in the [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1395">すべてのサイトに対して自動再生をオンにするには、許可されている Url のリストに http://\* および https://\* を追加します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1395">To turn automatic playback on for all sites, add http://\* and https://\* to the allowed list of URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1396">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1396">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1397">BlockPlugins (2) = Adobe Flash プラグインをブロックする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1397">BlockPlugins (2) = Block the Adobe Flash plugin</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1398">ClickToPlay (3) = クリックして再生する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1398">ClickToPlay (3) = Click to play</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1399">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1399">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1400">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1400">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1401">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1401">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1402">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1402">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1403">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1403">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1404">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1404">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1405">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1405">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1406">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1406">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1407">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1407">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1408">GP 固有の名前: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1408">GP unique name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1409">GP 名: 既定の Adobe Flash 設定 (不使用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1409">GP name: Default Adobe Flash setting (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1410">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1410">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1411">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1411">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1412">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1412">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1413">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1413">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1414">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1414">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1415">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1415">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1416">値の名前: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1416">Value Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1417">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1417">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1418">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1418">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1419">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1419">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1420">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1420">Preference Key Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1421">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1421">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1422">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1422">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1423">DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1423">DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1424">既定のポップアップ ウィンドウの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1424">Default pop-up window setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1425">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1425">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1426">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1426">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1427">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1427">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1428">Web サイトがポップアップ ウィンドウを表示できるかどうかを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1428">Set whether websites can show pop-up windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1429">すべての Web サイトでポップアップ ウィンドウを許可する ('AllowPopups') か、すべてのサイトでポップアップ ウィンドウをブロックする ('BlockPopups') かを選択することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1429">You can allow them on all websites ('AllowPopups') or block them on all sites ('BlockPopups').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1430">このポリシーを構成していない場合、既定でポップアップ ウィンドウがブロックされ、ユーザーはこの設定を変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1430">If you don't configure this policy, pop-up windows are blocked by default, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1431">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1431">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1432">AllowPopups (1) = すべてのサイトに対してポップアップの表示を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1432">AllowPopups (1) = Allow all sites to show pop-ups</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1433">BlockPopups (2) = すべてのサイトに対してポップアップの表示を許可しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1433">BlockPopups (2) = Do not allow any site to show popups</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1434">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1434">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1435">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1435">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1436">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1436">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1437">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1437">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1438">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1438">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1439">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1439">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1440">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1440">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1441">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1441">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1442">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1442">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1443">GP 固有の名前: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1443">GP unique name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1444">GP 名: 既定のポップアップ ウィンドウの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1444">GP name: Default pop-up window setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1445">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1445">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1446">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1446">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1447">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1447">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1448">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1448">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1449">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1449">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1450">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1450">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1451">値の名前: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1451">Value Name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1452">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1452">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1453">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1453">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1454">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1454">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1455">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1455">Preference Key Name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1456">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1456">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1457">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1457">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1458">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1458">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1459">Web Bluetooth API の使用を制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1459">Control use of the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1460">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1460">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1461">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1461">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1462">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1462">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1463">Web サイトが近くの Bluetooth デバイスにアクセスできるかどうかを制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1463">Control whether websites can access nearby Bluetooth devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1464">アクセスを完全にブロックするか、サイトが Bluetooth デバイスにアクセスするときに毎回ユーザーに確認を求めるように設定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1464">You can completely block access or require the site to ask the user each time it wants to access a Bluetooth device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1465">このポリシーを構成していない場合、既定値 ('AskWebBluetooth'、つまりユーザーが毎回確認を求められることを意味します) が使用され、ユーザーはこの設定を変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1465">If you don't configure this policy, the default value ('AskWebBluetooth', meaning users are asked each time) is used and users can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1466">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1466">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1467">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = Web Bluetooth API を介して Bluetooth デバイスへのアクセスを要求するサイトを許可しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1467">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to Bluetooth devices via the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1468">AskWebBluetooth (3) = 近くの Bluetooth デバイスへのアクセスを許可するようにサイトがユーザーに確認を求めることを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1468">AskWebBluetooth (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a nearby Bluetooth device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1469">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1469">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1470">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1470">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1471">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1471">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1472">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1472">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1473">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1473">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1474">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1474">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1475">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1475">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1476">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1476">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1477">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1477">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1478">GP 固有の名前: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1478">GP unique name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1479">GP 名: Web Bluetooth API の使用を制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1479">GP name: Control use of the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1480">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1480">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1481">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1481">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1482">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1482">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1483">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1483">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1484">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1484">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1485">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1485">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1486">値の名前: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1486">Value Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1487">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1487">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1488">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1488">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1489">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1489">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1490">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1490">Preference Key Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1491">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1491">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1492">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1492">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1493">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1493">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1494">WebUSB API の使用を制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1494">Control use of the WebUSB API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1495">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1495">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1496">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1496">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1497">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1497">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1498">Web サイトが接続されている USB デバイスにアクセスできるかどうかを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1498">Set whether websites can access connected USB devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1499">アクセスを完全にブロックするか、Web サイトが接続されている USB デバイスにアクセスするときに毎回ユーザーに確認を求めるように設定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1499">You can completely block access or ask the user each time a website wants to get access to connected USB devices.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1500">特定の URL パターンに対するこのポリシーは、[WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) と [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) ポリシーを使用して、上書きすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1500">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) and [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1501">このポリシーを構成していない場合、サイトは既定で接続された USB デバイス ('AskWebUsb') にアクセス可能かどうかをユーザーに確認することができ、ユーザーはこの設定を変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1501">If you don't configure this policy, sites can ask users whether they can access the connected USB devices ('AskWebUsb') by default, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1502">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1502">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1503">BlockWebUsb (2) = WebUSB API を介して USB デバイスへのアクセスを要求するサイトを許可しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1503">BlockWebUsb (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to USB devices via the WebUSB API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1504">AskWebUsb (3) = 接続されている USB デバイスへのアクセスを許可するようにサイトがユーザーに確認を求めることを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1504">AskWebUsb (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a connected USB device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1505">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1505">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1506">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1506">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1507">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1507">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1508">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1508">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1509">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1509">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1510">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1510">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1511">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1511">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1512">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1512">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1513">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1513">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1514">GP 固有の名前: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1514">GP unique name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1515">GP 名: WebUSB API の使用を制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1515">GP name: Control use of the WebUSB API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1516">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1516">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1517">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1517">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1518">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1518">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1519">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1519">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1520">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1520">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1521">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1521">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1522">値の名前: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1522">Value Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1523">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1523">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1524">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1524">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1525">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1525">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1526">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1526">Preference Key Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1527">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1527">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1528">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1528">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1529">FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1529">FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1530">これらのサイトのファイル システム API を通して読み取りアクセスを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1530">Allow read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1531">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1531">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1532">Windows と macOS での 86 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1532">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1533">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1533">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1534">ポリシーを設定すると、ファイル システム API を使用して、ユーザーにホスト オペレーティング システムのファイルまたはディレクトリに対する読み取りアクセス権を付与することを要求することができる URL パターンを指定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1534">Setting the policy lets you list the URL patterns that specify which sites can ask users to grant them read access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system via the File System API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1535">ポリシーが設定されていないままだと、設定された場合に、[DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) がすべてのサイトに適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1535">Leaving the policy unset means [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1536">それ以外の場合、ユーザーの個人用設定が適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1536">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1537">URL パターンは、 [FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls](#filesystemreadblockedforurls) と競合することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1537">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls](#filesystemreadblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1538">URL が両方と一致する場合、どちらのポリシーも優先されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1538">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1539">有効な URL パターンの詳細については、https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns をご覧ください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1539">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1540">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1540">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1541">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1541">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1542">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1542">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1543">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1543">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1544">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1544">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1545">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1545">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1546">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1546">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1547">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1547">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1548">GP 固有の名前: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1548">GP unique name: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1549">GP 名: これらのサイトのファイル システム API を通して読み取りアクセスを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1549">GP name: Allow read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1550">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1550">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1551">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1551">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1552">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1552">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1553">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1553">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1554">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1554">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1555">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1555">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1556">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1556">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1557">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1557">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1558">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1558">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1559">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1559">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1560">GP 固有の名前: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1560">Preference Key Name: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1561">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1561">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1562">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1562">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1563">FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1563">FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1564">これらのサイトのファイル システム API を通して読み取りアクセスをブロックする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1564">Block read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1565">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1565">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1566">Windows と macOS での 86 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1566">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1567">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1567">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1568">このポリシーを設定した場合、ファイル システム API を使用して、ユーザーにホスト オペレーティング システムのファイルまたはディレクトリに対する読み取りアクセス権を付与することを要求することができる URL パターンを指定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1568">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can't ask users to grant them read access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system via the File System API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1569">ポリシーが設定されない場合、設定された場合に、[DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) がすべてのサイトに適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1569">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1570">それ以外の場合、ユーザーの個人用設定が適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1570">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1571">URL パターンは、 [FileSystemReadAskForUrls](#filesystemreadaskforurls) と競合することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1571">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemReadAskForUrls](#filesystemreadaskforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1572">URL が両方と一致する場合、どちらのポリシーも優先されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1572">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1573">有効な URL パターンの詳細については、https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns をご覧ください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1573">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1574">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1574">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1575">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1575">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1576">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1576">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1577">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1577">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1578">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1578">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1579">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1579">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1580">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1580">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1581">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1581">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1582">GP 固有の名前: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1582">GP unique name: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1583">GP 名: これらのサイトのファイル システム API を通して読み取りアクセスをブロックする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1583">GP name: Block read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1584">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1584">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1585">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1585">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1586">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1586">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1587">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1587">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1588">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1588">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1589">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1589">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1590">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1590">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1591">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1591">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1592">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1592">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1593">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1593">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1594">基本設定キーの名前: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1594">Preference Key Name: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1595">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1595">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1596">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1596">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1597">FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1597">FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1598">これらのサイトのファイルとディレクトリへの書き込みアクセスを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1598">Allow write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1599">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1599">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1600">Windows と macOS での 86 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1600">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1601">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1601">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1602">このポリシーを設定した場合、ユーザーにホスト オペレーティング システムのファイルまたはディレクトリに対する書き込みアクセス権を付与することを要求することができる URL パターンを指定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1602">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can ask users to grant them write access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1603">ポリシーが設定されない場合、設定された場合に、[DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) がすべてのサイトに適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1603">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1604">それ以外の場合、ユーザーの個人用設定が適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1604">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1605">URL パターンは、 [FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls](#filesystemwriteblockedforurls) と競合することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1605">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls](#filesystemwriteblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1606">URL が両方と一致する場合、どちらのポリシーも優先されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1606">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1607">有効な URL パターンの詳細については、https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns をご覧ください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1607">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1608">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1608">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1609">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1609">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1610">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1610">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1611">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1611">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1612">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1612">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1613">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1613">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1614">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1614">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1615">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1615">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1616">GP 固有の名前: FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1616">GP unique name: FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1617">GP 名: これらのサイトのファイルとディレクトリへの書き込みアクセスを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1617">GP name: Allow write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1618">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1618">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1619">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1619">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1620">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1620">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1621">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1621">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1622">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1622">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1623">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1623">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1624">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1624">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1625">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1625">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1626">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1626">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1627">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1627">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1628">基本設定キーの名前: FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1628">Preference Key Name: FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1629">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1629">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1630">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1630">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1631">FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1631">FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1632">これらのサイトのファイルとディレクトリへの書き込みアクセスをブロックする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1632">Block write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1633">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1633">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1634">Windows と macOS での 86 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1634">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1635">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1635">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1636">このポリシーを設定した場合、ユーザーにホスト オペレーティング システムのファイルまたはディレクトリに対する書き込みアクセス権を付与することを要求できなくする URL パターンを指定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1636">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can't ask users to grant them write access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1637">ポリシーが設定されない場合、設定された場合に、[DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) がすべてのサイトに適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1637">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1638">それ以外の場合、ユーザーの個人用設定が適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1638">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1639">URL パターンは、 [FileSystemWriteAskForUrls](#filesystemwriteaskforurls) と競合することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1639">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemWriteAskForUrls](#filesystemwriteaskforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1640">URL が両方と一致する場合、どちらのポリシーも優先されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1640">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1641">有効な URL パターンの詳細については、https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns をご覧ください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1641">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see https://cloud.google.com/docs/chrome-enterprise/policies/url-patterns.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1642">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1642">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1643">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1643">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1644">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1644">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1645">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1645">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1646">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1646">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1647">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1647">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1648">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1648">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1649">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1649">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1650">GP 固有の名前: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1650">GP unique name: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1651">GP 名: これらのサイトのファイルとディレクトリへの書き込みアクセスをブロックする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1651">GP name: Block write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1652">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1652">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1653">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1653">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1654">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1654">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1655">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1655">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1656">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1656">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1657">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1657">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
