  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1658">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1658">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1659">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1659">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1660">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1660">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1661">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1661">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1662">基本設定キーの名前: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1662">Preference Key Name: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1663">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1663">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1664">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1664">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1665">ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1665">ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1666">これらのサイトでの画像の使用を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1666">Allow images on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1667">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1667">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1668">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1668">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1669">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1669">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1670">画像を表示することができるサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1670">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can display images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1671">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーの個人用の構成、または [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) のいずれかからのグローバルな既定値が、すべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1671">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value is used for all sites either from the [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1672">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1672">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1673">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1673">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1674">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1674">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1675">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1675">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1676">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1676">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1677">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1677">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1678">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1678">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1679">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1679">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1680">GP 固有の名前: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1680">GP unique name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1681">GP 名: これらのサイトでの画像の使用を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1681">GP name: Allow images on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1682">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1682">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1683">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1683">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1684">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1684">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1685">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1685">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1686">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1686">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1687">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1687">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1688">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1688">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1689">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1689">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1690">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1690">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1691">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1691">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1692">基本設定キーの名前: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1692">Preference Key Name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1693">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1693">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1694">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1694">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1695">ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1695">ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1696">特定のサイトでの 画像 のブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1696">Block images on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1697">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1697">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1698">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1698">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1699">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1699">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1700">画像の表示が許可されていないサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1700">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that aren't allowed to display images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1701">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーの個人用の構成、または [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1701">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1702">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1702">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1703">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1703">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1704">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1704">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1705">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1705">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1706">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1706">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1707">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1707">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1708">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1708">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1709">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1709">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1710">GP 固有の名前: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1710">GP unique name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1711">GP 名: 特定のサイトでの 画像 のブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1711">GP name: Block images on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1712">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1712">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1713">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1713">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1714">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1714">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1715">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1715">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1716">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1716">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1717">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1717">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1718">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1718">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1719">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1719">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1720">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1720">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1721">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1721">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1722">基本設定キーの名前: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1722">Preference Key Name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1723">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1723">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1724">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1724">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1725">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1725">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1726">特定のサイトでの安全でないコンテンツの使用を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1726">Allow insecure content on specified sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1727">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1727">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1728">Windows と macOS での 80 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1728">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1729">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1729">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1730">安全でない混在するコンテンツ（つまり、HTTPS サイトにある HTTP コンテンツ）を表示できるサイトを指定するための URL パターンの一覧を作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1730">Create a list of URL patterns to specify sites that can display insecure mixed content (that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1731">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ブロック可能な混在するコンテンツがブロックされ、オプションでブロック可能な混在するコンテンツがアップグレードされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1731">If you don't configure this policy, blockable mixed content will be blocked and optionally blockable mixed content will be upgraded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1732">ただし、ユーザーは特定のサイトで安全でない混在するコンテンツを許可する例外を設定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1732">However, users will be allowed to set exceptions to allow insecure mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1733">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1733">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1734">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1734">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1735">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1735">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1736">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1736">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1737">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1737">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1738">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1738">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1739">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1739">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1740">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1740">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1741">GP 固有の名前: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1741">GP unique name: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1742">GP 名: 特定のサイトでの安全でないコンテンツの使用を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1742">GP name: Allow insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1743">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1743">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1744">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1744">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1745">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1745">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1746">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1746">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1747">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1747">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1748">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1748">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1749">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1749">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1750">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1750">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1751">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1751">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1752">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1752">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1753">基本設定キーの名前: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1753">Preference Key Name: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1754">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1754">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1755">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1755">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1756">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1756">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1757">特定のサイトでの安全でないコンテンツのブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1757">Block insecure content on specified sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1758">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1758">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1759">Windows と macOS での 80 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1759">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1760">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1760">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1761">URL パターンの一覧を作成して、ブロック可能な (つまりアクティブな) 混在するコンテンツ (つまり、HTTPS サイトにある HTTP コンテンツ) の表示を許可しないサイトと、オプションでブロック可能な混在するコンテンツのアップグレードを無効にするサイトを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1761">Create a list of URL patterns to specify sites that aren't allowed to display blockable (i.e. active) mixed content (that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites) and for which optionally blockable mixed content upgrades will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1762">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ブロック可能な混在するコンテンツがブロックされ、オプションでブロック可能な混在するコンテンツがアップグレードされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1762">If you don't configure this policy, blockable mixed content will be blocked and optionally blockable mixed content will be upgraded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1763">ただし、ユーザーは特定のサイトで安全でない混在するコンテンツを許可する例外を設定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1763">However, users will be allowed to set exceptions to allow insecure mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1764">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1764">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1765">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1765">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1766">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1766">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1767">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1767">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1768">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1768">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1769">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1769">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1770">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1770">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1771">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1771">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1772">GP 固有の名前: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1772">GP unique name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1773">GP 名: 特定のサイトでの安全でないコンテンツのブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1773">GP name: Block insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1774">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1774">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1775">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1775">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1776">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1776">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1777">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1777">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1778">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1778">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1779">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1779">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1780">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1780">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1781">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1781">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1782">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1782">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1783">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1783">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1784">基本設定キーの名前: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1784">Preference Key Name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1785">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1785">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1786">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1786">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1787">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1787">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1788">特定のサイトでの JavaScript を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1788">Allow JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1789">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1789">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1790">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1790">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1791">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1791">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1792">JavaScript の実行が許可されているサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1792">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are allowed to run JavaScript.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1793">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーの個人用の構成、または [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1793">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1794">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1794">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1795">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1795">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1796">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1796">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1797">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1797">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1798">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1798">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1799">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1799">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1800">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1800">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1801">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1801">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1802">GP 固有の名前: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1802">GP unique name: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1803">GP 名: 特定のサイトでの JavaScript を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1803">GP name: Allow JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1804">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1804">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1805">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1805">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1806">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1806">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1807">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1807">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1808">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1808">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1809">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1809">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1810">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1810">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1811">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1811">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1812">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1812">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1813">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1813">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1814">基本設定キーの名前: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1814">Preference Key Name: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1815">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1815">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1816">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1816">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1817">JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1817">JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1818">特定のサイトでの JavaScript のブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1818">Block JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1819">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1819">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1820">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1820">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1821">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1821">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1822">JavaScript の実行が許可されていないサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1822">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that aren't allowed to run JavaScript.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1823">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーの個人用の構成、または [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1823">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1824">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1824">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1825">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1825">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1826">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1826">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1827">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1827">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1828">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1828">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1829">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1829">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1830">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1830">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1831">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1831">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1832">GP 固有の名前: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1832">GP unique name: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1833">GP 名: 特定のサイトでの JavaScript のブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1833">GP name: Block JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1834">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1834">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1835">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1835">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1836">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1836">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1837">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1837">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1838">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1838">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1839">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1839">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1840">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1840">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1841">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1841">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1842">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1842">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1843">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1843">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1844">基本設定キーの名前: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1844">Preference Key Name: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1845">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1845">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1846">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1846">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1847">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1847">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1848">既定のレガシ SameSite Cookie の動作設定を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1848">Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1849">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1849">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1850">Windows と macOS での 80 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1850">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1851">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1851">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1852">すべての Cookie をレガシ SameSite の動作に戻します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1852">Lets you revert all cookies to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1853">従来の動作に戻すと、SameSite 属性を指定しない Cookie は、"SameSite=None" であるかのように扱われ、"SameSite=None" Cookie が "Secure" 属性を保持する必要がなくなり、2 つのサイトが同じサイトであるかどうかを評価するときにスキームの比較がスキップされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1853">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute, and skips the scheme comparison when evaluating if two sites are same-site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1854">このポリシーを設定しない場合、Cookie に対する既定の SameSite の動作は、SameSite-by-default 機能、Cookies-without-SameSite-must-be-secure 機能、および Schemeful Same-Site 機能の他の構成ソースに依存します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1854">If you don't set this policy, the default SameSite behavior for cookies will depend on other configuration sources for the SameSite-by-default feature, the Cookies-without-SameSite-must-be-secure feature, and the Schemeful Same-Site feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1855">これらの機能は、フィールド トライアルまたは edge://flags のsame-site-by-default-cookies フラグ、cookies-without-same-site-must-be-secure フラグ、または schemeful-same-site フラグによって構成することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1855">These features can also be configured by a field trial or the same-site-by-default-cookies flag, the cookies-without-same-site-must-be-secure flag, or the schemeful-same-site flag in edge://flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1856">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1856">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1857">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = すべてのサイトの Cookie をレガシ SameSite の動作に戻す。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1857">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on all sites</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1858">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = すべてのサイトの Cookie に、SameSite-by-default の動作を使用する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1858">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = Use SameSite-by-default behavior for cookies on all sites</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1859">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1859">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1860">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1860">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1861">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1861">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1862">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1862">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1863">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1863">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1864">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1864">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1865">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1865">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1866">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1866">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1867">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1867">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1868">GP 固有の名前: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1868">GP unique name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1869">GP 名: 既定のレガシ SameSite Cookie の動作設定を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1869">GP name: Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1870">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1870">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1871">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1871">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1872">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1872">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1873">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1873">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1874">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1874">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1875">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1875">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1876">値の名前: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1876">Value Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1877">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1877">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1878">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1878">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1879">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1879">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1880">基本設定キーの名前: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1880">Preference Key Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1881">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1881">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1882">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1882">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1883">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1883">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1884">特定のサイトで Cookie のレガシ SameSite の動作に戻す</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1884">Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on specified sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1885">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1885">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1886">Windows と macOS での 80 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1886">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1887">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1887">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1888">指定されたパターンに一致するドメインに設定された Cookie は、レガシ SameSite の動作に戻ります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1888">Cookies set for domains match specified patterns will revert to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1889">従来の動作に戻すと、SameSite 属性を指定しない Cookie は、"SameSite=None" であるかのように扱われ、"SameSite=None" Cookie が "Secure" 属性を保持する必要がなくなり、2 つのサイトが同じサイトであるかどうかを評価するときにスキームの比較がスキップされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1889">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute, and skips the scheme comparison when evaluating if two sites are same-site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1890">このポリシーを設定していない場合、グローバルな既定値が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1890">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1891">グローバルな既定値では、指定したパターンの対象外ドメインの Cookie にも使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1891">The global default will also be used for cookies on domains not covered by the patterns you specify.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1892">グローバルな既定値は、[LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) ポリシーを使用して構成することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1892">The global default value can be configured using the [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1893">[LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) が設定されていない場合、グローバルな既定値がその他の構成ソースにフォールバックします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1893">If [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) is unset, the global default value falls back to other configuration sources.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1894">このポリシーにリスト化したパターンは URL ではなくドメインとして扱われるので、スキームやポートを指定することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1894">Note that patterns you list in this policy are treated as domains, not URLs, so you should not specify a scheme or port.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1895">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1895">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1896">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1896">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1897">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1897">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1898">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1898">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1899">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1899">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1900">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1900">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1901">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1901">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1902">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1902">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1903">GP 固有の名前: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1903">GP unique name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1904">GP 名: 特定のサイトで Cookie のレガシ SameSite の動作に戻す</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1904">GP name: Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1905">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1905">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1906">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1906">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1907">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1907">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1908">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1908">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1909">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1909">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1910">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1910">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1911">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1911">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1912">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1912">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1913">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1913">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList\1 = "www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1914">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1914">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1915">基本設定キーの名前: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1915">Preference Key Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1916">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1916">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1917">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1917">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1918">NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1918">NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1919">特定のサイトで通知を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1919">Allow notifications on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1920">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1920">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1921">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1921">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1922">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1922">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1923">通知の表示を許可するサイトを指定するための URL パターンのリストを作成できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1923">Allows you to create a list of url patterns to specify sites that are allowed to display notifications.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1924">このポリシーを設定していない場合、すべてのサイトにグローバルな既定値が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1924">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used for all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1925">この既定値は、[DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) ポリシーが設定されている場合はそのポリシーの値、またはユーザーの個人用の構成の値になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1925">This default value will be from the [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) policy if it's set, or from the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1926">有効な URL パターンの詳細については、[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) をご覧ください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1926">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1927">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1927">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1928">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1928">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1929">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1929">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1930">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1930">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1931">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1931">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1932">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1932">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1933">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1933">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1934">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1934">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1935">GP 固有の名前: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1935">GP unique name: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1936">GP 名: 特定のサイトで通知を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1936">GP name: Allow notifications on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1937">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1937">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1938">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1938">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1939">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1939">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1940">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1940">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1941">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1941">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1942">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1942">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1943">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1943">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1944">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1944">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1945">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1945">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1946">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1946">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1947">基本設定キーの名前: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1947">Preference Key Name: NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1948">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1948">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1949">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1949">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1950">NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1950">NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1951">特定のサイトでの通知のブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1951">Block notifications on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1952">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1952">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1953">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1953">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1954">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1954">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1955">通知の表示が許可されていないサイトを指定する URL パターンのリストを作成できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1955">Allows you to create a list of url patterns to specify sites that are not allowed to display notifications.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1956">このポリシーを設定していない場合、すべてのサイトにグローバルな既定値が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1956">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used for all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1957">この既定値は、[DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) ポリシーが設定されている場合はそのポリシーの値、またはユーザーの個人用の構成の値になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1957">This default value will be from the [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) policy if it's set, or from the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1958">有効な URL パターンの詳細については、[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) をご覧ください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1958">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1959">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1959">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1960">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1960">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1961">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1961">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1962">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1962">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1963">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1963">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1964">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1964">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1965">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1965">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1966">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1966">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1967">GP 固有の名前: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1967">GP unique name: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1968">GP 名: 特定のサイトでの通知のブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1968">GP name: Block notifications on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1969">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1969">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1970">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1970">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1971">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1971">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1972">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1972">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1973">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1973">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1974">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1974">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1975">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1975">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1976">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1976">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1977">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1977">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NotificationsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1978">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1978">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1979">基本設定キーの名前: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1979">Preference Key Name: NotificationsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1980">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1980">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1981">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1981">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1982">PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1982">PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1983">特定のサイトでの Adobe Flash プラグインの使用を許可する (不使用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1983">Allow the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1984">不使用: このポリシーは廃止されており、Microsoft Edge 87 以降は機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1984">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1985">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1985">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1986">Windows と macOS での 77 以降、87 まで</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1986">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1987">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1987">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1988">Flash は Microsoft Edge でサポートされなくなったため、このポリシーは機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1988">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1989">Adobe Flash プラグインを実行することができるサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1989">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can run the Adobe Flash plug-in.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1990">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーの個人用の構成、または [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1990">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1991">有効な URL パターンの詳細については、[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) をご覧ください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1991">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1992">ただし、M85以降では、ホストで「\*」および「[\*.]」のワイルドカードを使用したパターンは、このポリシーではサポートされなくなりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1992">However, starting in M85, patterns with '\*' and '[\*.]' wildcards in the host are no longer supported for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1993">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1993">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1994">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1994">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1995">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1995">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1996">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1996">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1997">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1997">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1998">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1998">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-1999">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-1999">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2000">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2000">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2001">GP 固有の名前: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2001">GP unique name: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2002">GP 名: 特定のサイトでの Adobe Flash プラグインの使用を許可する (不使用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2002">GP name: Allow the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2003">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2003">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2004">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2004">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2005">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2005">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2006">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2006">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2007">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2007">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2008">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2008">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2009">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2009">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2010">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2010">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2011">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2011">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls\2 = "http://contoso.edu:8080"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2012">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2012">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2013">基本設定キーの名前: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2013">Preference Key Name: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2014">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2014">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>http://contoso.edu:8080</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2015">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2015">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2016">PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2016">PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2017">特定のサイトでの Adobe Flash プラグインの使用をブロックする (不使用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2017">Block the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2018">不使用: このポリシーは廃止されており、Microsoft Edge 87 以降は機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2018">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2019">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2019">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2020">Windows と macOS での 77 以降、87 まで</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2020">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2021">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2021">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2022">Flash は Microsoft Edge でサポートされなくなったため、このポリシーは機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2022">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2023">Adobe Flash プラグインの実行がブロックされているサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2023">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked from running Adobe Flash.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2024">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーの個人用の構成、または [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2024">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2025">有効な URL パターンの詳細については、[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) をご覧ください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2025">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2026">ただし、M85以降では、ホストで「\*」および「[\*.]」のワイルドカードを使用したパターンは、このポリシーではサポートされなくなりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2026">However, starting in M85, patterns with '\*' and '[\*.]' wildcards in the host are no longer supported for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2027">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2027">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2028">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2028">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2029">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2029">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2030">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2030">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2031">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2031">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2032">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2032">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2033">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2033">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2034">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2034">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2035">GP 固有の名前: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2035">GP unique name: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2036">GP 名: 特定のサイトでの Adobe Flash プラグインの使用をブロックする (不使用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2036">GP name: Block the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2037">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2037">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2038">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2038">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2039">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2039">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2040">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2040">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2041">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2041">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2042">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2042">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2043">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2043">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2044">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2044">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2045">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2045">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsBlockedForUrls\2 = "http://contoso.edu:8080"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2046">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2046">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2047">基本設定キーの名前: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2047">Preference Key Name: PluginsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2048">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2048">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>http://contoso.edu:8080</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2049">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2049">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2050">PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2050">PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2051">特定のサイトでのポップアップ ウィンドウの表示を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2051">Allow pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2052">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2052">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2053">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2053">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2054">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2054">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2055">ポップアップ ウィンドウを開くことができるサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2055">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can open pop-up windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2056">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーの個人用の構成、または [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2056">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2057">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2057">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2058">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2058">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2059">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2059">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2060">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2060">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2061">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2061">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2062">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2062">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2063">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2063">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2064">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2064">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2065">GP 固有の名前: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2065">GP unique name: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2066">GP 名: 特定のサイトでのポップアップ ウィンドウの表示を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2066">GP name: Allow pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2067">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2067">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2068">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2068">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2069">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2069">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2070">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2070">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>
