  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2071">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2071">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2072">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2072">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2073">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2073">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2074">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2074">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2075">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2075">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2076">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2076">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2077">基本設定キーの名前: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2077">Preference Key Name: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2078">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2078">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2079">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2079">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2080">PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2080">PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2081">特定のサイトでのポップアップ ウィンドウのブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2081">Block pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2082">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2082">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2083">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2083">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2084">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2084">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2085">ポップアップ ウィンドウのオープンがブロックされているサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2085">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked from opening pop-up windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2086">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーの個人用の構成、または [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2086">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2087">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2087">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2088">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2088">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2089">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2089">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2090">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2090">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2091">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2091">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2092">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2092">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2093">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2093">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2094">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2094">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2095">GP 固有の名前: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2095">GP unique name: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2096">GP 名: 特定のサイトでのポップアップ ウィンドウのブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2096">GP name: Block pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2097">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2097">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2098">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2098">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2099">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2099">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2100">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2100">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2101">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2101">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2102">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2102">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2103">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2103">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2104">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2104">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2105">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2105">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2106">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2106">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2107">基本設定キーの名前: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2107">Preference Key Name: PopupsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2108">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2108">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2109">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2109">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2110">RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2110">RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2111">プロトコル ハンドラーを登録する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2111">Register protocol handlers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2112">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2112">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2113">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2113">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2114">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2114">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2115">プロトコル ハンドラーの一覧を登録するには、このポリシーを設定します (推奨のみ)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2115">Set this policy (recommended only) to register a list of protocol handlers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2116">このリストは、ユーザーが登録したリストと結合され、両方を使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2116">This list is merged with ones registered by the user and both are available to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2117">プロトコル ハンドラーを登録するには:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2117">To register a protocol handler:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2118">プロトコル プロパティをスキームに設定します (例: "mailto")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2118">Set the protocol property to the scheme (for example, "mailto")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2119">"protocol" フィールドで指定されたスキームを処理するアプリケーションの URL プロパティに、URL プロパティを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2119">Set the URL property to the URL property of the application that handlers the scheme specified in the "protocol" field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2120">パターンには "%s" プレースホルダーを含めることができ、これは処理された URL に置き換えられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2120">The pattern can include a "%s" placeholder, which the handled URL replaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2121">ユーザーは、このポリシーによって登録されたプロトコル ハンドラーを削除できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2121">Users can't remove a protocol handler registered by this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2122">ただし、新しい既定のプロトコル ハンドラーをインストールし、既存のプロトコル ハンドラーを上書きすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2122">However, they can install a new default protocol handler to override the existing protocol handlers.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2123">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2123">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2124">必須にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2124">Can be mandatory: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2125">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2125">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2126">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2126">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2127">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2127">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2128">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2128">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2129">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2129">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2130">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2130">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2131">GP 固有の名前: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2131">GP unique name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2132">GP 名: プロトコル ハンドラーを登録する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2132">GP name: Register protocol handlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2133">GP パス (必須): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2133">GP path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2134">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2134">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2135">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2135">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2136">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2136">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2137">パス (必須): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2137">Path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2138">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2138">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2139">値の名前: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2139">Value Name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2140">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2140">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2141">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2141">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RegisteredProtocolHandlers = [
  {
    "default": true, 
    "protocol": "mailto", 
    "url": "https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s"
  }
]
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2142">コンパクト サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2142">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RegisteredProtocolHandlers = [{"default": true, "protocol": "mailto", "url": "https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s"}]
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2143">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2143">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2144">基本設定キーの名前: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2144">Preference Key Name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2145">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2145">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>RegisteredProtocolHandlers</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>default</key>
    <true/>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>mailto</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2146">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2146">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2147">SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2147">SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2148">ユーザーがカスタマイズされた背景画像およびテキスト、提案、通知を受け取ることができるようにするかどうか選択する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2148">Choose whether users can receive customized background images and text, suggestions, notifications,</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2149">そしてMicrosoft サービスのヒントも受け取るのかどうか</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2149">and tips for Microsoft services</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2150">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2150">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2151">Windows での 86 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2151">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2152">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2152">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2153">ユーザーがカスタマイズされた背景画像およびテキスト、提案、通知、Microsoft サービスのヒントを受信できるかどうかを選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2153">Choose whether users can receive customized background images and text, suggestions, notifications, and tips for Microsoft services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2154">この設定を有効にした場合、またはこの設定を構成しなかった場合は、スポットライトの機能と推奨事項が有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2154">If you enable or don't configure this setting, spotlight experiences and recommendations are turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2155">この設定を無効にした場合は、スポットライトのエクスペリエンスと推奨事項が無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2155">If you disable this setting, spotlight experiences and recommendations are turned off.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2156">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2156">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2157">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2157">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2158">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2158">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2159">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2159">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2160">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2160">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2161">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2161">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2162">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2162">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2163">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2163">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2164">GP 固有の名前: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2164">GP unique name: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2165">[GP name]: カスタマイズされた背景画像およびテキスト、提案、通知、Microsoft サービスのヒントをユーザーが受信できるかどうかを選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2165">GP name: Choose whether users can receive customized background images and text, suggestions, notifications, and tips for Microsoft services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2166">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2166">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2167">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2167">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2168">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2168">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2169">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2169">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2170">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2170">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2171">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2171">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2172">値の名前: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2172">Value Name: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2173">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2173">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2174">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2174">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2175">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2175">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2176">WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2176">WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2177">特定の USB デバイスに接続するために、特定のサイトへのアクセスを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2177">Grant access to specific sites to connect to specific USB devices</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2178">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2178">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2179">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2179">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2180">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2180">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2181">指定されたベンダー ID と製品 ID を持つ USB デバイスへのアクセス許可を自動的に付与するサイトを指定する URL の一覧を設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2181">Allows you to set a list of urls that specify which sites will automatically be granted permission to access a USB device with the given vendor and product IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2182">ポリシーを有効にするには、一覧の各項目にデバイスと URL の両方が含まれている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2182">Each item in the list must contain both devices and urls in order for the policy to be valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2183">デバイス内の各項目には、ベンダー ID と製品 ID のフィールドを含めることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2183">Each item in devices can contain a vendor ID and product ID field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2184">省略された ID は、1 つの例外を除いてワイルドカードとして扱われます。その例外とは、ベンダー ID を指定しない限り製品 ID を指定することができないという点です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2184">Any ID that is omitted is treated as a wildcard with one exception, and that exception is that a product ID cannot be specified without a vendor ID also being specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2185">それ以外の場合、そのポリシーは有効にならず、無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2185">Otherwise, the policy will not be valid and will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2186">USB アクセス許可モデルは、要求しているサイトの URL ("要求 URL") とトップレベル フレーム サイトの URL ("埋め込み URL") を使用して、要求 URL に USB デバイスへのアクセス許可を付与します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2186">The USB permission model uses the URL of the requesting site ("requesting URL") and the URL of the top-level frame site ("embedding URL") to grant permission to the requesting URL to access the USB device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2187">要求しているサイトが iframe で読み込まれたときに、要求 URL が埋め込み URL と異なる場合があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2187">The requesting URL may be different than the embedding URL when the requesting site is loaded in an iframe.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2188">したがって、"urls" フィールドには、コンマで区切られた最大 2 つの URL 文字列を含めることができ、要求 URL と埋め込み URL をそれぞれに指定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2188">Therefore, the "urls" field can contain up to two URL strings delimited by a comma to specify the requesting and embedding URL respectively.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2189">1 つの URL のみを指定した場合、埋め込みの状態に関係なく、要求しているサイトの URL がこの URL と一致した場合に、対応する USB デバイスへのアクセス許可が付与されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2189">If only one URL is specified, then access to the corresponding USB devices will be granted when the requesting site's URL matches this URL regardless of embedding status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2190">"urls" 内の URL は有効な URL である必要があり、それ以外の場合にはポリシーは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2190">The URLs in "urls" must be valid URLs, otherwise the policy will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2191">このポリシーを設定していない場合、[DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) またはユーザーの個人用の構成からのグローバルな既定値がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2191">If this policy is left not set, the global default value will be used for all sites either from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy if it is set, or the user's personal configuration otherwise.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2192">このポリシーの URL パターンは、[WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) を介して構成されたものと競合することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2192">URL patterns in this policy should not clash with the ones configured via [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2193">競合する場合、このポリシーは [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) や [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) よりも優先されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2193">If there is a clash, this policy will take precedence over [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) and [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2194">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2194">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2195">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2195">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2196">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2196">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2197">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2197">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2198">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2198">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2199">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2199">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2200">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2200">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2201">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2201">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2202">GP 固有の名前: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2202">GP unique name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2203">GP 名: 特定の USB デバイスに接続するために、特定のサイトへのアクセスを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2203">GP name: Grant access to specific sites to connect to specific USB devices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2204">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2204">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2205">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2205">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2206">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2206">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2207">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2207">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2208">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2208">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2209">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2209">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2210">値の名前: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2210">Value Name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2211">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2211">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2212">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2212">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls = [
  {
    "devices": [
      {
        "product_id": 5678, 
        "vendor_id": 1234
      }
    ], 
    "urls": [
      "https://contoso.com", 
      "https://fabrikam.com"
    ]
  }
]
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2213">コンパクト サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2213">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls = [{"devices": [{"product_id": 5678, "vendor_id": 1234}], "urls": ["https://contoso.com", "https://fabrikam.com"]}]
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2214">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2214">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2215">基本設定キーの名前: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2215">Preference Key Name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2216">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2216">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>devices</key>
    <array>
      <dict>
        <key>product_id</key>
        <integer>5678</integer>
        <key>vendor_id</key>
        <integer>1234</integer>
      </dict>
    </array>
    <key>urls</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://contoso.com</string>
      <string>https://fabrikam.com</string>
    </array>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2217">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2217">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2218">WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2218">WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2219">特定のサイトでの WebUSB を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2219">Allow WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2220">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2220">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2221">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2221">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2222">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2222">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2223">USB デバイスへのアクセスをユーザーに対して確認することができるサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2223">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can ask the user for access to a USB device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2224">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーの個人用の構成、または [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2224">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2225">このポリシーで定義された URL パターンは、[WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) ポリシーで構成されたものと競合することはできません。URL を許可することも、ブロックすることもできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2225">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) policy - you can't both allow and block a URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2226">有効な URL パターンの詳細については、[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) をご覧ください</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2226">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2227">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2227">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2228">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2228">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2229">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2229">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2230">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2230">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2231">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2231">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2232">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2232">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2233">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2233">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2234">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2234">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2235">GP 固有の名前: WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2235">GP unique name: WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2236">GP 名: 特定のサイトでの WebUSB を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2236">GP name: Allow WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2237">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2237">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2238">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2238">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2239">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2239">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2240">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2240">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2241">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2241">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2242">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2242">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2243">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2243">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2244">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2244">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2245">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2245">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2246">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2246">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2247">基本設定キーの名前: WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2247">Preference Key Name: WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2248">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2248">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2249">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2249">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2250">WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2250">WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2251">特定のサイトでの WebUSB のブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2251">Block WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2252">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2252">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2253">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2253">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2254">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2254">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2255">USB デバイスへのアクセス権の付与をユーザーに対して確認することができないサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2255">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't ask the user to grant them access to a USB device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2256">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーの個人用の構成、または [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2256">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2257">このポリシーの URL パターンは、[WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) ポリシーで構成されたものと競合することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2257">URL patterns in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2258">URL を許可することも、ブロックすることもできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2258">You can't both allow and block a URL.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2259">有効な URL パターンの詳細については、[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) をご覧ください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2259">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2260">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2260">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2261">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2261">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2262">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2262">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2263">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2263">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2264">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2264">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2265">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2265">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2266">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2266">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2267">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2267">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2268">GP 固有の名前: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2268">GP unique name: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2269">GP 名: 特定のサイトでの WebUSB のブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2269">GP name: Block WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2270">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/コンテンツの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2270">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2271">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2271">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2272">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2272">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2273">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2273">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2274">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2274">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2275">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2275">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2276">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2276">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2277">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2277">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2278">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2278">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2279">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2279">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2280">基本設定キーの名前: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2280">Preference Key Name: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2281">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2281">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2282">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2282">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2283">既定の検索プロバイダーに関するポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2283">Default search provider policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2284">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2284">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2285">DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2285">DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2286">既定の検索プロバイダーを有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2286">Enable the default search provider</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2287">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2287">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2288">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2288">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2289">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2289">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2290">既定の検索プロバイダーを使用する機能を有効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2290">Enables the ability to use a default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2291">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、ユーザーは用語をアドレス バーに入力して検索することができます (入力するものが URL ではない場合のみ)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2291">If you enable this policy, a user can search for a term by typing in the address bar (as long as what they type isn't a URL).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2292">残りの既定の検索ポリシーを有効にすることで、使用する既定の検索プロバイダーを指定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2292">You can specify the default search provider to use by enabling the rest of the default search policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2293">これらが空のまま (構成されていない)、または正しく構成されていない場合、ユーザーは既定のプロバイダーを選択することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2293">If these are left empty (not configured) or configured incorrectly, the user can choose the default provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2294">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、ユーザーはアドレス バーから検索することができなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2294">If you disable this policy, the user can't search from the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2295">このポリシーを有効または無効にしている場合、ユーザーはポリシーを変更したり上書きしたりすることができなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2295">If you enable or disable this policy, users can't change or override it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2296">このポリシーを構成していない場合、既定の検索プロバイダーが有効になり、ユーザーは既定の検索プロバイダーを選択し、検索プロバイダーの一覧を設定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2296">If you don't configure this policy, the default search provider is enabled, and the user can choose the default search provider and set the search provider list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2297">このポリシーは、Microsoft Active Directory ドメインに参加している Windows インスタンス、デバイス管理用に登録されている Windows 10 Pro または Enterprise インスタンス、もしくは MDM の使用するか MDM を使用してドメインに参加する macOS インスタンスでのみ利用可能です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2297">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX..</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2298">Microsoft Edge 84 以降、このポリシーは推奨されるポリシーとして設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2298">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2299">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2299">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2300">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2300">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2301">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2301">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2302">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2302">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2303">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2303">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2304">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2304">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2305">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2305">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2306">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2306">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2307">GP 固有の名前: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2307">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2308">GP 名: 既定の検索プロバイダーを有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2308">GP name: Enable the default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2309">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/既定の検索プロバイダー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2309">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2310">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/既定の検索プロバイダー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2310">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2311">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2311">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2312">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2312">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2313">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2313">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2314">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2314">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2315">値の名前: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2315">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2316">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2316">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2317">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2317">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2318">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2318">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2319">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2319">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2320">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2320">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2321">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2321">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2322">DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2322">DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2323">既定の検索プロバイダー エンコード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2323">Default search provider encodings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2324">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2324">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2325">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2325">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2326">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2326">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2327">検索プロバイダーがサポートする文字エンコードを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2327">Specify the character encodings supported by the search provider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2328">エンコードは、UTF-8、GB2312、ISO-8859-1 などのコード ページ名です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2328">Encodings are code page names like UTF-8, GB2312, and ISO-8859-1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2329">それらは提供された順序で試行されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2329">They are tried in the order provided.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2330">このポリシーは省略可能です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2330">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2331">構成されていない場合、既定値である UTF-8 が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2331">If not configured, the default, UTF-8, is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2332">このポリシーは、[DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) と [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) ポリシーを有効にした場合にのみ適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2332">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2333">Microsoft Edge 84 以降、このポリシーは推奨されるポリシーとして設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2333">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2334">ユーザーが既に既定の検索プロバイダーを設定している場合、この推奨ポリシーによって構成された既定の検索プロバイダーは、ユーザーが選択できる検索プロバイダーの一覧に追加されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2334">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2335">必要な動作である場合は、[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) ポリシーを使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2335">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2336">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2336">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2337">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2337">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2338">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2338">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2339">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2339">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2340">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2340">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2341">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2341">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2342">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2342">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2343">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2343">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2344">GP 固有の名前: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2344">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2345">GP 名: 既定の検索プロバイダー エンコード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2345">GP name: Default search provider encodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2346">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/既定の検索プロバイダー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2346">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2347">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/既定の検索プロバイダー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2347">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2348">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2348">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2349">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2349">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2350">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2350">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2351">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2351">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2352">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2352">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2353">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2353">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2354">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2354">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\1 = "UTF-8"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\2 = "UTF-16"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\3 = "GB2312"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\4 = "ISO-8859-1"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2355">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2355">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2356">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2356">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2357">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2357">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>UTF-8</string>
  <string>UTF-16</string>
  <string>GB2312</string>
  <string>ISO-8859-1</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2358">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2358">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2359">DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2359">DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2360">既定の検索プロバイダーの画像による検索機能を指定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2360">Specifies the search-by-image feature for the default search provider</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2361">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2361">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2362">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2362">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2363">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2363">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2364">画像検索に使用する検索エンジンの URL を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2364">Specifies the URL to the search engine used for image search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2365">検索要求は、GET メソッドを使用して送信されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2365">Search requests are sent using the GET method.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2366">このポリシーは省略可能です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2366">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2367">構成していない場合、画像検索を使用することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2367">If you don't configure it, image search isn't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2368">Bing の画像検索 URL を、"{bing:baseURL}images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload&FORM=ANCMS1#enterInsights" として指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2368">Specify Bing's Image Search URL as: '{bing:baseURL}images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload&FORM=ANCMS1#enterInsights'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2369">Google の画像検索 URL を、"{google:baseURL}searchbyimage/upload" として指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2369">Specify Google's Image Search URL as: '{google:baseURL}searchbyimage/upload'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2370">画像検索の構成を終了する方法については、[DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams](#defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams) ポリシーを参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2370">See [DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams](#defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams) policy to finish configuring image search.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2371">このポリシーは、[DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) と [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) ポリシーを有効にした場合にのみ適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2371">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2372">Microsoft Edge 84 以降、このポリシーは推奨されるポリシーとして設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2372">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2373">ユーザーが既に既定の検索プロバイダーを設定している場合、この推奨ポリシーによって構成された既定の検索プロバイダーは、ユーザーが選択できる検索プロバイダーの一覧に追加されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2373">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2374">必要な動作である場合は、[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) ポリシーを使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2374">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2375">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2375">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2376">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2376">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2377">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2377">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2378">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2378">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2379">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2379">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2380">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2380">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2381">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2381">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2382">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2382">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2383">GP 固有の名前: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2383">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2384">GP 名: 既定の検索プロバイダーの画像による検索機能を指定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2384">GP name: Specifies the search-by-image feature for the default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2385">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/既定の検索プロバイダー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2385">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2386">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/既定の検索プロバイダー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2386">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2387">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2387">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2388">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2388">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2389">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2389">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2390">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2390">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2391">値の名前: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2391">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2392">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2392">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2393">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2393">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://search.contoso.com/searchbyimage/upload"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2394">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2394">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2395">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2395">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2396">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2396">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/searchbyimage/upload</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2397">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2397">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2398">DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2398">DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2399">POST を使用する画像 URL のパラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2399">Parameters for an image URL that uses POST</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2400">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2400">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2401">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2401">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2402">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2402">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2403">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、このポリシーは POST を使用して画像検索を行うときに使用するパラメーターを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2403">If you enable this policy, it specifies the parameters used when an image search that uses POST is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2404">ポリシーは、コンマで区切られた名前と値のペアで構成されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2404">The policy consists of comma-separated name/value pairs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2405">前の例の {imageThumbnail} のように値がテンプレート パラメーターである場合、これは実際の画像サムネイル データで置き換えられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2405">If a value is a template parameter, like {imageThumbnail} in the preceding example, it's replaced with real image thumbnail data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2406">このポリシーは、[DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) と [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) ポリシーを有効にした場合にのみ適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2406">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2407">Bing の画像検索 URL のポスト パラメータを、"imageBin={google:imageThumbnailBase64}" として指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2407">Specify Bing's Image Search URL Post Params as: 'imageBin={google:imageThumbnailBase64}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2408">Google の画像検索 URL のポスト パラメータを、"encoded_image={google:imageThumbnail},image_url={google:imageURL},sbisrc={google:imageSearchSource},original_width={google:imageOriginalWidth},original_height={google:imageOriginalHeight}" として指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2408">Specify Google's Image Search URL Post Params as: 'encoded_image={google:imageThumbnail},image_url={google:imageURL},sbisrc={google:imageSearchSource},original_width={google:imageOriginalWidth},original_height={google:imageOriginalHeight}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2409">このポリシーを設定していない場合、画像検索要求は GET メソッドを使用して送信されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2409">If you don't set this policy, image search requests are sent using the GET method.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2410">Microsoft Edge 84 以降、このポリシーは推奨されるポリシーとして設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2410">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2411">ユーザーが既に既定の検索プロバイダーを設定している場合、この推奨ポリシーによって構成された既定の検索プロバイダーは、ユーザーが選択できる検索プロバイダーの一覧に追加されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2411">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2412">必要な動作である場合は、[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) ポリシーを使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2412">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2413">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2413">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2414">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2414">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2415">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2415">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2416">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2416">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2417">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2417">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2418">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2418">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2419">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2419">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2420">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2420">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2421">GP 固有の名前: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2421">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2422">GP 名: POST を使用する画像 URL のパラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2422">GP name: Parameters for an image URL that uses POST</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2423">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/既定の検索プロバイダー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2423">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2424">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/既定の検索プロバイダー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2424">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2425">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2425">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2426">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2426">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2427">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2427">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2428">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2428">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2429">値の名前: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2429">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2430">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2430">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2431">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2431">Example value:</span></span>

```
"content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2432">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2432">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2433">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2433">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2434">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2434">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2435">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2435">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2436">DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2436">DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2437">既定の検索プロバイダーのキーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2437">Default search provider keyword</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2438">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2438">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2439">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2439">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2440">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2440">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2441">このプロバイダーの検索をトリガーするためにアドレス バーで使用されるショートカットとして、キーワードを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2441">Specifies the keyword, which is the shortcut used in the Address Bar to trigger the search for this provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2442">このポリシーは省略可能です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2442">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2443">構成していない場合、キーワードは検索プロバイダーをアクティブ化しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2443">If you don't configure it, no keyword activates the search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2444">このポリシーは、[DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) と [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) ポリシーを有効にした場合にのみ適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2444">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2445">Microsoft Edge 84 以降、このポリシーは推奨されるポリシーとして設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2445">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2446">ユーザーが既に既定の検索プロバイダーを設定している場合、この推奨ポリシーによって構成された既定の検索プロバイダーは、ユーザーが選択できる検索プロバイダーの一覧に追加されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2446">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2447">必要な動作である場合は、[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) ポリシーを使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2447">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2448">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2448">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2449">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2449">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2450">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2450">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2451">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2451">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2452">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2452">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2453">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2453">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2454">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2454">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2455">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2455">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2456">GP 固有の名前: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2456">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2457">GP 名: 既定の検索プロバイダーのキーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2457">GP name: Default search provider keyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2458">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/既定の検索プロバイダー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2458">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2459">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/既定の検索プロバイダー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2459">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2460">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2460">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2461">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2461">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2462">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2462">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
