  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2463">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2463">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2464">値の名前: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2464">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2465">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2465">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2466">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2466">Example value:</span></span>

```
"mis"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2467">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2467">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2468">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2468">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2469">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2469">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>mis</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2470">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2470">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2471">DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2471">DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2472">既定の検索プロバイダー名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2472">Default search provider name</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2473">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2473">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2474">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2474">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2475">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2475">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2476">既定の検索プロバイダー名を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2476">Specifies the name of the default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2477">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、既定の検索プロバイダー名が設定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2477">If you enable this policy, you set the name of the default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2478">このポリシーを有効にしていないか、空のままにしている場合、検索 URL で指定されたホスト名が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2478">If you don't enable this policy or if you leave it empty, the host name specified by the search URL is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2479">"DefaultSearchProviderName" には、DTBC-0008 で設定されている暗号化された検索プロバイダーに対応した組織承認済みの暗号化された検索プロバイダーを設定する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2479">'DefaultSearchProviderName' should be set to an organization-approved encrypted search provider that corresponds to the encrypted search provider set in DTBC-0008.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2480">このポリシーは、[DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) と [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) ポリシーを有効にした場合にのみ適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2480">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2481">Microsoft Edge 84 以降、このポリシーは推奨されるポリシーとして設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2481">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2482">ユーザーが既に既定の検索プロバイダーを設定している場合、この推奨ポリシーによって構成された既定の検索プロバイダーは、ユーザーが選択できる検索プロバイダーの一覧に追加されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2482">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2483">必要な動作である場合は、[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) ポリシーを使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2483">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2484">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2484">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2485">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2485">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2486">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2486">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2487">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2487">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2488">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2488">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2489">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2489">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2490">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2490">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2491">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2491">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2492">GP 固有の名前: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2492">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2493">GP 名: 既定の検索プロバイダー名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2493">GP name: Default search provider name</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2494">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/既定の検索プロバイダー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2494">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2495">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/既定の検索プロバイダー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2495">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2496">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2496">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2497">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2497">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2498">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2498">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2499">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2499">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2500">値の名前: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2500">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2501">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2501">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2502">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2502">Example value:</span></span>

```
"My Intranet Search"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2503">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2503">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2504">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2504">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2505">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2505">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>My Intranet Search</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2506">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2506">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2507">DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2507">DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2508">既定の検索プロバイダーの検索 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2508">Default search provider search URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2509">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2509">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2510">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2510">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2511">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2511">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2512">既定の検索に使用する検索エンジンの URL を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2512">Specifies the URL of the search engine used for a default search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2513">URL には文字列 "{searchTerms}" が含まれており、この文字列はクエリ時にユーザーが検索する用語で置き換えられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2513">The URL contains the string '{searchTerms}', which is replaced at query time by the terms the user is searching for.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2514">Bing の検索 URL を次のように指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2514">Specify Bing's search URL as:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2515">"{bing:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2515">'{bing:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2516">Google の検索 URL を、"{google:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}&{google:RLZ}{google:originalQueryForSuggestion}{google:assistedQueryStats}{google:searchFieldtrialParameter}{google:searchClient}{google:sourceId}ie={inputEncoding}" として指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2516">Specify Google's search URL as: '{google:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}&{google:RLZ}{google:originalQueryForSuggestion}{google:assistedQueryStats}{google:searchFieldtrialParameter}{google:searchClient}{google:sourceId}ie={inputEncoding}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2517">このポリシーは、[DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) ポリシーを有効にしている場合に必要です。後者のポリシーを有効にしていない場合、このポリシーは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2517">This policy is required when you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) policy; if you don't enable the latter policy, this policy is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2518">Microsoft Edge 84 以降、このポリシーは推奨されるポリシーとして設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2518">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2519">ユーザーが既に既定の検索プロバイダーを設定している場合、この推奨ポリシーによって構成された既定の検索プロバイダーは、ユーザーが選択できる検索プロバイダーの一覧に追加されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2519">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2520">必要な動作である場合は、[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) ポリシーを使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2520">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2521">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2521">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2522">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2522">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2523">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2523">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2524">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2524">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2525">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2525">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2526">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2526">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2527">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2527">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2528">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2528">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2529">GP 固有の名前: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2529">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2530">GP 名: 既定の検索プロバイダーの検索 URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2530">GP name: Default search provider search URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2531">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/既定の検索プロバイダー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2531">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2532">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/既定の検索プロバイダー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2532">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2533">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2533">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2534">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2534">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2535">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2535">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2536">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2536">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2537">値の名前: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2537">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2538">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2538">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2539">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2539">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://search.contoso.com/search?q={searchTerms}"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2540">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2540">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2541">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2541">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2542">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2542">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2543">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2543">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2544">DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2544">DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2545">検索候補用の既定の検索プロバイダーの URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2545">Default search provider URL for suggestions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2546">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2546">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2547">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2547">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2548">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2548">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2549">検索候補の提供に使用する検索エンジンの URL を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2549">Specifies the URL for the search engine used to provide search suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2550">URL には文字列 "{searchTerms}" が含まれており、この文字列はクエリ時にユーザーがこれまでに入力したテキストで置き換えられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2550">The URL contains the string '{searchTerms}', which is replaced at query time by the text the user has entered so far.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2551">このポリシーは省略可能です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2551">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2552">構成していない場合、ユーザーには検索候補が表示されません。閲覧の履歴とお気に入りからの候補が表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2552">If you don't configure it, users won't see search suggestions; they will see suggestions from their browsing history and favorites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2553">Bing の候補 URL は、次のように指定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2553">Bing's suggest URL can be specified as:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2554">"{bing:baseURL}qbox?query={searchTerms}"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2554">'{bing:baseURL}qbox?query={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2555">Google の候補 URL は、"{google:baseURL}complete/search?output=chrome&q={searchTerms}" として指定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2555">Google's suggest URL can be specified as: '{google:baseURL}complete/search?output=chrome&q={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2556">このポリシーは、[DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) と [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) ポリシーを有効にした場合にのみ適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2556">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2557">Microsoft Edge 84 以降、このポリシーは推奨されるポリシーとして設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2557">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2558">ユーザーが既に既定の検索プロバイダーを設定している場合、この推奨ポリシーによって構成された既定の検索プロバイダーは、ユーザーが選択できる検索プロバイダーの一覧に追加されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2558">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2559">必要な動作である場合は、[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) ポリシーを使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2559">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2560">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2560">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2561">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2561">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2562">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2562">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2563">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2563">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2564">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2564">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2565">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2565">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2566">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2566">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2567">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2567">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2568">GP 固有の名前: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2568">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2569">GP 名: 提案用の既定の検索プロバイダーの URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2569">GP name: Default search provider URL for suggestions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2570">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/既定の検索プロバイダー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2570">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2571">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/既定の検索プロバイダー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2571">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2572">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2572">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2573">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2573">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2574">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2574">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2575">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2575">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2576">値の名前: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2576">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2577">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2577">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2578">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2578">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://search.contoso.com/suggest?q={searchTerms}"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2579">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2579">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2580">基本設定キーの名前: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2580">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2581">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2581">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/suggest?q={searchTerms}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2582">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2582">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2583">NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2583">NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2584">新しいタブページ検索ボックスの機能を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2584">Configure the new tab page search box experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2585">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2585">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2586">Windows と macOS での 85 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2586">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2587">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2587">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2588">新しいタブで検索する場合は、新しいタブ ページの検索ボックスを [検索ボックス (推奨)] または [アドレス バー] を使用して設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2588">You can configure the new tab page search box to use "Search box (Recommended)" or "Address bar" to search on new tabs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2589">このポリシーは、次の 2 つのポリシーを設定して、検索エンジンを Bing 以外の値に設定した場合にのみ機能します: [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) と [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2589">This policy only works if you set the search engine to a value other than Bing by setting the following two policies: [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2590">このポリシーを無効にしているか、構成していない場合、次のようになります:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2590">If you disable or don't configure this policy and:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2591">アドレス バーの既定の検索エンジンが Bing の場合、新しいタブ ページは検索ボックスを使用して新しいタブを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2591">If the address bar default search engine is Bing, the new tab page uses the search box to search on new tabs.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2592">アドレス バーの既定の検索エンジンが Bing ではない場合、新しいタブを検索するときに、ユーザーに追加の選択肢 ([アドレスバー] を使用) が提供されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2592">If the address bar default search engine is not Bing, users are offered an additional choice (use "Address bar") when searching on new tabs.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2593">このポリシーを有効にすると、次のようになります:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2593">If you enable this policy and set it to:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2594">[検索ボックス (推奨)] (bing)、新しいタブ ページは検索ボックスを使用して新しいタブを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2594">"Search box (Recommended)" ('bing'), the new tab page uses the search box to search on new tabs.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2595">[アドレス バー] (リダイレクト)、新しいタブ ページの検索ボックスはアドレス バーを使用して新しいタブを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2595">"Address bar" ('redirect'), the new tab page search box uses the address bar to search on new tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2596">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2596">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2597">bing (bing) = 検索ボックス (推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2597">bing (bing) = Search box (Recommended)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2598">リダイレクト (リダイレクト) = アドレス バー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2598">redirect (redirect) = Address bar</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2599">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2599">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2600">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2600">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2601">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2601">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2602">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2602">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2603">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2603">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2604">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2604">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2605">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2605">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2606">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2606">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2607">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2607">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2608">GP 固有の名前: NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2608">GP unique name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2609">GP 名: 新しいタブ ページ検索ボックスの機能を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2609">GP name: Configure the new tab page search box experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2610">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/既定の検索プロバイダー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2610">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2611">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/既定の検索プロバイダー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2611">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2612">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2612">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2613">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2613">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2614">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2614">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2615">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2615">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2616">値の名前: NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2616">Value Name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2617">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2617">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2618">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2618">Example value:</span></span>

```
"bing"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2619">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2619">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2620">基本設定キーの名前: NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2620">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2621">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2621">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>bing</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2622">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2622">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2623">拡張機能に関するポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2623">Extensions policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2624">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2624">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2625">BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2625">BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2626">外部拡張機能がインストールされないようにブロックする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2626">Blocks external extensions from being installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2627">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2627">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2628">Windows と macOS での 88 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2628">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2629">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2629">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2630">外部拡張機能のインストールを制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2630">Control the installation of external extensions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2631">この設定を有効にすると、外部拡張機能はインストールされないようにブロックされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2631">If you enable this setting, external extensions are blocked from being installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2632">この設定を無効にした場合、または未設定のままにした場合、外部拡張機能のインストールは許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2632">If you disable this setting or leave it unset, external extensions are allowed to be installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2633">外部拡張機能とそのインストールについては、https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/developer-guide/alternate-distribution-options で文書化されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2633">External extensions and their installation are documented at https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/developer-guide/alternate-distribution-options.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2634">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2634">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2635">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2635">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2636">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2636">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2637">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2637">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2638">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2638">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2639">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2639">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2640">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2640">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2641">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2641">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2642">GP 固有の名前: BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2642">GP unique name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2643">GP 名: 外部拡張機能がインストールされないようにブロックする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2643">GP name: Blocks external extensions from being installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2644">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/拡張機能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2644">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2645">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2645">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2646">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2646">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2647">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2647">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2648">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2648">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2649">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2649">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2650">値の名前: BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2650">Value Name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2651">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2651">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2652">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2652">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2653">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2653">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2654">基本設定キー名: BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2654">Preference Key Name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2655">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2655">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2656">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2656">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2657">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2657">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2658">許可されている拡張機能の種類を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2658">Configure allowed extension types</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2659">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2659">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2660">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2660">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2661">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2661">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2662">ポリシーを設定することにより、Microsoft Edge にインストール可能なアプリや拡張機能、操作可能なホスト、ランタイム アクセスの制限を制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2662">Setting the policy controls which apps and extensions may be installed in Microsoft Edge, which hosts they can interact with, and limits runtime access.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2663">このポリシーを設定しない場合、使用可能な拡張機能やアプリの種類に制限はありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2663">If you don't set this policy, there aren't any restrictions on acceptable extension and app types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2664">リストにない種類の拡張機能やアプリはインストールされません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2664">Extensions and apps which have a type that's not on the list won't be installed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2665">それぞれの値は、次の文字列のいずれかである必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2665">Each value should be one of these strings:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2666">"extension"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2666">"extension"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2667">"theme"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2667">"theme"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2668">"user_script"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2668">"user_script"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2669">"hosted_app"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2669">"hosted_app"</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2670">これらの種類の詳細については、「Microsoft Edge extensions documentation (Microsoft Edge 拡張機能ドキュメント)」を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2670">See the Microsoft Edge extensions documentation for more information about these types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2671">注: このポリシーは、[ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) を使用して強制インストールされる拡張機能やアプリにも影響します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2671">Note: This policy also affects extensions and apps to be force-installed using [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2672">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2672">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2673">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2673">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2674">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2674">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2675">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2675">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2676">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2676">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2677">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2677">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2678">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2678">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2679">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2679">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2680">GP 固有の名前: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2680">GP unique name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2681">GP 名: 許可されている拡張機能の種類を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2681">GP name: Configure allowed extension types</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2682">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/拡張機能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2682">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2683">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2683">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2684">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2684">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2685">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2685">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2686">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2686">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2687">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2687">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2688">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2688">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2689">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2689">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2690">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2690">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes\1 = "hosted_app"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2691">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2691">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2692">基本設定キーの名前: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2692">Preference Key Name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2693">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2693">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>hosted_app</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2694">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2694">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2695">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2695">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2696">特定の拡張機能のインストールを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2696">Allow specific extensions to be installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2697">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2697">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2698">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2698">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2699">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2699">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2700">このポリシーを設定すると、ブロックリストの対象ではない拡張機能が指定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2700">Setting this policy specifies which extensions are not subject to the blocklist.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2701">ブロックリスト値 \* は、すべての拡張機能がブロックされ、ユーザーがインストールできるのは許可リストに記載されている拡張機能のみです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2701">A blocklist value of \* means all extensions are blocked and users can only install extensions listed in the allow list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2702">既定では、すべての拡張機能が許可されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2702">By default, all extensions are allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2703">ただし、ポリシーによって拡張機能を禁止した場合は、許可されている拡張機能の一覧を使用してそのポリシーを変更できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2703">However, if you prohibited extensions by policy, you can use the list of allowed extensions to change that policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2704">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2704">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2705">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2705">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2706">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2706">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2707">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2707">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2708">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2708">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2709">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2709">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2710">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2710">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2711">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2711">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2712">GP 固有の名前: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2712">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2713">GP 名: 特定の拡張機能のインストールを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2713">GP name: Allow specific extensions to be installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2714">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/拡張機能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2714">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2715">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2715">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2716">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2716">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2717">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2717">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2718">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2718">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2719">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2719">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2720">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2720">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2721">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2721">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2722">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2722">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\1 = "extension_id1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\2 = "extension_id2"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2723">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2723">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2724">基本設定キーの名前: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2724">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2725">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2725">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2726">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2726">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2727">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2727">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2728">インストールできない拡張機能を制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2728">Control which extensions cannot be installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2729">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2729">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2730">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2730">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2731">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2731">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2732">ユーザーがインストールできない拡張機能を指定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2732">Lets you specify which extensions the users CANNOT install.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2733">既にインストールされている拡張機能は、ユーザーが有効にする方法はなく、ブロックされた場合に無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2733">Extensions already installed will be disabled if blocked, without a way for the user to enable them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2734">無効化された拡張機能がブロックリストから削除されると、自動的に再有効化されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2734">After a disabled extension is removed from the blocklist it will automatically get re-enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2735">ブロックリスト値 '\*' は、allowlist に明示的に表示されていない限り、すべての拡張機能がブロックされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2735">A blocklist value of '\*' means all extensions are blocked unless they are explicitly listed in the allowlist.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2736">このポリシーが設定されていない場合、ユーザーは Microsoft Edge に任意の拡張機能をインストールできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2736">If this policy isn't set, the user can install any extension in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2737">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2737">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2738">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2738">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2739">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2739">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2740">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2740">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2741">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2741">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2742">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2742">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2743">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2743">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2744">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2744">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2745">GP 固有の名前: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2745">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2746">GP 名: インストールできない拡張機能を制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2746">GP name: Control which extensions cannot be installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2747">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/拡張機能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2747">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2748">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2748">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2749">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2749">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2750">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2750">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2751">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2751">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2752">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2752">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2753">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2753">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2754">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2754">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2755">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2755">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\1 = "extension_id1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\2 = "extension_id2"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2756">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2756">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2757">基本設定キーの名前: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2757">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2758">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2758">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2759">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2759">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2760">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2760">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2761">警告なしにインストールする拡張機能を制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2761">Control which extensions are installed silently</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2762">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2762">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2763">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2763">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2764">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2764">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2765">このポリシーを設定すると、ユーザーの操作なしに自動的にインストールされるアプリや拡張機能の一覧が指定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2765">Set this policy to specify a list of apps and extensions that install silently, without user interaction.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2766">ユーザーがこの設定をアンインストールしたり、オフにしたりすることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2766">Users can't uninstall or turn off this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2767">アクセス許可は暗黙的に付与されます。これには enterprise.deviceAttributes や enterprise.platformKeys 拡張機能 API が含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2767">Permissions are granted implicitly, including the enterprise.deviceAttributes and enterprise.platformKeys extension APIs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2768">注: これら 2 つの API は、強制インストールされていないアプリや拡張機能では使用できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2768">Note: These 2 APIs aren't available to apps and extensions that aren't force-installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2769">このポリシーを設定していない場合、アプリや拡張機能は自動インストールされず、ユーザーは Microsoft Edge で任意のアプリをアンインストールすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2769">If you don't set this policy, no apps or extensions are autoinstalled and users can uninstall any app in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2770">このポリシーは、[ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) ポリシーよりも優先されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2770">This policy supercedes [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2771">以前に強制インストールされたアプリや拡張機能がこの一覧から削除された場合、Microsoft Edge はそのアプリや拡張機能を自動的にアンインストールします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2771">If a previously force-installed app or extension is removed from this list, Microsoft Edge automatically uninstalls it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2772">Microsoft Windows インスタンスでは、Microsoft Edge アドオン Web サイト以外からのアプリや拡張機能については、インスタンスが Microsoft Active Directory ドメインに参加しており、Windows 10 Pro を実行している場合にのみ、強制的にインストールすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2772">On Microsoft Windows instances, apps and extensions from outside the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website can only be forced installed if the instance is joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, and running Windows 10 Pro.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2773">macOS インスタンスでは、Microsoft Edge アドオン Web サイト以外からのアプリや拡張機能については、インスタンスが MDM 経由で管理されているか、MCX 経由でドメインに参加している場合にのみ、強制的にインストールすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2773">On macOS instances, apps and extensions from outside the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website can only be force installed if the instance is managed via MDM, or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2774">ユーザーは開発者ツールを使用して任意の拡張機能のソース コードを変更することができ、その結果として拡張機能が正常に機能しなくなる可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2774">The source code of any extension can be altered by users with developer tools, potentially rendering the extension unfunctional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2775">これが問題となる場合には、DeveloperToolsDisabled ポリシーを構成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2775">If this is a concern, configure the DeveloperToolsDisabled policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2776">ポリシーの各リスト アイテムは、拡張機能 ID と、セミコロン (;) で区切られたオプションの "更新" URL を含む文字列です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2776">Each list item of the policy is a string that contains an extension ID and, optionally, an "update" URL separated by a semicolon (;).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2777">拡張機能 ID は 32 文字の文字列で、たとえば開発者モードの場合には、edge://extensions で見つけることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2777">The extension ID is the 32-letter string found, for example, on edge://extensions when in Developer mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2778">指定する場合には、"更新" URL は更新プログラム マニフェスト XML ドキュメント ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043)) を指している必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2778">If specified, the "update" URL should point to an Update Manifest XML document ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2779">既定では、Microsoft Edge アドオン Web サイトの更新 URL が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2779">By default, the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website's update URL is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2780">このポリシーで設定されている "更新" URL は、初回のインストールにのみ使用され、以降の拡張機能の更新では、拡張機能のマニフェスト内の更新 URL が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2780">The "update" URL set in this policy is only used for the initial installation; subsequent updates of the extension use the update URL in the extension's manifest.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2781">注: このポリシーは InPrivate モードには適用されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2781">Note: This policy doesn't apply to InPrivate mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2782">拡張機能のホスティングについて読む (https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/enterprise/hosting-and-updating)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2782">Read about hosting extensions (https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/enterprise/hosting-and-updating).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2783">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2783">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2784">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2784">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2785">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2785">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2786">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2786">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2787">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2787">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2788">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2788">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2789">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2789">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2790">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2790">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2791">GP 固有の名前: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2791">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2792">GP 名: 警告なしにインストールする拡張機能を制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2792">GP name: Control which extensions are installed silently</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2793">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/拡張機能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2793">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2794">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2794">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2795">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2795">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2796">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2796">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2797">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2797">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2798">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2798">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2799">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2799">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2800">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2800">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2801">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2801">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\1 = "gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\2 = "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2802">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2802">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2803">基本設定キーの名前: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2803">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2804">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2804">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx</string>
  <string>abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2805">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2805">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2806">ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2806">ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2807">拡張機能とユーザー スクリプトのインストール ソースを構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2807">Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2808">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2808">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2809">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2809">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2810">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2810">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2811">拡張機能やテーマをインストールできる URL を定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2811">Define URLs that can install extensions and themes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2812">パッケージを edge://extensions ページにドラッグ アンド ドロップすることなく、拡張機能やテーマを直接インストールできる URL を定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2812">Define URLs that can install extensions and themes directly without having to drag and drop the packages to the edge://extensions page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2813">このリストの各項目は、拡張子スタイルの一致パターンです ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039) を参照してください)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2813">Each item in this list is an extension-style match pattern (see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039)).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2814">ユーザーは、このリストの項目に一致する URL から簡単にアイテムをインストールすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2814">Users can easily install items from any URL that matches an item in this list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2815">\*.crx ファイルの場所と、ダウンロードを開始するページ (つまり参照元) の両方が、これらのパターンで許可されている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2815">Both the location of the \*.crx file and the page where the download is started from (in other words, the referrer) must be allowed by these patterns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2816">認証が必要な場所では、ファイルをホストしないでください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2816">Do not host the files at a location that requires authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2817">[ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) ポリシーは、このポリシーよりも優先されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2817">The [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy takes precedence over this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2818">ブロック リストに登録されている拡張機能は、このリストに登録されているサイトからのものであっても、インストールされません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2818">Any extensions that's on the block list won't be installed, even if it comes from a site on this list.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2819">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2819">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2820">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2820">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2821">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2821">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2822">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2822">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2823">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2823">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2824">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2824">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2825">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2825">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2826">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2826">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2827">GP 固有の名前: ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2827">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2828">GP 名: 拡張機能とユーザー スクリプトのインストール ソースを構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2828">GP name: Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2829">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/拡張機能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2829">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2830">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2830">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2831">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2831">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2832">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2832">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2833">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2833">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2834">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2834">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2835">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2835">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2836">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2836">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2837">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2837">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources\1 = "https://corp.contoso.com/*"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2838">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2838">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2839">基本設定キーの名前: ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2839">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2840">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2840">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://corp.contoso.com/*</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2841">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2841">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2842">ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2842">ExtensionSettings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2843">拡張機能管理設定を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2843">Configure extension management settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2844">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2844">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2845">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2845">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2846">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2846">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2847">このポリシーを設定すると、既存の拡張機能関連ポリシーによって制御される設定を含め、Microsoft Edge の拡張機能管理設定が制御されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2847">Setting this policy controls extension management settings for Microsoft Edge, including any controlled by existing extension-related policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2848">このポリシーは、設定されている可能性がある従来のポリシーより優先されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2848">This policy supersedes any legacy policies that might be set.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2849">このポリシーは、拡張機能 ID または更新 URL を特定の設定にのみマップします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2849">This policy maps an extension ID or an update URL to its specific setting only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2850">特別な ID "\*" に対して既定の構成を設定できます。この構成は、このポリシーのカスタム構成なしですべての拡張機能に適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2850">A default configuration can be set for the special ID "\*", which applies to all extensions without a custom configuration in this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2851">更新 URL を使用すると、拡張機能マニフェスト ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) )に記載されている正確な更新 URL を持つ拡張機能に構成が適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2851">With an update URL, configuration applies to extensions with the exact update URL stated in the extension manifest ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2852">特定のサード パーティ ストアの拡張機能をブロックするには、そのストアの update_url をブロックする必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2852">To block extensions from a particular third party store, you only need to block the update_url for that store.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2853">たとえば、Chrome Web ストアの拡張機能をブロックする場合は、次の JSON を使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2853">For example, if you want to block extensions from Chrome Web Store, you can use the following JSON.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2854">{"update_url: https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx ":{"installation_mode":"blocked"}}</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2854">{"update_url:https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx":{"installation_mode":"blocked"}}</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2855">前の例で JSON を使用してストアがブロックされている場合でも、[ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) と [ExtensionInstallAllowlist](#extensioninstallallowlist) を使用して特定の拡張機能のインストールを許可または強制することができることに注意してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2855">Note that you can still use [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) and [ExtensionInstallAllowlist](#extensioninstallallowlist) to allow / force install specific extensions even if the store is blocked using the JSON in the previous example.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2856">注: Microsoft Active Directory ドメインに参加していない Windows インスタンスの場合、強制インストールは Microsoft Edge アドオン Web サイトに記載されているアプリと拡張機能に限定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2856">Note: For Windows instances not joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, forced installation is limited to apps and extensions listed in the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2857">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2857">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2858">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2858">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2859">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2859">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2860">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2860">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2861">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2861">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2862">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2862">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2863">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2863">Windows information and settings</span></span>
