  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2864">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2864">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2865">GP 固有の名前: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2865">GP unique name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2866">GP 名: 拡張機能管理設定を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2866">GP name: Configure extension management settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2867">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/拡張機能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2867">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2868">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2868">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2869">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2869">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2870">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2870">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2871">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2871">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2872">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2872">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2873">値の名前: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2873">Value Name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2874">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2874">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2875">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2875">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {
  "*": {
    "allowed_types": [
      "hosted_app"
    ], 
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "downloads", 
      "bookmarks"
    ], 
    "install_sources": [
      "https://company-intranet/apps"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "blocked", 
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ]
  }, 
  "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "history"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "allowed", 
    "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"
  }, 
  "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "force_installed", 
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"
  }, 
  "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  }, 
  "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  }, 
  "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.", 
    "installation_mode": "removed"
  }, 
  "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ], 
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "wallpaper"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "allowed"
  }
}
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2876">コンパクト サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2876">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {"*": {"allowed_types": ["hosted_app"], "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "blocked_permissions": ["downloads", "bookmarks"], "install_sources": ["https://company-intranet/apps"], "installation_mode": "blocked", "runtime_allowed_hosts": ["*://good.contoso.com"], "runtime_blocked_hosts": ["*://*.contoso.com"]}, "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {"blocked_permissions": ["history"], "installation_mode": "allowed", "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"}, "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {"allowed_permissions": ["downloads"], "installation_mode": "force_installed", "runtime_allowed_hosts": ["*://good.contoso.com"], "runtime_blocked_hosts": ["*://*.contoso.com"], "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"}, "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "installation_mode": "blocked"}, "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "installation_mode": "blocked"}, "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.", "installation_mode": "removed"}, "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {"allowed_permissions": ["downloads"], "blocked_permissions": ["wallpaper"], "installation_mode": "allowed"}}
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2877">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2877">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2878">基本設定キーの名前: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2878">Preference Key Name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2879">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2879">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ExtensionSettings</key>
<dict>
  <key>*</key>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_types</key>
    <array>
      <string>hosted_app</string>
    </array>
    <key>blocked_install_message</key>
    <string>Custom error message.</string>
    <key>blocked_permissions</key>
    <array>
      <string>downloads</string>
      <string>bookmarks</string>
    </array>
    <key>install_sources</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://company-intranet/apps</string>
    </array>
    <key>installation_mode</key>
    <string>blocked</string>
    <key>runtime_allowed_hosts</key>
    <array>
      <string>*://good.contoso.com</string>
    </array>
    <key>runtime_blocked_hosts</key>
    <array>
      <string>*://*.contoso.com</string>
    </array>
  </dict>
  <key>abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop</key>
  <dict>
    <key>blocked_permissions</key>
    <array>
      <string>history</string>
    </array>
    <key>installation_mode</key>
    <string>allowed</string>
    <key>minimum_version_required</key>
    <string>1.0.1</string>
  </dict>
  <key>bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa</key>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_permissions</key>
    <array>
      <string>downloads</string>
    </array>
    <key>installation_mode</key>
    <string>force_installed</string>
    <key>runtime_allowed_hosts</key>
    <array>
      <string>*://good.contoso.com</string>
    </array>
    <key>runtime_blocked_hosts</key>
    <array>
      <string>*://*.contoso.com</string>
    </array>
    <key>update_url</key>
    <string>https://contoso.com/update_url</string>
  </dict>
  <key>cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab</key>
  <dict>
    <key>blocked_install_message</key>
    <string>Custom error message.</string>
    <key>installation_mode</key>
    <string>blocked</string>
  </dict>
  <key>defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd</key>
  <dict>
    <key>blocked_install_message</key>
    <string>Custom error message.</string>
    <key>installation_mode</key>
    <string>blocked</string>
  </dict>
  <key>fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde</key>
  <dict>
    <key>blocked_install_message</key>
    <string>Custom removal message.</string>
    <key>installation_mode</key>
    <string>removed</string>
  </dict>
  <key>update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml</key>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_permissions</key>
    <array>
      <string>downloads</string>
    </array>
    <key>blocked_permissions</key>
    <array>
      <string>wallpaper</string>
    </array>
    <key>installation_mode</key>
    <string>allowed</string>
  </dict>
</dict>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2880">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2880">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2881">HTTP 認証に関するポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2881">HTTP authentication policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2882">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2882">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2883">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2883">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2884">cross-origin HTTP 認証プロンプトを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2884">Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2885">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2885">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2886">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2886">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2887">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2887">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2888">ページ上のサードパーティの画像に認証プロンプトを表示するかどうかを制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2888">Controls whether third-party images on a page can show an authentication prompt.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2889">通常、これはフィッシング詐欺への防御として無効になっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2889">Typically, this is disabled as a phishing defense.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2890">このポリシーを設定しない場合、ポリシーは無効になり、サードパーティの画像は認証プロンプトを表示できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2890">If you don't configure this policy, it's disabled and third-party images can't show an authentication prompt.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2891">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2891">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2892">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2892">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2893">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2893">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2894">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2894">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2895">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2895">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2896">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2896">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2897">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2897">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2898">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2898">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2899">GP 固有の名前: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2899">GP unique name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2900">GP 名: cross-origin HTTP 認証プロンプトを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2900">GP name: Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2901">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 認証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2901">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2902">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2902">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2903">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2903">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2904">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2904">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2905">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2905">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2906">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2906">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2907">値の名前: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2907">Value Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2908">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2908">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2909">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2909">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2910">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2910">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2911">基本設定キーの名前: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2911">Preference Key Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2912">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2912">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2913">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2913">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2914">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2914">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2915">Microsoft Edge がユーザーの資格情報を委任できるサーバーの一覧を指定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2915">Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2916">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2916">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2917">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2917">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2918">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2918">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2919">Microsoft Edge が委任できるサーバーの一覧を構成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2919">Configure the list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate to.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2920">複数のサーバー名をコンマで区切ります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2920">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2921">ワイルドカード (\*) を指定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2921">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2922">このポリシーを構成していない場合、サーバーがイントラネットとして検出された場合でも、Microsoft Edge はユーザーの資格情報を委任しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2922">If you don't configure this policy Microsoft Edge won't delegate user credentials even if a server is detected as Intranet.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2923">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2923">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2924">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2924">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2925">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2925">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2926">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2926">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2927">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2927">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2928">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2928">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2929">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2929">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2930">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2930">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2931">GP 固有の名前: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2931">GP unique name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2932">GP 名: Microsoft Edge がユーザーの資格情報を委任できるサーバーの一覧を指定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2932">GP name: Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2933">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 認証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2933">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2934">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2934">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2935">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2935">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2936">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2936">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2937">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2937">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2938">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2938">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2939">値の名前: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2939">Value Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2940">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2940">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2941">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2941">Example value:</span></span>

```
"contoso.com"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2942">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2942">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2943">基本設定キーの名前: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2943">Preference Key Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2944">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2944">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2945">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2945">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2946">AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2946">AuthSchemes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2947">サポートされる認証スキーム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2947">Supported authentication schemes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2948">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2948">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2949">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2949">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2950">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2950">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2951">サポートされる HTTP 認証スキームを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2951">Specifies which HTTP authentication schemes are supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2952">"basic"、"digest"、"ntlm"、"negotiate" の値を使用してポリシーを構成することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2952">You can configure the policy by using these values: 'basic', 'digest', 'ntlm', and 'negotiate'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2953">コンマで複数の値を区切ります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2953">Separate multiple values with commas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2954">このポリシーを構成していない場合、4 つのスキームがすべて使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2954">If you don't configure this policy, all four schemes are used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2955">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2955">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2956">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2956">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2957">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2957">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2958">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2958">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2959">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2959">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2960">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2960">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2961">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2961">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2962">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2962">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2963">GP 固有の名前: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2963">GP unique name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2964">GP 名: サポートされる認証スキーム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2964">GP name: Supported authentication schemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2965">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 認証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2965">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2966">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2966">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2967">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2967">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2968">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2968">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2969">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2969">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2970">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2970">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2971">値の名前: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2971">Value Name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2972">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2972">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2973">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2973">Example value:</span></span>

```
"basic,digest,ntlm,negotiate"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2974">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2974">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2975">基本設定キーの名前: AuthSchemes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2975">Preference Key Name: AuthSchemes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2976">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2976">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>basic,digest,ntlm,negotiate</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2977">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2977">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2978">AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2978">AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2979">許可されている認証サーバーの一覧を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2979">Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2980">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2980">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2981">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2981">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2982">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2982">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2983">統合認証を有効にするサーバーを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2983">Specifies which servers to enable for integrated authentication.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2984">統合認証が有効になるのは、Microsoft Edge がプロキシまたはこのリスト内のサーバーから認証チャレンジを受信した場合のみです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2984">Integrated authentication is only enabled when Microsoft Edge receives an authentication challenge from a proxy or from a server in this list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2985">複数のサーバー名をコンマで区切ります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2985">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2986">ワイルドカード (\*) を指定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2986">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2987">このポリシーを構成していない場合、Microsoft Edge はサーバーがイントラネット上にあるかどうかを検出しようと試みます。その後でのみ、IWA の要求に応答します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2987">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge tries to detect if a server is on the intranet - only then will it respond to IWA requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2988">サーバーがインターネット上にある場合、サーバーからの IWA 要求は Microsoft Edge により無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2988">If the server is on the internet, IWA requests from it are ignored by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2989">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2989">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2990">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2990">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2991">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2991">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2992">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2992">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2993">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2993">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2994">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2994">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2995">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2995">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2996">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2996">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2997">GP 固有の名前: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2997">GP unique name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2998">GP 名: 許可されている認証サーバーの一覧を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2998">GP name: Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-2999">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 認証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-2999">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3000">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3000">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3001">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3001">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3002">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3002">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3003">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3003">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3004">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3004">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3005">値の名前: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3005">Value Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3006">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3006">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3007">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3007">Example value:</span></span>

```
"*contoso.com,contoso.com"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3008">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3008">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3009">基本設定キーの名前: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3009">Preference Key Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3010">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3010">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>*contoso.com,contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3011">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3011">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3012">BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3012">BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3013">HTTP の基本認証を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3013">Allow Basic authentication for HTTP</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3014">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3014">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3015">Windows と macOS での 88 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3015">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3016">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3016">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3017">このポリシーを有効にした場合、または未設定のままにした場合は、セキュリティで保護されていない HTTP で受け取った基本認証チャレンジが許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3017">If you enable this policy or leave it unset, Basic authentication challenges received over non-secure HTTP will be allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3018">このポリシーを無効にした場合は、基本認証スキームでセキュリティ保護されていない HTTP 要求はブロックされ、セキュリティで保護された HTTPS だけが許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3018">If you disable this policy,  non-secure HTTP requests from the Basic authentication scheme are blocked, and only secure HTTPS is allowed.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3019">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3019">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3020">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3020">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3021">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3021">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3022">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3022">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3023">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3023">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3024">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3024">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3025">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3025">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3026">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3026">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3027">一意の GP 名: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3027">GP unique name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3028">GP 名: HTTP の基本認証を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3028">GP name: Allow Basic authentication for HTTP</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3029">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 認証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3029">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3030">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3030">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3031">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3031">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3032">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3032">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3033">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3033">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3034">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3034">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3035">値の名前: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3035">Value Name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3036">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3036">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3037">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3037">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3038">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3038">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3039">Preference Key Name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3039">Preference Key Name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3040">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3040">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3041">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3041">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3042">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3042">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3043">Kerberos 認証をネゴシエートするときの CNAME ルックアップを無効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3043">Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3044">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3044">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3045">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3045">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3046">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3046">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3047">生成された Kerberos SPN が正規 DNS 名 (CNAME) に基づいているか、入力された元の名前に基づいているかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3047">Determines whether the generated Kerberos SPN is based on the canonical DNS name (CNAME) or on the original name entered.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3048">このポリシーを有効にすると、CNAME ルックアップはスキップされ、サーバー名 (入力されたもの) が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3048">If you enable this policy, CNAME lookup is skipped and the server name (as entered) is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3049">このポリシーを無効にしているか、構成していない場合、サーバーの正規名が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3049">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, the canonical name of the server is used.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3050">これは、CNAME ルックアップを通して決定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3050">This is determined through CNAME lookup.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3051">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3051">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3052">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3052">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3053">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3053">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3054">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3054">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3055">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3055">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3056">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3056">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3057">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3057">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3058">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3058">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3059">GP 固有の名前: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3059">GP unique name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3060">GP 名: Kerberos 認証をネゴシエートするときの CNAME ルックアップを無効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3060">GP name: Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3061">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 認証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3061">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3062">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3062">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3063">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3063">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3064">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3064">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3065">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3065">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3066">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3066">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3067">値の名前: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3067">Value Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3068">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3068">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3069">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3069">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3070">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3070">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3071">基本設定キーの名前: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3071">Preference Key Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3072">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3072">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3073">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3073">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3074">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3074">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3075">Kerberos SPN に標準以外のポートを含める</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3075">Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3076">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3076">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3077">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3077">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3078">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3078">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3079">生成された Kerberos SPN に標準以外のポートを含める必要があるかどうかを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3079">Specifies whether the generated Kerberos SPN should include a non-standard port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3080">このポリシーを有効にしているか、ユーザが URL に標準以外のポート (80 または 443 以外のポート) を含めている場合、そのポートは生成された Kerberos SPN に含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3080">If you enable this policy, and a user includes a non-standard port (a port other than 80 or 443) in a URL, that port is included in the generated Kerberos SPN.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3081">このポリシーを設定していないか、無効にしている場合、生成された Kerberos SPN にはどのような場合でもポートは含まれません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3081">If you don't configure or disable this policy, the generated Kerberos SPN won't include a port in any case.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3082">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3082">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3083">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3083">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3084">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3084">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3085">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3085">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3086">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3086">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3087">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3087">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3088">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3088">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3089">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3089">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3090">GP 固有の名前: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3090">GP unique name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3091">GP 名: Kerberos SPN に標準以外のポートを含める</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3091">GP name: Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3092">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/HTTP 認証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3092">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3093">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3093">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3094">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3094">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3095">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3095">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3096">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3096">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3097">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3097">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3098">値の名前: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3098">Value Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3099">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3099">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3100">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3100">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3101">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3101">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3102">基本設定キーの名前: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3102">Preference Key Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3103">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3103">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3104">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3104">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3105">NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3105">NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3106">NTLMv2 認証を有効にするかどうかを制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3106">Control whether NTLMv2 authentication is enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3107">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3107">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3108">macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3108">On macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3109">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3109">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3110">NTLMv2 を有効にするかどうかを制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3110">Controls whether NTLMv2 is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3111">Samba と Windows Server の最新バージョンは、すべて NTLMv2 をサポートしています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3111">All recent versions of Samba and Windows servers support NTLMv2.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3112">NTLMv2 を無効にすると認証のセキュリティが低下するため、下位互換性に関する問題に対処しなければならない場合にのみ無効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3112">You should only disable NTLMv2 to address issues with backwards compatibility as it reduces the security of authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3113">このポリシーを構成していない場合、NTLMv2 は既定で有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3113">If you don't configure this policy, NTLMv2 is enabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3114">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3114">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3115">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3115">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3116">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3116">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3117">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3117">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3118">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3118">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3119">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3119">Boolean</span></span>

  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3120">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3120">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3121">基本設定キーの名前: NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3121">Preference Key Name: NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3122">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3122">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3123">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3123">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3124">キオスク モードの設定ポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3124">Kiosk Mode settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3125">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3125">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3126">KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3126">KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3127">キオスクモードのパブリックブラウザーのエクスペリエンスを編集するアドレスバーを構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3127">Configure address bar editing for kiosk mode public browsing experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3128">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3128">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3129">Windows と macOS での 87 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3129">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3130">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3130">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3131">このポリシーは、パブリック ブラウジングエ クスペリエンスを使用しているときの Microsoft Edge キオスクモードにのみ適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3131">This policy only applies to Microsoft Edge kiosk mode while using the public browsing experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3132">このポリシーを有効にすると、ユーザーがアドレスバーのURLを変更できなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3132">If you enable this policy, it prevents users from changing the URL in the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3133">このポリシーを無効にするか、構成しなかった場合、ユーザーはアドレスバーのURLを変更できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3133">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, users can change the URL in the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3134">キオスク モードの構成の詳細については、「[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578)」を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3134">For detailed information on configuring kiosk Mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3135">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3135">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3136">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3136">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3137">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3137">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3138">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3138">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3139">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3139">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3140">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3140">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3141">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3141">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3142">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3142">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3143">GP 固有の名前: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3143">GP unique name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3144">GP 名: キオスクモードのパブリックブラウザーのエクスペリエンスを編集するアドレスバーを構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3144">GP name: Configure address bar editing for kiosk mode public browsing experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3145">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/キオスク モードの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3145">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3146">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3146">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3147">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3147">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3148">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3148">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3149">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3149">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3150">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3150">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3151">GP 一意の名前: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3151">Value Name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3152">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3152">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3153">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3153">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3154">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3154">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3155">設定キー名: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3155">Preference Key Name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3156">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3156">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3157">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3157">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3158">KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3158">KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3159">Microsoft Edge が閉じたときに、キオスク セッションの一部としてダウンロードされたファイルを削除する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3159">Delete files downloaded as part of kiosk session when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3160">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3160">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3161">Windows での 87 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3161">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3162">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3162">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3163">このポリシーは、Microsoft Edge キオスクモードにのみ適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3163">This policy only applies to Microsoft Edge kiosk mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3164">このポリシーを有効にすると、キオスク セッションの一部としてダウンロードされたファイルは、Microsoft Edge が閉じるたびに削除されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3164">If you enable this policy, files downloaded as part of the kiosk session are deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3165">このポリシーを無効にするか、構成しない場合、キオスク セッションの一部としてダウンロードされたファイルは、Microsoft Edge を閉じても削除されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3165">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, files downloaded as part of the kiosk session are not deleted when Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3166">キオスク モードの構成の詳細については、「[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578)」を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3166">For detailed information on configuring kiosk Mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3167">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3167">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3168">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3168">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3169">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3169">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3170">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3170">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3171">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3171">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3172">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3172">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3173">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3173">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3174">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3174">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3175">GP 固有の名前: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3175">GP unique name: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3176">GP 名: Microsoft Edge が閉じたときに、キオスク セッションの一部としてダウンロードされたファイルを削除する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3176">GP name: Delete files downloaded as part of kiosk session when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3177">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/キオスク モードの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3177">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3178">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3178">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3179">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3179">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3180">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3180">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3181">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3181">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3182">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3182">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3183">値の名前: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3183">Value Name: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3184">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3184">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3185">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3185">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3186">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3186">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ## <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3187">ネイティブ メッセージングに関するポリシー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3187">Native Messaging policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3188">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3188">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3189">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3189">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3190">ユーザーが使用できるネイティブ メッセージング ホストを制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3190">Control which native messaging hosts users can use</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3191">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3191">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3192">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3192">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3193">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3193">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3194">ポリシーを設定すると、拒否リストの対象とされないネイティブ メッセージング ホストが指定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3194">Setting the policy specifies which native messaging hosts aren't subject to the deny list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3195">拒否リストの値 \* は、明示的に許可されていない限り、すべてのネイティブ メッセージング ホストが拒否されるという意味です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3195">A deny list value of \* means all native messaging hosts are denied unless they're explicitly allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3196">既定では、すべてのネイティブ メッセージング ホストが許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3196">All native messaging hosts are allowed by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3197">ただし、ネイティブ メッセージング ホストがポリシーによって拒否された場合、管理者は許可リストを使用してそのポリシーを変更できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3197">However, if a native messaging host is denied by policy, the admin can use the allow list to change that policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3198">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3198">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3199">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3199">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3200">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3200">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3201">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3201">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3202">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3202">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3203">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3203">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3204">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3204">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3205">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3205">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3206">GP 固有の名前: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3206">GP unique name: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3207">GP 名: ユーザーが使用できるネイティブ メッセージング ホストを制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3207">GP name: Control which native messaging hosts users can use</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3208">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/ネイティブ メッセージング</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3208">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3209">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3209">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3210">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3210">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3211">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3211">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3212">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3212">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3213">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3213">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3214">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3214">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3215">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3215">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3216">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3216">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist\1 = "com.native.messaging.host.name1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist\2 = "com.native.messaging.host.name2"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3217">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3217">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3218">基本設定キーの名前: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3218">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3219">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3219">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name1</string>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3220">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3220">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3221">NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3221">NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3222">ネイティブ メッセージング ブロック リストを構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3222">Configure native messaging block list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3223">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3223">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3224">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3224">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3225">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3225">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3226">このポリシーを設定すると、読み込まれてはならないネイティブ メッセージング ホストが指定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3226">Setting this policy specifies which native messaging hosts shouldn't be loaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3227">拒否リストの値 \* は、明示的に許可されていない限り、すべてのネイティブ メッセージング ホストが拒否されるという意味です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3227">A deny list value of \* means all native messaging hosts are denied unless they're explicitly allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3228">このポリシーを未設定のままにすると、Microsoft Edge はインストール済みのすべてのネイティブ メッセージング ホストを読み込みます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3228">If you leave this policy unset , Microsoft Edge loads all installed native messaging hosts.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3229">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3229">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3230">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3230">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3231">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3231">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3232">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3232">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3233">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3233">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3234">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3234">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3235">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3235">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3236">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3236">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3237">GP 固有の名前: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3237">GP unique name: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3238">GP 名: ネイティブ メッセージング ブロック リストを構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3238">GP name: Configure native messaging block list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3239">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/ネイティブ メッセージング</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3239">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3240">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3240">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3241">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3241">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3242">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3242">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3243">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3243">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3244">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3244">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3245">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3245">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3246">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3246">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3247">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3247">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist\1 = "com.native.messaging.host.name1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist\2 = "com.native.messaging.host.name2"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3248">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3248">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3249">基本設定キーの名前: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3249">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3250">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3250">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name1</string>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3251">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3251">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3252">NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3252">NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3253">(管理者のアクセス許可なしでインストールされた) ユーザー レベルのネイティブ メッセージング ホストを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3253">Allow user-level native messaging hosts (installed without admin permissions)</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3254">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3254">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3255">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3255">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3256">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3256">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3257">このポリシーを [有効] に設定した場合、または未設定のままにした場合、Microsoft Edge では、ユーザー レベルでインストールされているネイティブ メッセージング ホストを使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3257">If you set this policy to Enabled or leave it unset, Microsoft Edge can use native messaging hosts installed at the user level.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3258">このポリシーを無効に設定した場合、Microsoft Edge は、システム レベルでインストールされている場合にのみ、これらのホストを使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3258">If you set this policy to Disabled, Microsoft Edge can only use these hosts if they're installed at the system level.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3259">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3259">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3260">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3260">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3261">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3261">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3262">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3262">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3263">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3263">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3264">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3264">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3265">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3265">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3266">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3266">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3267">GP 固有の名前: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3267">GP unique name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3268">GP 名: (管理者のアクセス許可なしでインストールされた) ユーザー レベルのネイティブ メッセージング ホストを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3268">GP name: Allow user-level native messaging hosts (installed without admin permissions)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3269">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/ネイティブ メッセージング</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3269">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3270">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3270">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3271">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3271">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3272">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3272">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3273">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3273">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3274">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3274">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3275">値の名前: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3275">Value Name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3276">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3276">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3277">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3277">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3278">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3278">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3279">基本設定キーの名前: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3279">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-3280">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-3280">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
