  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4917">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4917">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4918">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4918">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4919">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4919">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4920">基本設定キーの名前: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4920">Preference Key Name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4921">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4921">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4922">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4922">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4923">AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4923">AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4924">ファイル選択ダイアログを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4924">Allow file selection dialogs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4925">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4925">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4926">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4926">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4927">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4927">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4928">Microsoft Edge にファイル選択ダイアログを表示し、ローカル ファイルへのアクセスを許可します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4928">Allow access to local files by letting Microsoft Edge display file selection dialogs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4929">このポリシーを有効にしているか、構成していない場合、ユーザーは通常通りにファイル選択ダイアログを開くことができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4929">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can open file selection dialogs as normal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4930">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、ユーザーがファイル選択ダイアログのトリガーとなるアクション (お気に入りのインポート、ファイルのアップロード、リンクの保存など) を実行するたびにメッセージが表示され、ユーザーはファイル選択ダイアログで [キャンセル] をクリックしたものとみなされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4930">If you disable this policy, whenever the user performs an action that triggers a file selection dialog (like importing favorites, uploading files, or saving links), a message is displayed instead, and the user is assumed to have clicked Cancel on the file selection dialog.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4931">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4931">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4932">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4932">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4933">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4933">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4934">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4934">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4935">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4935">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4936">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4936">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4937">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4937">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4938">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4938">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4939">GP 固有の名前: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4939">GP unique name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4940">GP 名: ファイル選択ダイアログを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4940">GP name: Allow file selection dialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4941">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4941">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4942">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4942">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4943">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4943">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4944">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4944">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4945">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4945">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4946">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4946">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4947">値の名前: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4947">Value Name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4948">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4948">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4949">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4949">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4950">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4950">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4951">基本設定キーの名前: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4951">Preference Key Name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4952">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4952">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4953">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4953">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4954">AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4954">AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4955">ページのアンロード中にポップアップを表示できます (廃止)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4955">Allows a page to show popups during its unloading (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4956">不使用: このポリシーは廃止されており、Microsoft Edge 87 以降は機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4956">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4957">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4957">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4958">Windows と macOS での 78 以降、87 まで</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4958">On Windows and macOS since 78, until 87</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4959">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4959">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4960">このポリシーでは、管理者は、ページのアンロード中にポップアップを表示できるように指定することができるようになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4960">This policy allows an admin to specify that a page can show popups during its unloading.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4961">このポリシーを有効に設定すると、ページのアンロード中にポップアップを表示できるようになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4961">When the policy is set to enabled, pages are allowed to show popups while they're being unloaded.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4962">このポリシーを無効に設定するか、設定しない場合、ページのアンロード中にポップアップを表示できなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4962">When the policy is set to disabled or unset, pages aren't allowed to show popups while they're being unloaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4963">これは仕様どおりです: (https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#apis-for-creating-and-navigating-browsing-contexts-by-name))。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4963">This is as per the spec: (https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#apis-for-creating-and-navigating-browsing-contexts-by-name).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4964">このポリシーは Microsoft Edge 88 で削除され、設定されている場合は無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4964">This policy was removed in Microsoft Edge 88 and is ignored if set.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4965">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4965">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4966">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4966">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4967">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4967">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4968">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4968">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4969">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4969">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4970">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4970">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4971">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4971">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4972">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4972">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4973">一意の GP 名: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4973">GP unique name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4974">GP 名: ページのアンロード中にポップアップを表示できます (廃止)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4974">GP name: Allows a page to show popups during its unloading (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4975">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4975">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4976">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4976">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4977">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4977">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4978">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4978">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4979">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4979">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4980">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4980">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4981">値の名前: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4981">Value Name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4982">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4982">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4983">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4983">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4984">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4984">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4985">基本設定キーの名前: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4985">Preference Key Name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4986">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4986">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4987">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4987">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4988">AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4988">AllowSurfGame</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4989">サーフィン ゲームを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4989">Allow surf game</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4990">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4990">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4991">Windows と macOS での 83 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4991">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4992">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4992">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4993">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、デバイスがオフラインのときや、ユーザーが edge://surf に移動したときに、ユーザーはサーフィン ゲームをプレイすることができなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4993">If you disable this policy, users won't be able to play the surf game when the device is offline or if the user navigates to edge://surf.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4994">このポリシーを有効にしているか、構成していない場合、ユーザーはサーフィン ゲームをプレイすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4994">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can play the surf game.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4995">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4995">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4996">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4996">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4997">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4997">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4998">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4998">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-4999">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-4999">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5000">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5000">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5001">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5001">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5002">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5002">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5003">GP 固有の名前: AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5003">GP unique name: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5004">GP 名: サーフィン ゲームを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5004">GP name: Allow surf game</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5005">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5005">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5006">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5006">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5007">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5007">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5008">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5008">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5009">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5009">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5010">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5010">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5011">値の名前: AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5011">Value Name: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5012">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5012">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5013">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5013">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5014">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5014">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5015">基本設定キーの名前: AllowSurfGame</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5015">Preference Key Name: AllowSurfGame</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5016">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5016">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5017">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5017">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5018">AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5018">AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5019">ページが同期 XHR 要求をページの解除中に送信できるようにする (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5019">Allow pages to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5020">非推奨: このポリシーは推奨されなくなっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5020">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5021">現在はサポートされていますが、将来のリリースで廃止されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5021">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5022">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5022">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5023">Windows と macOS での 79 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5023">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5024">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5024">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5025">このポリシーは、企業の Web コンテンツがページ解除中に XHR 要求の同期を却下する変更と互換していないことが判明した場合に、Web コンテンツの更新に時間を割くための短期のメカニズムとしてのみ機能することを目的としているため、推奨されていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5025">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with the change to disallow synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5026">Microsoft Edge バージョン 88 では機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5026">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 88.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5027">このポリシーでは、ページの解除中にページが同期 XHR 要求を送信できるように指定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5027">This policy lets you specify that a page can send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5028">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、ページは同期 XHR 要求をページの解除中に送信することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5028">If you enable this policy, pages can send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5029">このポリシーを無効にしているか、構成していない場合、ページは同期 XHR 要求をページの解除中に送信することができません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5029">If you disable this policy or don't configure this policy, pages aren't allowed to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5030">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5030">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5031">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5031">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5032">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5032">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5033">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5033">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5034">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5034">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5035">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5035">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5036">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5036">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5037">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5037">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5038">GP 固有の名前: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5038">GP unique name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5039">GP 名: ページが同期 XHR 要求をページの解除中に送信できるようにする (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5039">GP name: Allow pages to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5040">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5040">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5041">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5041">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5042">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5042">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5043">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5043">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5044">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5044">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5045">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5045">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5046">値の名前: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5046">Value Name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5047">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5047">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5048">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5048">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5049">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5049">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5050">基本設定キーの名前: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5050">Preference Key Name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5051">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5051">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5052">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5052">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5053">AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5053">AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5054">Microsoft Edge がトークンのバインドの確立を試行するサイトの一覧を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5054">Configure the list of sites for which Microsoft Edge will attempt to establish a Token Binding with</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5055">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5055">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5056">Windows での 83 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5056">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5057">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5057">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5058">ブラウザーがトークンのバインド プロトコルを実行しようと試みるサイトの URL パターンの一覧を設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5058">Configure the list of URL patterns for sites that the browser will attempt to perform the Token Binding protocol with.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5059">この一覧にあるドメインの場合、ブラウザーはトークンのバインドの ClientHello を TLS ハンドシェイクで送信します (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8472) を参照してください)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5059">For the domains on this list, the browser will send the Token Binding ClientHello in the TLS handshake (See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8472).</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5060">サーバが有効な ServerHello 応答を返した場合、ブラウザーは後続の HTTPS 要求でトークンのバインド メッセージを作成して送信します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5060">If the server responds with a valid ServerHello response, the browser will create and send Token Binding messages on subsequent https requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5061">詳細については、「https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8471」を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5061">See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8471 for more info.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5062">この一覧が空の場合、トークンのバインドは無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5062">If this list is empty, Token Binding will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5063">このポリシーは、仮想保護モード機能を備えた Windows 10 デバイスでのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5063">This policy is only available on Windows 10 devices with Virtual Secure Mode capability.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5064">Microsoft Edge 86 以降、このポリシーでは動的更新はサポートされなくなりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5064">Starting in Microsoft Edge 86, this policy no longer supports dynamic refresh.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5065">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5065">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5066">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5066">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5067">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5067">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5068">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5068">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5069">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5069">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5070">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5070">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5071">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5071">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5072">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5072">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5073">GP 固有の名前: AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5073">GP unique name: AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5074">GP 名: Microsoft Edge がトークンのバインドの確立を試行するサイトの一覧を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5074">GP name: Configure the list of sites for which Microsoft Edge will attempt to establish a Token Binding with</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5075">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5075">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5076">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5076">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5077">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5077">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5078">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5078">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5079">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5079">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5080">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5080">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5081">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5081">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5082">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5082">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5083">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5083">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\1 = "mydomain.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\2 = "[*.]mydomain2.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\3 = "[*.].mydomain2.com"

```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5084">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5084">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5085">AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5085">AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5086">特定のサイトの追跡防止の例外を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5086">Configure tracking prevention exceptions for specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5087">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5087">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5088">Windows と macOS での 78 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5088">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5089">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5089">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5090">追跡防止の対象外となる URL パターンの一覧を構成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5090">Configure the list of URL patterns that are excluded from tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5091">このポリシーを構成している場合、構成した URL パターンの一覧は追跡防止の対象外となります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5091">If you configure this policy, the list of configured URL patterns is excluded from tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5092">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーの個人用の構成、または "ユーザーの Web 閲覧アクティビティの追跡のブロック" ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5092">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the "Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity" policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5093">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5093">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5094">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5094">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5095">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5095">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5096">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5096">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5097">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5097">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5098">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5098">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5099">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5099">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5100">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5100">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5101">GP 固有の名前: AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5101">GP unique name: AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5102">GP 名: 特定のサイトの追跡防止の例外を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5102">GP name: Configure tracking prevention exceptions for specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5103">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5103">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5104">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5104">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5105">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5105">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5106">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5106">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5107">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5107">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5108">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5108">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5109">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5109">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5110">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5110">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5111">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5111">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5112">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5112">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5113">基本設定キーの名前: AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5113">Preference Key Name: AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5114">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5114">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5115">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5115">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5116">AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5116">AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5117">Web ページが見つからない場合に、似通ったページを候補として表示する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5117">Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5118">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5118">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5119">Windows と macOS での 80 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5119">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5120">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5120">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5121">Microsoft Edge が Webサービスへの接続を発行し、DNS エラーなどの接続に関する問題に対する URL や検索候補を生成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5121">Allow Microsoft Edge to issue a connection to a web service to generate URL and search suggestions for connectivity issues such as DNS errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5122">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、Web サービスを使用してネットワーク エラーに関する URL や検索候補が生成されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5122">If you enable this policy, a web service is used to generate url and search suggestions for network errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5123">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、Web サービスの呼び出しは行われず、標準のエラー ページが表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5123">If you disable this policy, no calls to the web service are made and a standard error page is shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5124">このポリシーを構成していない場合、Microsoft Edge は、edge://settings/privacy のサービスで設定されているユーザー設定を尊重します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5124">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge respects the user preference that's set under Services at edge://settings/privacy.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5125">具体的には、[**Web ページが見つからない場合に、似通ったページを候補として表示する**] トグルがあり、ユーザーはこれをオンまたはオフに切り替えることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5125">Specifically, there's a **Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found** toggle, which the user can switch on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5126">このポリシー (AlternateErrorPagesEnabled) を有効にしている場合、[Web ページが見つからない場合に、似通ったページを候補として表示する] 設定はオンになっていますが、ユーザーがトグルを使用して設定を変更することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5126">Note that if you have enable this policy (AlternateErrorPagesEnabled), the Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found setting is turned on, but the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5127">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、[Web ページが見つからない場合に、似通ったページを候補として表示する] 設定はオフになっており、ユーザーがトグルを使用して設定を変更することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5127">If you disable this policy, the Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found setting is turned off, and the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5128">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5128">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5129">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5129">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5130">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5130">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5131">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5131">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5132">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5132">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5133">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5133">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5134">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5134">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5135">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5135">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5136">GP 固有の名前: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5136">GP unique name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5137">GP 名: Web ページが見つからない場合に、似通ったページを候補として表示する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5137">GP name: Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5138">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5138">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5139">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5139">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5140">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5140">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5141">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5141">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5142">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5142">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5143">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5143">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5144">値の名前: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5144">Value Name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5145">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5145">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5146">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5146">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5147">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5147">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5148">基本設定キーの名前: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5148">Preference Key Name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5149">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5149">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5150">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5150">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5151">AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5151">AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5152">常に PDF ファイルを外部で開く</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5152">Always open PDF files externally</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5153">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5153">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5154">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5154">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5155">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5155">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5156">Microsoft Edge の内部 PDF ビューアーを無効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5156">Disables the internal PDF viewer in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5157">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、Microsoft Edge では PDF ファイルはダウンロードとして扱われ、ユーザーは既定のアプリケーションを使用して PDF ファイルを開くことができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5157">If you enable this policy Microsoft Edge treats PDF files as downloads and lets users open them with the default application.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5158">このポリシーを構成してしないか、無効にしている場合、Microsoft Edge は (ユーザーが無効にしない限り) PDF ファイルを開きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5158">If you don't configure this policy or disable it, Microsoft Edge will open PDF files (unless the user disables it).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5159">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5159">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5160">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5160">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5161">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5161">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5162">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5162">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5163">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5163">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5164">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5164">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5165">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5165">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5166">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5166">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5167">GP 固有の名前: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5167">GP unique name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5168">GP 名: 常に PDF ファイルを外部で開く</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5168">GP name: Always open PDF files externally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5169">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5169">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5170">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5170">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5171">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5171">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5172">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5172">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5173">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5173">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5174">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5174">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5175">値の名前: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5175">Value Name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5176">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5176">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5177">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5177">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5178">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5178">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5179">基本設定キーの名前: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5179">Preference Key Name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5180">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5180">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5181">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5181">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5182">AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5182">AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5183">InPrivate プロファイルとゲスト プロファイルに対してアンビエント認証を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5183">Enable Ambient Authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5184">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5184">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5185">Windows と macOS での 81 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5185">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5186">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5186">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5187">このポリシーを設定すると、Microsoft Edge の InPrivate プロファイルとゲスト プロファイルのアンビエント認証を許可または禁止することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5187">Configure this policy to allow/disallow ambient authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5188">アンビエント認証は、NTLM/Kerberos/ネゴシエート チャレンジ/応答などのスキームを介して明示的な資格情報が提供されていない場合に、既定の資格情報を使用して HTTP 認証を行うものです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5188">Ambient Authentication is http authentication with default credentials when explicit credentials aren't provided via NTLM/Kerberos/Negotiate challenge/response schemes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5189">ポリシーを [RegularOnly] に設定している場合、標準のセッションのみでアンビエント認証が許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5189">If you set the policy to 'RegularOnly', it allows ambient authentication for Regular sessions only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5190">InPrivate セッションとゲスト セッションでは、アンビエント認証は許可されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5190">InPrivate and Guest sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5191">ポリシーを [InPrivateAndRegular] に設定している場合、InPrivate セッションと標準のセッションでアンビエント認証が許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5191">If you set the policy to 'InPrivateAndRegular', it allows ambient authentication for InPrivate and Regular sessions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5192">ゲスト セッションでは、アンビエント認証は許可されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5192">Guest sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5193">ポリシーを [GuestAndRegular] に設定している場合、ゲスト セッションと標準のセッションでアンビエント認証が許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5193">If you set the policy to 'GuestAndRegular', it allows ambient authentication for Guest and Regular sessions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5194">InPrivate セッションでは、アンビエント認証は許可されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5194">InPrivate sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5195">ポリシーを [All] に設定している場合、すべてのセッションでアンビエント認証が許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5195">If you set the policy to 'All', it allows ambient authentication for all sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5196">通常のプロファイルでは、アンビエント認証は常に許可されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5196">Note that ambient authentication is always allowed on regular profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5197">Microsoft Edge のバージョン 81 以降では、ポリシーを設定しないままにしておくと、通常のセッションでのみアンビエント認証が有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5197">In Microsoft Edge version 81 and later, if the policy is left not set, ambient authentication will be enabled in regular sessions only.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5198">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5198">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5199">RegularOnly (0) = 通常のセッションでのみアンビエント認証を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5199">RegularOnly (0) = Enable ambient authentication in regular sessions only</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5200">InPrivateAndRegular (1) = InPrivate セッションと通常のセッションでアンビエント認証を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5200">InPrivateAndRegular (1) = Enable ambient authentication in InPrivate and regular sessions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5201">GuestAndRegular (2) = ゲスト セッションと通常のセッションでアンビエント認証を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5201">GuestAndRegular (2) = Enable ambient authentication in guest and regular sessions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5202">All (3) = 通常のセッション、InPrivate セッション、ゲスト セッションでアンビエント認証を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5202">All (3) = Enable ambient authentication in regular, InPrivate and guest sessions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5203">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5203">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5204">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5204">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5205">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5205">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5206">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5206">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5207">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5207">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5208">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5208">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5209">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5209">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5210">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5210">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5211">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5211">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5212">GP 固有の名前: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5212">GP unique name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5213">GP 名: InPrivate プロファイルとゲスト プロファイルに対してアンビエント認証を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5213">GP name: Enable Ambient Authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5214">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5214">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5215">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5215">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5216">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5216">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5217">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5217">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5218">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5218">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5219">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5219">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5220">値の名前: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5220">Value Name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5221">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5221">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5222">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5222">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5223">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5223">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5224">基本設定キーの名前: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5224">Preference Key Name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5225">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5225">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5226">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5226">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5227">AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5227">AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5228">既定でオフになっている場合でも、App Cache 機能を再度有効にすることを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5228">Allows the AppCache feature to be re-enabled, even if it's turned off by default</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5229">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5229">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5230">Windows と macOS での 84 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5230">On Windows and macOS since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5231">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5231">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5232">このポリシーを true に設定すると、Microsoft Edge の AppCache が既定で利用できない場合でも、AppCache が有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5232">If you set this policy to true, the AppCache is enabled, even when AppCache in Microsoft Edge is not available by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5233">このポリシーを false に設定した場合、または設定しなかった場合、AppCache は Microsoft Edge の既定値に従います。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5233">If you set this policy to false, or don't set it, AppCache will follow Microsoft Edge's defaults.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5234">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5234">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5235">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5235">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5236">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5236">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5237">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5237">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5238">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5238">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5239">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5239">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5240">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5240">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5241">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5241">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5242">GP 固有の名前: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5242">GP unique name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5243">GP 名: 既定でオフになっている場合でも、App Cache 機能を再度有効にすることを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5243">GP name: Allows the AppCache feature to be re-enabled, even if it's turned off by default</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5244">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5244">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5245">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5245">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5246">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5246">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5247">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5247">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5248">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5248">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5249">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5249">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5250">値の名前: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5250">Value Name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5251">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5251">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5252">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5252">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5253">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5253">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5254">基本設定キーの名前: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5254">Preference Key Name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5255">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5255">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5256">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5256">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5257">ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5257">ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5258">アプリケーション ロケールを設定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5258">Set application locale</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5259">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5259">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5260">Windows での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5260">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5261">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5261">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5262">Microsoft Edge でアプリケーション ロケールを構成し、ユーザーがロケールを変更できないようにします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5262">Configures the application locale in Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing the locale.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5263">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、Microsoft Edge は指定されたロケールを使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5263">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the specified locale.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5264">構成されたロケールがサポートされていない場合、代わりに "en-US" が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5264">If the configured locale isn't supported, 'en-US' is used instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5265">この設定を無効にしているか、構成していない場合、Microsoft Edge では、ユーザーが指定した優先ロケール (設定されている場合) か、フォールバック ロケールである "en-US" のいずれかが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5265">If you disable or don't configure this setting, Microsoft Edge uses either the user-specified preferred locale (if configured) or the fallback locale 'en-US'.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5266">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5266">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5267">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5267">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5268">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5268">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5269">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5269">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5270">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5270">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5271">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5271">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5272">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5272">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5273">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5273">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5274">GP 固有の名前: ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5274">GP unique name: ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5275">GP 名: アプリケーション ロケールを設定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5275">GP name: Set application locale</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5276">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5276">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5277">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5277">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5278">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5278">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5279">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5279">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5280">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5280">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5281">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5281">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5282">値の名前: ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5282">Value Name: ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5283">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5283">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5284">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5284">Example value:</span></span>

```
"en"
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5285">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5285">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5286">AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5286">AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5287">オーディオ キャプチャの許可またはブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5287">Allow or block audio capture</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5288">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5288">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5289">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5289">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5290">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5290">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5291">Web サイトへのアクセス権をオーディオ キャプチャ デバイスに付与するためのメッセージをユーザーに表示するかどうかを設定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5291">Allows you to set whether a user is prompted to grant a website access to their audio capture device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5292">このポリシーは、[AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) 一覧で構成されたものを除くすべての URL に適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5292">This policy applies to all URLs except for those configured in the [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5293">このポリシーを有効にしているか、構成していない場合 (既定の設定)、[AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) 一覧の URL 以外のオーディオ キャプチャへのアクセスに対して、確認を求めるメッセージが表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5293">If you enable this policy or don't configure it (the default setting), the user is prompted for audio capture access except from the URLs in the [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5294">一覧に記載されている URL については、確認のメッセージなしでアクセス許可が付与されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5294">These listed URLs are granted access without prompting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5295">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、ユーザーに確認を求めるメッセージは表示されず、オーディオ キャプチャは [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) で構成されている URL に対してのみアクセスが許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5295">If you disable this policy, the user is not prompted, and audio capture is accessible only to the URLs configured in [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5296">このポリシーは内蔵マイクだけでなく、あらゆる種類の音声入力に影響します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5296">This policy affects all types of audio inputs, not only the built-in microphone.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5297">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5297">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5298">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5298">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5299">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5299">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5300">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5300">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5301">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5301">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5302">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5302">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5303">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5303">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5304">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5304">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5305">GP 固有の名前: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5305">GP unique name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5306">GP 名: オーディオ キャプチャの許可またはブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5306">GP name: Allow or block audio capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5307">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5307">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5308">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5308">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5309">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5309">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5310">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5310">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5311">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5311">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5312">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5312">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5313">値の名前: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5313">Value Name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5314">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5314">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5315">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5315">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5316">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5316">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5317">基本設定キーの名前: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5317">Preference Key Name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5318">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5318">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5319">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5319">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5320">AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5320">AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5321">アクセス許可を要求することなくオーディオ キャプチャ デバイスにアクセスできるサイト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5321">Sites that can access audio capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5322">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5322">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5323">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5323">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5324">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5324">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5325">URL パターンに基づいて、ユーザーにアクセス許可を求めずにオーディオ キャプチャ デバイスを使用することができる Web サイトを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5325">Specify websites, based on URL patterns, that can use audio capture devices without asking the user for permission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5326">この一覧のパターンは、要求 URL のセキュリティ オリジンと照合されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5326">Patterns in this list are matched against the security origin of the requesting URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5327">それらが一致する場合、サイトには自動的にオーディオ キャプチャ デバイスへのアクセス許可が付与されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5327">If they match, the site is automatically granted access to audio capture devices.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5328">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5328">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5329">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5329">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5330">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5330">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5331">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5331">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5332">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5332">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5333">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5333">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5334">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5334">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5335">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5335">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5336">GP 固有の名前:: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5336">GP unique name: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5337">GP 名: アクセス許可を要求することなくオーディオ キャプチャ デバイスにアクセスできるサイト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5337">GP name: Sites that can access audio capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5338">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5338">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5339">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5339">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5340">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5340">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5341">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5341">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5342">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5342">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5343">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5343">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5344">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5344">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-5345">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-5345">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>
