  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7775">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7775">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7776">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7776">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7777">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7777">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7778">GP 固有の名前: ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7778">GP unique name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7779">GP 名: Bing セーフサーチを強制する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7779">GP name: Enforce Bing SafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7780">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7780">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7781">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7781">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7782">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7782">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7783">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7783">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7784">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7784">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7785">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7785">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7786">値の名前: ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7786">Value Name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7787">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7787">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7788">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7788">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7789">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7789">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7790">基本設定キーの名前: ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7790">Preference Key Name: ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7791">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7791">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7792">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7792">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7793">ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7793">ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7794">"AutoSelectCertificateForUrls" が構成されているサイトに対して複数の証明書が一致する場合、Microsoft Edge が自動的に証明書を選択するかどうかを構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7794">Configure whether Microsoft Edge should automatically select a certificate when there are multiple certificate matches for a site configured with "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7795">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7795">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7796">Windows と macOS での 81 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7796">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7797">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7797">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7798">複数の証明書が利用可能で、サイトに [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) が構成されている場合に、ユーザーに証明書の選択を確認するメッセージを表示するかどうかを切り替えます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7798">Toggles whether users are prompted to select a certificate if there are multiple certificates available and a site is configured with [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7799">サイトに対して [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) を構成していない場合、ユーザーには常に証明書の選択を求めるメッセージが表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7799">If you don't configure [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) for a site, the user will always be prompted to select a certificate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7800">このポリシーを true に設定している場合、Microsoft Edge は、証明書が複数ある場合にのみ、[AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) で定義されている一覧にあるサイトの証明書の選択を求めるメッセージをユーザーに表示します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7800">If you set this policy to True, Microsoft Edge will prompt a user to select a certificate for sites on the list defined in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) if and only if there is more than one certificate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7801">このポリシーを false に設定しているか、構成していない場合、一致する証明書が複数が見つかったとしても、Microsoft Edge は証明書を自動的に選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7801">If you set this policy to False or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will automatically select a certificate even if there are multiple matches for a certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7802">ユーザーには、[AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) で定義されている一覧のサイトの証明書を選択するよう求めるメッセージは表示されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7802">The user will not be prompted to select a certificate for sites on the list defined in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7803">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7803">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7804">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7804">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7805">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7805">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7806">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7806">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7807">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7807">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7808">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7808">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7809">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7809">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7810">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7810">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7811">GP 固有の名前: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7811">GP unique name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7812">GP 名: "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls" が構成されているサイトに対して複数の証明書が一致する場合、Microsoft Edge が自動的に証明書を選択するかどうかを構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7812">GP name: Configure whether Microsoft Edge should automatically select a certificate when there are multiple certificate matches for a site configured with "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7813">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7813">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7814">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7814">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7815">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7815">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7816">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7816">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7817">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7817">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7818">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7818">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7819">値の名前: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7819">Value Name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7820">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7820">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7821">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7821">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7822">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7822">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7823">基本設定キーの名前: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7823">Preference Key Name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7824">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7824">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7825">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7825">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7826">ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7826">ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7827">短期プロファイルの使用を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7827">Enable use of ephemeral profiles</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7828">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7828">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7829">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7829">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7830">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7830">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7831">ユーザー プロファイルを短期モードに切り替えるかどうかを制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7831">Controls whether user profiles are switched to ephemeral mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7832">短期プロファイルはセッションの開始時に作成され、セッションの終了時に削除され、ユーザーの元のプロファイルに関連付けられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7832">An ephemeral profile is created when a session begins, is deleted when the session ends, and is associated with the user's original profile.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7833">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、プロファイルは短期モードで実行されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7833">If you enable this policy, profiles run in ephemeral mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7834">これにより、ユーザーは閲覧データを自分のデバイスに保存せずに、それらのデバイスから作業を行うことができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7834">This lets users work from their own devices without saving browsing data to those devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7835">このポリシーを OS ポリシーとして有効にすると (たとえば、Windows で GPO を使用するなど)、システム上のすべてのプロファイルに適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7835">If you enable this policy as an OS policy (by using GPO on Windows, for example), it applies to every profile on the system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7836">このポリシーを無効にしているか、構成していない場合、ユーザーはブラウザーにサインインしたときに通常のプロファイルを取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7836">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, users get their regular profiles when they sign in to the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7837">短期モードでは、プロファイルのデータはユーザー セッションの長さのみがディスクに保存されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7837">In ephemeral mode, profile data is saved on disk only for the length of the user session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7838">ブラウザーの履歴、拡張機能とそのデータ、Cookie などの Web データ、Web データベースなどの機能は、ブラウザーを閉じた後には保存されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7838">Features like browser history, extensions and their data, web data like cookies, and web databases aren't saved after the browser is closed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7839">これは、ユーザが手動でディスクにデータをダウンロードしたり、ページを保存したり印刷したりすることを防止するものではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7839">This doesn't prevent a user from manually downloading any data to disk, or from saving pages or printing them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7840">ユーザーが同期を有効にしている場合、通常のプロファイルと同様に、すべてのデータがユーザーの同期アカウントに保存されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7840">If the user has enabled sync, all data is preserved in their sync accounts just like with regular profiles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7841">明示的に無効にしない限り、ユーザーが短期モードで InPrivate ブラウズを使用することも可能です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7841">Users can also use InPrivate browsing in ephemeral mode unless you explicitly disable this.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7842">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7842">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7843">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7843">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7844">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7844">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7845">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7845">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7846">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7846">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7847">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7847">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7848">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7848">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7849">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7849">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7850">GP 固有の名前: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7850">GP unique name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7851">GP 名: 短期プロファイルの使用を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7851">GP name: Enable use of ephemeral profiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7852">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7852">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7853">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7853">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7854">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7854">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7855">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7855">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7856">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7856">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7857">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7857">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7858">値の名前: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7858">Value Name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7859">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7859">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7860">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7860">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7861">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7861">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7862">基本設定キーの名前: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7862">Preference Key Name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7863">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7863">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7864">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7864">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7865">ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7865">ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7866">Google セーフサーチを強制する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7866">Enforce Google SafeSearch</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7867">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7867">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7868">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7868">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7869">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7869">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7870">強制的に Google Web 検索のクエリをセーフサーチをアクティブに設定した状態で実行し、ユーザーがこの設定を変更できないようにします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7870">Forces queries in Google Web Search to be performed with SafeSearch set to active, and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7871">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、Google 検索のセーフサーチは常にアクティブになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7871">If you enable this policy, SafeSearch in Google Search is always active.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7872">このポリシーを無効にしているか、構成していない場合、Google 検索でのセーフサーチは強制されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7872">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, SafeSearch in Google Search isn't enforced.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7873">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7873">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7874">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7874">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7875">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7875">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7876">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7876">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7877">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7877">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7878">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7878">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7879">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7879">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7880">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7880">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7881">GP 固有の名前: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7881">GP unique name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7882">GP 名: Google セーフサーチを強制する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7882">GP name: Enforce Google SafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7883">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7883">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7884">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7884">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7885">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7885">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7886">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7886">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7887">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7887">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7888">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7888">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7889">値の名前: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7889">Value Name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7890">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7890">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7891">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7891">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7892">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7892">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7893">基本設定キーの名前: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7893">Preference Key Name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7894">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7894">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7895">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7895">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7896">ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7896">ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7897">参照元がダウングレードされていない場合の既定の参照元ポリシーを使用する (廃止)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7897">Use a default referrer policy of no-referrer-when-downgrade (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7898">不使用: このポリシーは廃止されており、Microsoft Edge 88 以降は機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7898">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7899">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7899">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7900">Windows と macOS での 81 以降、88 まで</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7900">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 88</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7901">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7901">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7902">このポリシーは、企業の Web コンテンツが新しい既定の参照元ポリシーと互換していないことが判明した場合に、Web コンテンツの更新に時間を割くための短期のメカニズムとしてのみ機能することを目的としているため、機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7902">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if it was found to be incompatible with the new default referrer policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7903">Microsoft Edge の既定の参照元ポリシーは、no-referrer-when-downgrade の値から、より安全性の高い strict-origin-when-cross-origin に強化されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7903">Microsoft Edge's default referrer policy was strengthened from the value of no-referrer-when-downgrade to the more secure strict-origin-when-cross-origin.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7904">このエンタープライズ ポリシーを有効にすると、Microsoft Edge の既定の参照元ポリシーは、以前の値である no-referrer-when-downgrade に設定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7904">When this enterprise policy is enabled, Microsoft Edge's default referrer policy will be set to its old value of no-referrer-when-downgrade.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7905">このエンタープライズ ポリシーは、既定では無効になっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7905">This enterprise policy is disabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7906">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7906">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7907">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7907">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7908">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7908">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7909">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7909">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7910">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7910">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7911">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7911">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7912">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7912">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7913">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7913">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7914">一意の GP 名: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7914">GP unique name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7915">GP 名: no-referrer-when-downgrade の既定の参照元ポリシーを使用する (廃止)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7915">GP name: Use a default referrer policy of no-referrer-when-downgrade (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7916">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7916">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7917">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7917">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7918">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7918">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7919">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7919">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7920">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7920">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7921">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7921">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7922">値の名前: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7922">Value Name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7923">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7923">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7924">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7924">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7925">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7925">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7926">基本設定キーの名前: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7926">Preference Key Name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7927">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7927">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7928">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7928">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7929">ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7929">ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7930">ブラウザー プロセスでネットワーク コードを強制的に実行する (不使用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7930">Force networking code to run in the browser process (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7931">不使用: このポリシーは廃止されており、Microsoft Edge 83 以降は機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7931">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 83.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7932">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7932">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7933">Windows での 78 以降 83 まで</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7933">On Windows since 78, until 83</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7934">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7934">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7935">このポリシーは、企業に対する Networking API のフックに依存しないサードパーティ製ソフトウェアへの移行の機会を提供する時間を割くための短期メカニズムとして機能することを目的としていたため、機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7935">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to migrate to 3rd party software that doesn't depend on hooking networking APIs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7936">LSP や Win32 API の修正よりも、プロキシ サーバーの使用をお勧めします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7936">Proxy servers are recommended over LSPs and Win32 API patching.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7937">このポリシーは、ブラウザー プロセスでネットワーク コードを強制的に実行します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7937">This policy forces networking code to run in the browser process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7938">このポリシーは、既定では無効になっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7938">This policy is disabled by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7939">有効にしている場合、ネットワーキング プロセスがサンドボックス内で動作しているときに、ユーザーはセキュリティの問題にさらされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7939">If enabled, users are open to security issues when the networking process is sandboxed.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7940">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7940">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7941">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7941">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7942">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7942">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7943">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7943">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7944">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7944">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7945">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7945">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7946">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7946">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7947">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7947">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7948">GP 固有の名前: ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7948">GP unique name: ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7949">GP 名: ブラウザー プロセスでネットワーク コードを強制的に実行する (不使用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7949">GP name: Force networking code to run in the browser process (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7950">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7950">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7951">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7951">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7952">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7952">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7953">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7953">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7954">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7954">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7955">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7955">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7956">値の名前: ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7956">Value Name: ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7957">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7957">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7958">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7958">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7959">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7959">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7960">ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7960">ForceSync</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7961">ブラウザーのデータを強制的に同期し、同期の同意プロンプトを表示しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7961">Force synchronization of browser data and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7962">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7962">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7963">Windows と macOS での 86 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7963">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7964">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7964">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7965">Microsoft Edge でのデータを強制的に同期します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7965">Forces data synchronization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7966">このポリシーでは、ユーザーも同期をオフにすることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7966">This policy also prevents the user from turning sync off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7967">このポリシーを構成しない場合、ユーザーは同期をオンまたはオフにすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7967">If you don't configure this policy, users will be able to turn sync on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7968">このポリシーを有効にした場合、ユーザーは同期をオフにすることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7968">If you enable this policy, users will not be able to turn sync off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7969">このポリシーが意図したとおりに動作するためには、 [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) ポリシーが構成されていないか、または有効に設定する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7969">For this policy to work as intended, [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy must not be configured, or must be set to enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7970">[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) が無効に設定されている場合、[ForceSync](#forcesync) は有効になりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7970">If [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) is set to disabled, then [ForceSync](#forcesync) will not take affect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7971">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)を構成することはできません。または False に設定する必要があります。 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7971">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) must not be configured or must be set to False.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7972">この設定が True に設定されている場合、 [ForceSync](#forcesync) は有効になりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7972">If this is set to True, [ForceSync](#forcesync) will not take affect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7973">0 = 自動的に同期が開始されず、同期の同意が表示されない(既定) 1 = Azure AD/Azure AD-Degradedユーザープロファイルに対して強制的に同期を有効にする-同期の同意のプロンプトが表示されない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7973">0 = Do not automatically start sync and show the sync consent (default) 1 = Force sync to be turned on for Azure AD/Azure AD-Degraded user profile and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7974">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7974">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7975">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7975">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7976">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7976">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7977">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7977">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7978">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7978">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7979">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7979">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7980">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7980">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7981">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7981">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7982">GP 固有の名前: ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7982">GP unique name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7983">GP 名: ブラウザーデータを強制的に同期し、同期の同意のプロンプトを表示しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7983">GP name: Force synchronization of browser data and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7984">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7984">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7985">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7985">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7986">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7986">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7987">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7987">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7988">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7988">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7989">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7989">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7990">値の名前: ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7990">Value Name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7991">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7991">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7992">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7992">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7993">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7993">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7994">基本設定キーの名前: ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7994">Preference Key Name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7995">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7995">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7996">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7996">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7997">ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7997">ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7998">最小限の YouTube 制限モードを強制的に実行する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7998">Force minimum YouTube Restricted Mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-7999">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-7999">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8000">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8000">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8001">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8001">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8002">YouTube で最小限の制限モードを強制し、ユーザーがより制限少ないモードを選択することを防止します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8002">Enforces a minimum Restricted Mode on YouTube and prevents users from picking a less restricted mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8003">[厳密] に設定すると、YouTube で 厳密な制限モードを強制します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8003">Set to 'Strict' to enforce Strict Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8004">[標準] に設定すると、標準の制限モードと厳密な制限モードのみを YouTube で使用するようユーザーに強制します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8004">Set to 'Moderate' to enforce the user to only use Moderate Restricted Mode and Strict Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8005">ユーザーが制限モードを無効にすることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8005">They can't disable Restricted Mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8006">[オフ] に設定するか、このポリシーを構成しない場合、YouTube での制限モードを強制しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8006">Set to 'Off' or don't configure this policy to not enforce Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8007">YouTube ポリシーのような外部のポリシーによって、制限モードが強制される可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8007">External policies such as YouTube policies might still enforce Restricted Mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8008">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8008">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8009">オフ (0) = YouTube で制限モードを強制しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8009">Off (0) = Do not enforce Restricted Mode on YouTube</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8010">標準 (1) = YouTube で、少なくとも標準の制限モードを強制する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8010">Moderate (1) = Enforce at least Moderate Restricted Mode on YouTube</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8011">厳密 (2) = YouTube で厳密な制限モードを強制する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8011">Strict (2) = Enforce Strict Restricted Mode for YouTube</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8012">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8012">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8013">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8013">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8014">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8014">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8015">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8015">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8016">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8016">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8017">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8017">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8018">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8018">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8019">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8019">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8020">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8020">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8021">GP 固有の名前: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8021">GP unique name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8022">GP 名: 最小限の YouTube 制限モードを強制的に実行する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8022">GP name: Force minimum YouTube Restricted Mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8023">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8023">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8024">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8024">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8025">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8025">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8026">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8026">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8027">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8027">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8028">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8028">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8029">値の名前: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8029">Value Name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8030">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8030">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8031">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8031">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8032">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8032">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8033">基本設定キーの名前: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8033">Preference Key Name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8034">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8034">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8035">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8035">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8036">FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8036">FullscreenAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8037">全画面表示モードを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8037">Allow full screen mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8038">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8038">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8039">Windows での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8039">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8040">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8040">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8041">全画面表示モードの可用性を設定します。すべての Microsoft Edge UI が非表示になり、Web コンテンツのみが表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8041">Set the availability of full screen mode - all Microsoft Edge UI is hidden and only web content is visible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8042">このポリシーを有効にしているか、構成していない場合、適切なアクセス許可を持っているユーザー、アプリ、拡張機能が全画面表示モードを開始することができるようになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8042">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the user, apps, and extensions with appropriate permissions can enter full screen mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8043">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、ユーザー、アプリ、拡張機能が全画面表示モードを開始することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8043">If you disable this policy, users, apps, and extensions can't enter full screen mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8044">全画面表示モードを無効にしている場合、コマンドラインを使用したキオスク モードで Microsoft Edge を開くことはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8044">Opening Microsoft Edge in kiosk mode using the command line is unavailable when full screen mode is disabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8045">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8045">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8046">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8046">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8047">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8047">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8048">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8048">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8049">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8049">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8050">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8050">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8051">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8051">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8052">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8052">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8053">GP 固有の名前: FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8053">GP unique name: FullscreenAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8054">GP 名: 全画面表示モードを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8054">GP name: Allow full screen mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8055">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8055">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8056">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8056">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8057">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8057">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8058">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8058">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8059">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8059">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8060">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8060">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8061">値の名前: FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8061">Value Name: FullscreenAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8062">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8062">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8063">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8063">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8064">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8064">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8065">GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8065">GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8066">グローバルにスコープが設定された HTTP 認証キャッシュを有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8066">Enable globally scoped HTTP auth cache</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8067">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8067">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8068">Windows と macOS での 81 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8068">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8069">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8069">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8070">このポリシーでは、HTTP サーバー認証の資格情報を使用して、プロファイルごとに単一のグローバル キャッシュを構成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8070">This policy configures a single global per profile cache with HTTP server authentication credentials.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8071">このポリシーを無効にしているか、設定していない場合、ブラウザーはクロスサイト認証の既定の動作を使用します。バージョン 80 の時点では、この動作により、トップレベル サイトによる HTTP サーバー認証の資格情報がスコープに含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8071">If you disable or don't set this policy, the browser will use the default behavior of cross-site auth, which as of version 80, will be to scope HTTP server authentication credentials by top-level site.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8072">そのため、同じ認証ドメインからのリソースを 2 つのサイトが使用している場合、資格情報は両方のサイトのコンテキストで個別に提供される必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8072">So, if two sites use resources from the same authenticating domain, credentials will need to be provided independently in the context of both sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8073">キャッシュされたプロキシの資格情報は、サイト間をまたいで再利用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8073">Cached proxy credentials will be reused across sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8074">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、あるサイトのコンテキストで入力された HTTP 認証の資格情報は、もう 1 つのサイトのコンテキストでも自動的に使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8074">If you enable this policy HTTP auth credentials entered in the context of one site will automatically be used in the context of another site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8075">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、サイトには一部のクロスサイト攻撃にさらされる可能性があり、URL に埋め込まれた資格情報を使用して HTTP 認証キャッシュにエントリを追加することで、Cookie がなくてもユーザーをサイト間で追跡することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8075">Enabling this policy leaves sites open to some types of cross-site attacks, and allows users to be tracked across sites even without cookies by adding entries to the HTTP auth cache using credentials embedded in URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8076">このポリシーは、従来の動作に依存している企業に対するログイン手順の更新の機会の提供を目的としており、将来的には削除されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8076">This policy is intended to give enterprises depending on the legacy behavior a chance to update their login procedures and will be removed in the future.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8077">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8077">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8078">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8078">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8079">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8079">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8080">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8080">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8081">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8081">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8082">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8082">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8083">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8083">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8084">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8084">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8085">GP 固有の名前: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8085">GP unique name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8086">GP 名: グローバルにスコープが設定された HTTP 認証キャッシュを有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8086">GP name: Enable globally scoped HTTP auth cache</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8087">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8087">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8088">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8088">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8089">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8089">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8090">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8090">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8091">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8091">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8092">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8092">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8093">値の名前: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8093">Value Name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8094">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8094">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8095">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8095">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8096">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8096">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8097">基本設定キーの名前: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8097">Preference Key Name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8098">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8098">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8099">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8099">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8100">GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8100">GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8101">アドレス バーへの 1 単語の入力による検索ではなく、ダイレクト イントラネット サイト ナビゲーションを強制的に実行する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8101">Force direct intranet site navigation instead of searching on single word entries in the Address Bar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8102">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8102">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8103">Windows と macOS での 78 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8103">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8104">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8104">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8105">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、アドレス バーに入力されたテキストが句読点のない単一の単語であるときに、アドレス バーの提案一覧の先頭にある自動提案の結果にイントラネット サイトが表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8105">If you enable this policy, the top auto-suggest result in the address bar suggestion list will navigate to intranet sites if the text entered in the address bar is a single word without punctuation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8106">句読点のない単一の単語を入力した場合の既定のナビゲーションは、入力されたテキストに一致するイントラネット サイトの表示を行います。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8106">Default navigation when typing a single word without punctuation will conduct a navigation to an intranet site matching the entered text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8107">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、アドレス バーに入力されたテキストが句読点のない単一の単語であるときに、アドレス バーの提案一覧の 2 番目にある自動提案の結果が入力されたとおりの Web 検索を実行します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8107">If you enable this policy, the second auto-suggest result in the address bar suggestion list will conduct a web search exactly as it was entered, provided that this text is a single word without punctuation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8108">Web 検索を防止するポリシーが有効になっていない限り、既定の検索プロバイダーが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8108">The default search provider will be used unless a policy to prevent web search is also enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8109">このポリシーを有効にすると、次の 2 つの効果が現れます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8109">Two effects of enabling this policy are:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8110">通常であれば履歴項目に解決されるはずの単一の単語のクエリに対応したサイトへの移動は、もう起こらなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8110">Navigation to sites in response to single word queries that would typically resolve to a history item will no longer happen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8111">その代わりに、ブラウザーは組織のイントラネットに存在しない場合がある内部サイトへの移動を試みます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8111">Instead, the browser will attempt navigate to internal sites that may not exist in an organization's intranet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8112">これは、404 エラーを返す結果になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8112">This will result in a 404 error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8113">よく使われる単一の単語のよる検索用語については、適切に検索を行うために検索候補を手動で選択する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8113">Popular, single-word search terms will require manual selection of search suggestions to properly conduct a search.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8114">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8114">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8115">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8115">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8116">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8116">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8117">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8117">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8118">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8118">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8119">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8119">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8120">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8120">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8121">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8121">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8122">GP 固有の名前: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8122">GP unique name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8123">GP 名: アドレス バーへの 1 単語の入力による検索ではなく、ダイレクト イントラネット サイト ナビゲーションを強制的に実行する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8123">GP name: Force direct intranet site navigation instead of searching on single word entries in the Address Bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8124">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8124">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8125">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8125">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8126">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8126">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8127">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8127">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8128">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8128">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8129">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8129">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8130">値の名前: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8130">Value Name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8131">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8131">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8132">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8132">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8133">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8133">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8134">基本設定キーの名前: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8134">Preference Key Name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8135">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8135">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8136">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8136">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8137">HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8137">HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8138">HSTS ポリシーのチェックをバイパスする名前の一覧を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8138">Configure the list of names that will bypass the HSTS policy check</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8139">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8139">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8140">Windows と macOS での 79 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8140">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8141">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8141">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8142">この一覧で指定されたホスト名は、"http://" から "https://" へと要求をアップグレードする可能性のある HSTS ポリシー チェックの対象外となります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8142">Hostnames specified in this list will be exempt from the HSTS policy check that could potentially upgrade requests from "http://" to "https://".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8143">このポリシーでは、単一ラベルのホスト名のみが許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8143">Only single-label hostnames are allowed in this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8144">ホスト名は正規化する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8144">Hostnames must be canonicalized.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8145">すべての IDN は A ラベル形式に変換され、すべての ASCII 文字は小文字である必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8145">Any IDNs must be converted to their A-label format, and all ASCII letters must be lowercase.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8146">このポリシーは指定された特定のホスト名にのみ適用され、リスト内の名前のサブドメインには適用されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8146">This policy only applies to the specific hostnames specified; it doesn't apply to subdomains of the names in the list.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8147">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8147">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8148">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8148">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8149">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8149">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8150">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8150">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8151">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8151">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8152">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8152">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8153">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8153">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8154">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8154">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8155">GP 固有の名前: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8155">GP unique name: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8156">GP 名: HSTS ポリシーのチェックをバイパスする名前の一覧を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8156">GP name: Configure the list of names that will bypass the HSTS policy check</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8157">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8157">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8158">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8158">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8159">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8159">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8160">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8160">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8161">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8161">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8162">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8162">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8163">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8163">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8164">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8164">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8165">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8165">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList\1 = "meet"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8166">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8166">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8167">基本設定キーの名前: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8167">Preference Key Name: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8168">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8168">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>meet</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8169">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8169">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8170">HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8170">HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8171">使用可能な場合はハードウェア アクセラレータを使用する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8171">Use hardware acceleration when available</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8172">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8172">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8173">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8173">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8174">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8174">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8175">使用可能であれば、ハードウェア アクセラレータを使用するように指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8175">Specify to use hardware acceleration, if it's available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8176">このポリシーを有効にしているか、構成していない場合、GPU 機能が明示的にブロックされていない限り、ハードウェア アクセラレータは有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8176">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, hardware acceleration is enabled unless a GPU feature is explicitly blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8177">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、ハードウェア アクセラレータは無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8177">If you disable this policy, hardware acceleration is disabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8178">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8178">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8179">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8179">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8180">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8180">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8181">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8181">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8182">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8182">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8183">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8183">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8184">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8184">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8185">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8185">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8186">GP 固有の名前: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8186">GP unique name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8187">GP 名: 使用可能な場合はハードウェア アクセラレータを使用する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8187">GP name: Use hardware acceleration when available</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8188">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8188">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8189">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8189">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8190">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8190">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8191">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8191">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8192">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8192">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8193">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8193">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8194">値の名前: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8194">Value Name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8195">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8195">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8196">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8196">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8197">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8197">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8198">基本設定キーの名前: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8198">Preference Key Name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8199">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8199">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8200">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8200">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)
