  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8612">GP 固有の名前: ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8612">GP unique name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8613">GP 名: 保存されたパスワードのインポートを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8613">GP name: Allow importing of saved passwords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8614">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8614">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8615">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8615">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8616">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8616">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8617">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8617">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8618">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8618">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8619">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8619">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8620">値の名前: ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8620">Value Name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8621">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8621">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8622">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8622">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8623">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8623">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8624">基本設定キーの名前: ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8624">Preference Key Name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8625">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8625">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8626">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8626">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8627">ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8627">ImportSearchEngine</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8628">検索エンジンの設定のインポートを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8628">Allow importing of search engine settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8629">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8629">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8630">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8630">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8631">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8631">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8632">別のブラウザーから Microsoft Edge へと、検索エンジンの設定をユーザーがインポートできるようになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8632">Allows users to import search engine settings from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8633">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、検索エンジンの設定をインポートするオプションが自動的に選択されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8633">If you enable, this policy, the option to import search engine settings is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8634">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、検索エンジンの設定は初回実行時にインポートされず、ユーザーが手動でインポートすることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8634">If you disable this policy, search engine settings aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8635">このポリシーを構成していない場合、検索エンジンの設定は初回実行時にインポートされ、その後のブラウジング セッション中にこのデータを手動でインポートするかどうかをユーザーが選択できるようになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8635">If you don't configure this policy, search engine settings are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8636">このポリシーは、推奨として設定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8636">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8637">これは、Microsoft Edge が初回実行時に検索エンジンの設定をインポートすることを意味しますが、ユーザーは手動インポート中に**検索エンジン** オプションを選択するか、クリアすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8637">This means that Microsoft Edge imports search engine settings on first run, but users can select or clear the **search engine** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8638">**注**: このポリシーは現在、Internet Explorer (Windows 7、8、10 上) からのインポートを管理しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8638">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8639">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8639">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8640">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8640">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8641">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8641">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8642">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8642">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8643">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8643">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8644">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8644">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8645">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8645">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8646">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8646">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8647">GP 固有の名前: ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8647">GP unique name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8648">GP 名: 検索エンジンの設定のインポートを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8648">GP name: Allow importing of search engine settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8649">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8649">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8650">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8650">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8651">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8651">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8652">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8652">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8653">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8653">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8654">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8654">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8655">値の名前: ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8655">Value Name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8656">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8656">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8657">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8657">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8658">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8658">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8659">基本設定キーの名前: ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8659">Preference Key Name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8660">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8660">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8661">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8661">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8662">ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8662">ImportShortcuts</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8663">ショートカットのインポートを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8663">Allow importing of shortcuts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8664">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8664">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8665">Windows と macOS での 81 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8665">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8666">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8666">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8667">別のブラウザーから Microsoft Edge へと、ショートカットをユーザーがインポートできるようになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8667">Allows users to import Shortcuts from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8668">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、ショートカットは初回実行時にインポートされません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8668">If you disable this policy, Shortcuts aren't imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8669">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ショートカットは初回実行時にインポートされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8669">If you don't configure this policy, Shortcuts are imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8670">このポリシーは推奨として設定することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8670">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8671">これは、Microsoft Edge が初回実行時にショートカットをインポートすることを意味します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8671">This means that Microsoft Edge imports Shortcuts on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8672">**注**: このポリシーは現在、Google Chrome (Windows 7、8、10、macOS 上) からのインポートを管理しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8672">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8673">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8673">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8674">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8674">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8675">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8675">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8676">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8676">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8677">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8677">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8678">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8678">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8679">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8679">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8680">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8680">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8681">GP 固有の名前: ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8681">GP unique name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8682">GP 名: ショートカットのインポートを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8682">GP name: Allow importing of shortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8683">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8683">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8684">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8684">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8685">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8685">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8686">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8686">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8687">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8687">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8688">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8688">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8689">値の名前: ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8689">Value Name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8690">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8690">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8691">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8691">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8692">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8692">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8693">基本設定キーの名前: ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8693">Preference Key Name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8694">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8694">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8695">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8695">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8696">InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8696">InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8697">InPrivate モードの可用性を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8697">Configure InPrivate mode availability</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8698">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8698">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8699">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8699">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8700">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8700">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8701">Microsoft Edge で、ユーザーが InPrivate モードでページを開くことができるかどうかを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8701">Specifies whether the user can open pages in InPrivate mode in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8702">このポリシーを構成していないか、"有効" に設定している場合、ユーザーは InPrivate モードでページを開くことができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8702">If you don't configure this policy or set it to 'Enabled', users can open pages in InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8703">このポリシーを "無効" に設定すると、ユーザーが InPrivate モードを使用できなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8703">Set this policy to 'Disabled' to stop users from using InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8704">このポリシーを "強制" に設定すると、常に InPrivate モードでの使用になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8704">Set this policy to 'Forced' to always use InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8705">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8705">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8706">有効 (0) = InPrivate モードを使用可能にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8706">Enabled (0) = InPrivate mode available</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8707">無効 (1) = InPrivate モードを無効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8707">Disabled (1) = InPrivate mode disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8708">強制 (2) = InPrivate モードを強制する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8708">Forced (2) = InPrivate mode forced</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8709">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8709">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8710">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8710">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8711">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8711">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8712">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8712">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8713">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8713">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8714">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8714">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8715">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8715">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8716">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8716">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8717">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8717">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8718">GP 固有の名前: InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8718">GP unique name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8719">GP 名: InPrivate モードの可用性を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8719">GP name: Configure InPrivate mode availability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8720">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8720">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8721">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8721">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8722">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8722">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8723">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8723">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8724">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8724">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8725">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8725">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8726">値の名前: InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8726">Value Name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8727">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8727">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8728">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8728">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8729">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8729">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8730">基本設定キーの名前: InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8730">Preference Key Name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8731">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8731">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8732">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8732">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8733">InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8733">InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8734">セキュリティのないフォームに対する警告を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8734">Enable warnings for insecure forms</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8735">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8735">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8736">Windows と macOS での 86 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8736">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8737">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8737">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8738">このポリシーでは、ブラウザーのセキュリティで保護された (HTTPS) サイトに埋め込まれたセキュリティで保護されていないフォーム (HTTP 経由で送信されたフォーム) の処理を制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8738">This policy controls the handling of insecure forms (forms submitted over HTTP) embedded in secure (HTTPS) sites in the browser.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8739">このポリシーを有効にした場合、または設定しない場合は、セキュリティで保護されていないフォームが送信されると、ページ全体の警告が表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8739">If you enable this policy or don't set it, a full page warning will be shown when an insecure form is submitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8740">フォーカスがある場合は、フォームフィールドの横に警告バブルが表示されます。そのようなフォームのオートフィルは無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8740">Additionally, a warning bubble will be shown next to the form fields when they are focused, and autofill will be disabled for those forms.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8741">このポリシーを無効にすると、セキュリティで保護されていないフォームの警告が表示されなくなります。オートフィルは正常に機能します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8741">If you disable this policy, warnings will not be shown for insecure forms, and autofill will work normally.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8742">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8742">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8743">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8743">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8744">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8744">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8745">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8745">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8746">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8746">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8747">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8747">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8748">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8748">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8749">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8749">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8750">GP 固有の名前: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8750">GP unique name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8751">GP 名: セキュリティで保護されていないフォームに対する警告を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8751">GP name: Enable warnings for insecure forms</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8752">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8752">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8753">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8753">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8754">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8754">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8755">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8755">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8756">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8756">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8757">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8757">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8758">値の名前: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8758">Value Name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8759">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8759">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8760">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8760">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8761">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8761">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8762">優先順位キーの名前: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8762">Preference Key Name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8763">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8763">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8764">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8764">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8765">IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8765">IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8766">IntensiveWakeUpThrottling 機能を制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8766">Control the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8767">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8767">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8768">Windows と macOS での 85 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8768">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8769">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8769">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8770">IntensiveWakeUpThrottling 機能を有効にすると、バックグラウンド タブの Javascript タイマーが積極的に抑制および合体され、ページが 5 分以上バックグラウンド化された後、毎分 1 回だけ実行されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8770">When enabled the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature causes Javascript timers in background tabs to be aggressively throttled and coalesced, running no more than once per minute after a page has been backgrounded for 5 minutes or more.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8771">これは Web 標準に準拠した機能ですが、特定の操作を最大 1 分遅延させることにより、一部の Web サイトの機能を損なう可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8771">This is a web standards compliant feature, but it may break functionality on some websites by causing certain actions to be delayed by up to a minute.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8772">ただし、有効にすると、CPU とバッテリーを大幅に節約できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8772">However, it results in significant CPU and battery savings when enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8773">詳細については、https://bit.ly/30b1XR4 を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8773">See https://bit.ly/30b1XR4 for more details.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8774">このポリシーを有効にすると、機能が強制的に有効になり、ユーザーはこの設定を上書きできなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8774">If you enable this policy, the feature will be force enabled, and users will not be able to override this setting.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8775">このポリシーを無効にすると、機能が強制的に無効になり、ユーザーはこの設定を上書きできなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8775">If you disable this policy, the feature will be force disabled, and users will not be able to override this setting.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8776">このポリシーを構成しない場合、機能は独自の内部ロジックによって制御されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8776">If you don't configure this policy, the feature will be controlled by its own internal logic.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8777">ユーザーはこの設定を手動で構成できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8777">Users can manually configure this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8778">ポリシーはレンダラー プロセスごとに適用され、レンダラー プロセスの開始時にポリシー設定の最新の値が有効になることに注意してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8778">Note that the policy is applied per renderer process, with the most recent value of the policy setting in force when a renderer process starts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8779">読み込まれたすべてのタブが一貫したポリシー設定を受け取るようにするには、完全な再起動が必要です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8779">A full restart is required to ensure that all the loaded tabs receive a consistent policy setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8780">このポリシーの異なる値でプロセスを実行することは無害です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8780">It is harmless for processes to be running with different values of this policy.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8781">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8781">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8782">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8782">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8783">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8783">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8784">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8784">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8785">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8785">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8786">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8786">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8787">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8787">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8788">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8788">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8789">GP 固有の名前: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8789">GP unique name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8790">GP 名: IntensiveWakeUpThrottling 機能を制御する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8790">GP name: Control the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8791">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8791">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8792">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8792">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8793">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8793">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8794">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8794">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8795">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8795">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8796">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8796">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8797">値の名前: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8797">Value Name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8798">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8798">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8799">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8799">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8800">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8800">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8801">基本設定キーの名前: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8801">Preference Key Name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8802">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8802">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8803">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8803">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8804">InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8804">InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8805">Internet Explorer モードの拡張ハング検出を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8805">Configure enhanced hang detection for Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8806">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8806">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8807">Windows での 84 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8807">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8808">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8808">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8809">拡張ハング検出は、スタンドアロンの Internet Explorer が使用するものよりも、Internet Explorer モードでの Web ページのハングを検出するより詳細なアプローチです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8809">Enhanced hang detection is a more granular approach to detecting hung webpages in Internet Explorer mode than what standalone Internet Explorer uses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8810">ハングした Web ページが検出されると、ブラウザーには緩和策が適用され、ブラウザーの残りの部分がハングしないようにします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8810">When a hung webpage is detected, the browser will apply a mitigation to prevent the rest of the browser from hanging.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8811">この設定では、Web サイトに互換性のない問題が発生した場合に備えて、拡張ハング検出の使用を構成することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8811">This setting allows you to configure the use of enhanced hang detection in case you run into incompatible issues with any of your websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8812">Internet Explorer モードでは、「(Web サイト) が応答していません」などの通知が表示され、スタンドアロンの Internet Explorer では表示されない場合にのみ、このポリシーを無効にすることをお勧めします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8812">We recommend disabling this policy only if you see notifications such as "(website) is not responding" in Internet Explorer mode but not in standalone Internet Explorer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8813">この設定は、"IEMode" に設定されている [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) と、一覧に少なくとも 1 つのエントリがある [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) ポリシーと連動します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8813">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8814">このポリシーを [有効] に設定するか、構成しない場合、Internet Explorer モードで実行中の Web サイトでは、拡張ハング検出が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8814">If you set this policy to 'Enabled' or don't configure it, websites running in Internet Explorer mode will use enhanced hang detection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8815">このポリシーを [無効] に設定すると、拡張ハング検出が無効になり、ユーザーは基本的な Internet Explorer ハング検出動作を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8815">If you set this policy to 'Disabled', enhanced hang detection is disabled, and users will get the basic Internet Explorer hang detection behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8816">Internet Explorer モードの詳細については、「[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)」を参照してください</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8816">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8817">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8817">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8818">無効 (0) = 拡張ハング検出が無効になっている</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8818">Disabled (0) = Enhanced hang detection disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8819">有効 (1) = 拡張ハング検出が有効になっている</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8819">Enabled (1) = Enhanced hang detection enabled</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8820">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8820">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8821">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8821">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8822">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8822">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8823">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8823">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8824">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8824">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8825">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8825">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8826">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8826">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8827">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8827">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8828">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8828">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8829">GP 固有の名前: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8829">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8830">GP 名: Internet Explorer モードの拡張ハング検出を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8830">GP name: Configure enhanced hang detection for Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8831">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8831">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8832">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8832">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8833">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8833">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8834">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8834">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8835">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8835">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8836">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8836">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8837">値の名前: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8837">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8838">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8838">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8839">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8839">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8840">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8840">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8841">InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8841">InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8842">Internet Explorer 統合を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8842">Configure Internet Explorer integration</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8843">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8843">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8844">Windows での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8844">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8845">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8845">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8846">Internet Explorer モードで最適なエクスペリエンスを構成する方法については、「[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)」を参照してください</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8846">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8847">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8847">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8848">None (0) = None</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8848">None (0) = None</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8849">IEMode (1) = Internet Explorer モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8849">IEMode (1) = Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8850">NeedIE (2) = Internet Explorer 11</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8850">NeedIE (2) = Internet Explorer 11</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8851">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8851">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8852">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8852">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8853">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8853">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8854">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8854">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8855">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8855">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8856">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8856">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8857">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8857">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8858">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8858">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8859">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8859">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8860">GP 固有の名前: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8860">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8861">GP 名: Internet Explorer 統合を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8861">GP name: Configure Internet Explorer integration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8862">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8862">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8863">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8863">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8864">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8864">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8865">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8865">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8866">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8866">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8867">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8867">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8868">値の名前: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8868">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8869">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8869">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8870">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8870">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8871">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8871">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8872">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8872">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8873">Internet Explorer モードでローカル ファイルを起動できるようにする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8873">Allow launching of local files in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8874">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8874">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8875">Windows での 88 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8875">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8876">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8876">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8877">このポリシーは、コマンド ラインで指定されたローカル ファイルを使用して Microsoft Edge を Internet Explorer モードで起動するために使用される --ie-mode-file-url コマンド ライン引数の可用性を制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8877">This policy controls the availability of the --ie-mode-file-url command line argument which is used to launch Microsoft Edge with a local file specified on the command line into Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8878">この設定は、次と連携して機能します。[InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) は「IEMode」に設定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8878">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8879">このポリシーを true に設定するか、構成しない場合、ユーザーは --ie-mode-file-url コマンド ライン引数を使用して、Internet Explorer モードでローカル ファイルを起動できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8879">If you set this policy to true, or don't configure it, the user is allowed to use the --ie-mode-file-url command line argument for launching local files in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8880">このポリシーを false に設定する場合、ユーザーは --ie-mode-file-url コマンド ライン引数を使用して、Internet Explorer モードでローカル ファイルを起動できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8880">If you set this policy to false, the user isn't allowed to use the --ie-mode-file-url command line argument for launching local files in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8881">Internet Explorer モードの詳細については、「[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)」を参照してください</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8881">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8882">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8882">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8883">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8883">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8884">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8884">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8885">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8885">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8886">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8886">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8887">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8887">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8888">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8888">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8889">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8889">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8890">GP 固有の名前: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8890">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8891">GP 名: Internet Explorer モードでローカル ファイルを起動できるようにする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8891">GP name: Allow launching of local files in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8892">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8892">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8893">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8893">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8894">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8894">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8895">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8895">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8896">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8896">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8897">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8897">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8898">値の名前: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8898">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8899">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8899">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8900">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8900">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8901">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8901">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8902">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8902">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8903">Internet Explorer モードのローカル ファイルのファイル拡張子許可リストを開く</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8903">Open local files in Internet Explorer mode file extension allow list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8904">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8904">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8905">Windows での 88 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8905">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8906">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8906">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8907">このポリシーは、ファイル拡張子に基づいて、どの file:// URL を Internet Explorer モードで起動できるかを制限します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8907">This policy limits which file:// URLs are allowed to be launched into Internet Explorer mode based on file extension.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8908">この設定は、次と連携して機能します。[InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) は「IEMode」に設定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8908">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8909">file:// URL が Internet Explorer モードでの起動を要求された場合、URL を Internet Explorer モードで起動できるようにするには、URL のファイル拡張子がこのリストに存在する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8909">When a file:// URL is requested to launch in Internet Explorer mode, the file extension of the URL must be present in this list in order for the URL to be allowed to launch in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8910">Internet Explorer モードで開くことがブロックされている URL は、代わりに Edge モードで開きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8910">A URL which is blocked from opening in Internet Explorer mode will instead open in Edge mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8911">このポリシーを特別な値「\*」に設定するか、構成しない場合、すべてのファイル拡張子が許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8911">If you set this policy to the special value "\*" or don't configure it, all file extensions are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8912">Internet Explorer モードの詳細については、「[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)」を参照してください</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8912">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8913">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8913">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8914">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8914">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8915">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8915">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8916">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8916">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8917">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8917">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8918">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8918">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8919">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8919">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8920">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8920">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8921">GP 固有の名前: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8921">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8922">GP 名: Internet Explorer モードのローカル ファイルのファイル拡張子許可リストを開く</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8922">GP name: Open local files in Internet Explorer mode file extension allow list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8923">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8923">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8924">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8924">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8925">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8925">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8926">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8926">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8927">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8927">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8928">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8928">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8929">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8929">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8930">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8930">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8931">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8931">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList\1 = ".mht"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList\2 = ".pdf"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList\3 = ".vsdx"

```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8932">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8932">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8933">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8933">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8934">Internet Explorer モードでリンクを開くためのコンテキスト メニューを表示する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8934">Show context menu to open a link in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8935">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8935">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8936">Windows での 88 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8936">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8937">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8937">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8938">このポリシーは、file:// links のコンテキスト メニューの [新しい Internet Explorer モード タブでリンクを開く] オプションの表示を制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8938">This policy controls the visibility of the 'Open link in new Internet Explorer mode tab' option on the context menu for file:// links.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8939">この設定は、次と連携して機能します。[InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) は「IEMode」に設定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8939">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8940">このポリシーを true に設定すると、「新しい Internet Explorer モード タブでリンクを開く」コンテキスト メニュー項目が file:// リンクで使用できるようになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8940">If you set this policy to true, the 'Open link in new Internet Explorer mode tab' context menu item will be available for file:// links.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8941">このポリシーを false に設定するか、構成しない場合、コンテキスト メニュー項目は追加されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8941">If you set this policy to false or don't configure it, the context menu item will not be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8942">Internet Explorer モードの詳細については、「[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)」を参照してください</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8942">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8943">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8943">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8944">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8944">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8945">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8945">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8946">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8946">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8947">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8947">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8948">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8948">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8949">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8949">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8950">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8950">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8951">GP 固有の名前: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8951">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8952">GP 名: Internet Explorer モードでリンクを開くためのコンテキスト メニューを表示する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8952">GP name: Show context menu to open a link in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8953">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8953">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8954">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8954">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8955">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8955">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8956">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8956">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8957">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8957">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8958">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8958">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8959">値の名前: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8959">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8960">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8960">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8961">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8961">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8962">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8962">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8963">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8963">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8964">エンタープライズ モード サイト一覧を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8964">Configure the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8965">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8965">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8966">Windows での 78 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8966">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8967">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8967">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8968">Internet Explorer モードで最適なエクスペリエンスを構成する方法については、「[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)」を参照してください</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8968">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8969">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8969">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8970">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8970">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8971">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8971">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8972">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8972">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8973">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8973">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8974">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8974">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8975">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8975">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8976">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8976">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8977">GP 固有の名前: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8977">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8978">GP 名: エンタープライズ モード サイト一覧を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8978">GP name: Configure the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8979">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8979">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8980">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8980">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8981">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8981">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8982">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8982">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8983">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8983">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8984">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8984">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8985">値の名前: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8985">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8986">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8986">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8987">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8987">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://internal.contoso.com/sitelist.xml"
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8988">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8988">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8989">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8989">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8990">Internet Explorer モード ページから起動したときに未構成サイトへの「ページ内」ナビゲーションの動作を指定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8990">Specify how "in-page" navigations to unconfigured sites behave when started from Internet Explorer mode pages</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8991">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8991">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8992">Windows での 81 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8992">On Windows since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8993">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8993">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8994">“ページ内“ ナビゲーションは、現在のページのリンク、スクリプト、またはフォームから開始されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8994">An "in-page" navigation is started from a link, a script, or a form on the current page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8995">また、前回の“ページ内“ ナビゲーションの試行のサーバー側リダイレクトにもなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8995">It can also be a server-side redirect of a previous "in-page" navigation attempt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8996">逆に、ユーザーはブラウザーの制御で、現在のページから独立した “ページ内“ ではないナビゲーションを開始することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8996">Conversely, a user can start a navigation that isn't "in-page" that's independent of the current page in several ways by using the browser controls.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8997">たとえば、アドレス バー、[戻る] ボタン、またはお気に入りリンクを使用する場合です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8997">For example, using the address bar, the back button, or a favorite link.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8998">この設定では、Internet Explorer モードで読み込んだページから未構成のサイト (エンタープライズ モードのサイト一覧に構成されていないサイト) への移動を Microsoft Edge に切り替えるか、Internet Explorer モードのままにするかどうかを指定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8998">This setting lets you specify whether navigations from pages loaded in Internet Explorer mode to unconfigured sites (that are not configured in the Enterprise Mode Site List) switch back to Microsoft Edge or remain in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-8999">この設定は、"IEMode" に設定されている [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) と、一覧に少なくとも 1 つのエントリがある [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) ポリシーと連動します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-8999">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9000">このポリシーを無効にしているか、構成していない場合、Internet Explorer モードで開くように構成されたサイトのみが、そのモードで開きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9000">If you disable or don't configure this policy, only sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will open in that mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9001">Internet Explorer モードで開くように構成されていないサイトは、Microsoft Edge にリダイレクトされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9001">Any site not configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will be redirected back to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9002">このポリシーを [既定値] に設定している場合、Internet Explorer モードで開くように構成されたサイトのみが、そのモードで開きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9002">If you set this policy to 'Default', only sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will open in that mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9003">Internet Explorer モードで開くように構成されていないサイトは、Microsoft Edge にリダイレクトされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9003">Any site not configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will be redirected back to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9004">このポリシーを [AutomaticNavigationsOnly] に設定している場合、未構成サイトへのすべての自動ナビゲーション （302 リダイレクトなど） が Internet Explorer モードで保持されることを除いて、既定のエクスペリエンスが取得されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9004">If you set this policy to 'AutomaticNavigationsOnly', you get the default experience except that all automatic navigations (such as 302 redirects) to unconfigured sites will be kept in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9005">このポリシーを [AllInPageNavigations] に設定している場合、IE モードで読み込まれたページから未構成サイトへのすべてのナビゲーションは、Internet Explorer モードで保持されます (推奨しません)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9005">If you set this policy to 'AllInPageNavigations', all navigations from pages loaded in IE mode to unconfigured sites are kept in Internet Explorer mode (Least Recommended).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9006">Internet Explorer モードの詳細については、「[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106)」を参照してください</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9006">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9007">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9007">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9008">既定値 (0) = 既定値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9008">Default (0) = Default</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9009">AutomaticNavigationsOnly (1) = Internet Explorer モードでの自動的に行ったナビゲーションのみを保持する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9009">AutomaticNavigationsOnly (1) = Keep only automatic navigations in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9010">AllInPageNavigations (2) = Internet Explorer モードですべてのページ内ナビゲーションを保持する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9010">AllInPageNavigations (2) = Keep all in-page navigations in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9011">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9011">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9012">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9012">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9013">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9013">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9014">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9014">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9015">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9015">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9016">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9016">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9017">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9017">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9018">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9018">Windows information and settings</span></span>
