  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9019">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9019">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9020">GP 固有の名前: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9020">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9021">GP 名: Internet Explorer モード ページから起動したときに未構成サイトへの「ページ内」ナビゲーションの動作を指定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9021">GP name: Specify how "in-page" navigations to unconfigured sites behave when started from Internet Explorer mode pages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9022">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9022">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9023">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9023">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9024">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9024">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9025">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9025">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9026">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9026">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9027">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9027">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9028">値の名前: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9028">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9029">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9029">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9030">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9030">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9031">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9031">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9032">InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9032">InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9033">Internet Explorer モードテストを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9033">Allow Internet Explorer mode testing</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9034">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9034">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9035">Windows での 86 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9035">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9036">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9036">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9037">このポリシーでは、ユーザーが Microsoft Edge で Internet Explorer モードのタブを開き、Internet Explorer モードでアプリケーションをテストできるようにします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9037">This policy allows users to test applications in Internet Explorer mode by opening an Internet Explorer mode tab in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9038">ユーザーは、[Open sites in Internet Explorer mode] (Internet Explorer モードでサイトを開く) を選択することで、[その他のツール] メニューからこの操作を行うことができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9038">Users can do so from within the "More tools" menu by selecting 'Open sites in Internet Explorer mode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9039">さらに、[Open sites in Edge mode] (Microsoft Edge モードでサイトを開く) オプションを使用すると、サイトの一覧からアプリケーションを削除することなく最新のブラウザーでアプリケーションをテストすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9039">Additionally, users can test their applications in a modern browser without removing applications from the site list using the option 'Open sites in Edge mode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9040">この設定は、"IEMode" に設定されている [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) と、一覧に少なくとも 1 つのエントリがある [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) ポリシーと連動します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9040">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9041">このポリシーを有効にすると、[その他のツール] の下に [Open sites in Internet Explorer mode] (Internet Explorer モードでサイトを開く) というオプションが表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9041">If you enable this policy, the option to 'Open sites in Internet Explorer mode' will be visible under "More tools".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9042">ユーザーは、このタブ上で Internet Explorer モードを使用してサイトを表示することができます。サイト一覧からサイトを削除することなく最新のブラウザーでサイトをテストする場合に役立つように、[Open sites in Edge mode] (Microsoft Edge モードでサイトを開く) という別のオプションも [その他のツール] の下に表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9042">Users can view their sites in Internet Explorer mode on this tab. Another option to 'Open sites in Edge mode' will also be visible under "More tools" to help testing sites in a modern browser without removing them from the site list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9043">このポリシーを無効にしているか、または構成していない場合、[その他のツール] メニューの [Open sites in Internet Explorer mode] (Internet Explorer モードでサイトを開く) と [Open sites in Edge mode] (Microsoft Edge モードでサイトを開く) のオプションは表示されなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9043">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can't see the options 'Open in Internet Explorer mode' and 'Open in Edge mode' under "More tools" menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9044">ただし、ユーザーはこれらのオプションを --ie-mode-test フラグを使用して構成することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9044">However, users can configure these options with the --ie-mode-test flag.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9045">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9045">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9046">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9046">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9047">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9047">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9048">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9048">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9049">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9049">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9050">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9050">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9051">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9051">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9052">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9052">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9053">GP 固有の名前: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9053">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9054">GP 名: Internet Explorer モードテストを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9054">GP name: Allow Internet Explorer mode testing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9055">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9055">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9056">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9056">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9057">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9057">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9058">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9058">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9059">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9059">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9060">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9060">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9061">値の名前: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9061">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9062">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9062">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9063">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9063">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9064">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9064">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9065">IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9065">IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9066">イントラネット リダイレクトの動作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9066">Intranet Redirection Behavior</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9067">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9067">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9068">Windows と macOS での 88 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9068">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9069">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9069">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9070">このポリシーは、DNS の傍受チェックを介したイントラネット リダイレクトの動作を構成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9070">This policy configures behavior for intranet redirection via DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9071">これらのチェックは、ブラウザーが不明なホスト名をリダイレクトするプロキシを介しているかどうかを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9071">The checks attempt to discover whether the browser is behind a proxy that redirects unknown host names.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9072">このポリシーが構成されていない場合、ブラウザーは DNS の傍受チェックとイントラネット リダイレクトの提案の既定の動作を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9072">If this policy isn't configured, the browser will use the default behavior of DNS interception checks and intranet redirect suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9073">M88 では、これらは既定で有効になっていますが、将来のリリースでは既定で無効になる予定です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9073">In M88, they are enabled by default but will be disabled by default in the future release.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9074">[DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) は、DNS の傍受チェックも無効にする可能性のある関連ポリシーです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9074">[DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) is a related policy that might also disable DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9075">ただし、このポリシーはより柔軟なバージョンであり、イントラネット リダイレクト情報バーを個別に制御する可能性があり、将来拡張される可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9075">However, this policy is a more flexible version which might separately control intranet redirection infobars and might be expanded in the future.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9076">[DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) またはこのポリシーのいずれかが傍受チェックを無効にするように要求すると、チェックは無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9076">If either [DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) or this policy make a request to disable interception checks, the checks will be disabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9077">このポリシーによって DNS の傍受チェックが無効になっているが、[GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar](#gotointranetsiteforsinglewordentryinaddressbar) が有効になっている場合でも、シングル ワード クエリはイントラネット ナビゲーションになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9077">If DNS interception checks are disabled by this policy but [GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar](#gotointranetsiteforsinglewordentryinaddressbar) is enabled, single word queries will still result in intranet navigations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9078">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9078">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9079">Default (0) = 既定のブラウザー動作を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9079">Default (0) = Use default browser behavior.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9080">DisableInterceptionChecksDisableInfobar (1) = DNS の傍受チェックと「http://intranetsite/」情報バーを無効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9080">DisableInterceptionChecksDisableInfobar (1) = Disable DNS interception checks and did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" infobars.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9081">DisableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (2) = DNS の傍受チェックと「http://intranetsite/」情報バーを無効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9081">DisableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (2) = Disable DNS interception checks; allow did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" infobars.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9082">EnableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (3) = DNS の傍受チェックと「http://intranetsite/」情報バーを有効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9082">EnableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (3) = Allow DNS interception checks and did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" infobars.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9083">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9083">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9084">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9084">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9085">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9085">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9086">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9086">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9087">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9087">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9088">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9088">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9089">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9089">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9090">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9090">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9091">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9091">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9092">GP 固有の名前: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9092">GP unique name: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9093">GP 名: イントラネット リダイレクトの動作</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9093">GP name: Intranet Redirection Behavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9094">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9094">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9095">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9095">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9096">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9096">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9097">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9097">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9098">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9098">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9099">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9099">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9100">値の名前: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9100">Value Name: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9101">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9101">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9102">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9102">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9103">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9103">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9104">基本設定キーの名前: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9104">Preference Key Name: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9105">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9105">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9106">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9106">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9107">IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9107">IsolateOrigins</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9108">特定のオリジンでのサイトの分離を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9108">Enable site isolation for specific origins</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9109">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9109">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9110">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9110">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9111">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9111">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9112">独自のプロセスで分離して実行するオリジンを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9112">Specify origins to run in isolation, in their own process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9113">このポリシーは、サブドメインで指定されたオリジンも分離します。たとえば https://contoso.com/ を指定すると、https://foo.contoso.com/ が https://contoso.com/ サイトの一部として分離されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9113">This policy also isolates origins named by subdomains - for example, specifying https://contoso.com/ will cause https://foo.contoso.com/ to be isolated as part of the https://contoso.com/ site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9114">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、コンマで区切られた一覧に含まれる指定されたオリジンは、それぞれ独自のプロセスで実行されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9114">If the policy is enabled, each of the named origins in a comma-separated list will run in its own process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9115">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、“IsolateOrigins“ と “SitePerProcess“ の両方の機能が無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9115">If you disable this policy, then both the 'IsolateOrigins' and 'SitePerProcess' features are disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9116">ユーザーは、コマンドライン フラグを使用して手動で “IsolateOrigins“ ポリシーを有効にすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9116">Users can still enable 'IsolateOrigins' policy manually, via command line flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9117">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーはこの設定を変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9117">If you don't configure the policy, the user can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9118">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9118">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9119">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9119">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9120">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9120">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9121">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9121">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9122">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9122">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9123">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9123">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9124">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9124">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9125">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9125">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9126">GP 固有の名前: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9126">GP unique name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9127">GP 名: 特定のオリジンでのサイトの分離を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9127">GP name: Enable site isolation for specific origins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9128">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9128">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9129">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9129">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9130">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9130">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9131">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9131">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9132">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9132">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9133">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9133">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9134">値の名前: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9134">Value Name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9135">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9135">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9136">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9136">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://contoso.com/,https://fabrikam.com/"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9137">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9137">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9138">基本設定キーの名前: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9138">Preference Key Name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9139">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9139">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://contoso.com/,https://fabrikam.com/</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9140">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9140">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9141">LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9141">LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9142">ローカル プロバイダーからのおすすめを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9142">Allow suggestions from local providers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9143">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9143">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9144">Windows と macOS での 83 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9144">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9145">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9145">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9146">お気に入りや閲覧の履歴などのデバイス上の提案プロバイダー (ローカル プロバイダー) からの提案を、Microsoft Edge のアドレス バーや自動提案一覧で許可します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9146">Allow suggestions from suggestion providers on the device (local providers), for example, Favorites and Browsing History, in Microsoft Edge's Address Bar and Auto-Suggest List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9147">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、ローカル プロバイダーからの提案が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9147">If you enable this policy, suggestions from local providers are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9148">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、ローカル プロバイダーからの提案は使用されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9148">If you disable this policy, suggestions from local providers are never used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9149">ローカルの履歴やお気に入りの提案は表示されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9149">Local history and local favorites suggestions will not appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9150">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ローカル プロバイダーからの提案は許可されますが、ユーザーは設定トグルを使用して変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9150">If you do not configure this policy, suggestions from local providers are allowed but the user can change that using the settings toggle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9151">この機能を無効にするポリシーが適用されている場合、一部の機能が使用できない場合があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9151">Note that some features may not be available if a policy to disable this feature has been applied.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9152">たとえば、[SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled](#savingbrowserhistorydisabled) ポリシーを有効にしている場合、閲覧の履歴の提案は使用することができません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9152">For example, Browsing History suggestions will not be available if you enable the [SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled](#savingbrowserhistorydisabled) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9153">このポリシーの適用を完了させるには、ブラウザーの再起動が必要です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9153">This policy requires a browser restart to finish applying.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9154">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9154">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9155">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9155">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9156">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9156">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9157">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9157">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9158">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9158">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9159">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9159">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9160">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9160">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9161">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9161">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9162">GP 固有の名前: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9162">GP unique name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9163">GP 名: ローカル プロバイダーからのおすすめを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9163">GP name: Allow suggestions from local providers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9164">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9164">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9165">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9165">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9166">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9166">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9167">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9167">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9168">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9168">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9169">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9169">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9170">値の名前: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9170">Value Name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9171">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9171">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9172">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9172">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9173">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9173">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9174">基本設定キーの名前: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9174">Preference Key Name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9175">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9175">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9176">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9176">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9177">ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9177">ManagedFavorites</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9178">お気に入りを構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9178">Configure favorites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9179">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9179">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9180">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9180">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9181">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9181">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9182">管理されているお気に入りの一覧を構成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9182">Configures a list of managed favorites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9183">このポリシーは、お気に入りの一覧を作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9183">The policy creates a list of favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9184">それぞれのお気に入りには、お気に入りの名前とターゲットを保持する “name“ と “url“ というキーが含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9184">Each favorite contains the keys "name" and "url," which hold the favorite's name and its target.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9185">“url“ キーを持たないお気に入りを定義することでサブフォルダーを構成することができますが、上記で定義したお気に入りの一覧を含む追加の “子“ キーを持つことで、サブフォルダを構成することができます (そのうちのいくつかは再びフォルダーになる可能性があります)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9185">You can configure a subfolder by defining a favorites without an "url" key but with an additional "children" key that contains a list of favorites as defined above (some of which may be folders again).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9186">Microsoft Edge では、不完全な URL がアドレス バーを介して送信されたかのように修正されます。たとえば、"microsoft.com" は "https://microsoft.com/" になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9186">Microsoft Edge amends incomplete URLs as if they were submitted via the Address Bar, for example "microsoft.com" becomes "https://microsoft.com/".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9187">これらのお気に入りは、ユーザーが変更することができないフォルダーに配置されます (ただし、ユーザーはお気に入り バーからそれを非表示にすることができます)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9187">These favorites are placed in a folder that can't be modified by the user (but the user can choose to hide it from the favorites bar).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9188">既定では、フォルダー名は “管理されているお気に入り“ となっていますが、お気に入りの一覧に “toplevel_name“ というキーを含む辞書を追加し、目的のフォルダー名を値として追加することで、フォルダー名を変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9188">By default the folder name is "Managed favorites" but you can change it by adding to the list of favorites a dictionary containing the key "toplevel_name" with the desired folder name as the value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9189">管理されているお気に入りはユーザー アカウントに同期されず、拡張機能が変更することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9189">Managed favorites are not synced to the user account and can't be modified by extensions.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9190">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9190">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9191">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9191">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9192">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9192">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9193">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9193">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9194">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9194">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9195">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9195">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9196">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9196">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9197">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9197">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9198">GP 固有の名前: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9198">GP unique name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9199">GP 名: お気に入りを構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9199">GP name: Configure favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9200">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9200">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9201">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9201">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9202">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9202">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9203">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9203">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9204">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9204">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9205">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9205">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9206">値の名前: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9206">Value Name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9207">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9207">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9208">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9208">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedFavorites = [
  {
    "toplevel_name": "My managed favorites folder"
  }, 
  {
    "name": "Microsoft", 
    "url": "microsoft.com"
  }, 
  {
    "name": "Bing", 
    "url": "bing.com"
  }, 
  {
    "children": [
      {
        "name": "Microsoft Edge Insiders", 
        "url": "www.microsoftedgeinsider.com"
      }, 
      {
        "name": "Microsoft Edge", 
        "url": "www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge"
      }
    ], 
    "name": "Microsoft Edge links"
  }
]
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9209">コンパクト サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9209">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedFavorites = [{"toplevel_name": "My managed favorites folder"}, {"name": "Microsoft", "url": "microsoft.com"}, {"name": "Bing", "url": "bing.com"}, {"children": [{"name": "Microsoft Edge Insiders", "url": "www.microsoftedgeinsider.com"}, {"name": "Microsoft Edge", "url": "www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge"}], "name": "Microsoft Edge links"}]
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9210">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9210">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9211">基本設定キーの名前: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9211">Preference Key Name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9212">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9212">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ManagedFavorites</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>toplevel_name</key>
    <string>My managed favorites folder</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Microsoft</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>microsoft.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Bing</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>bing.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>children</key>
    <array>
      <dict>
        <key>name</key>
        <string>Microsoft Edge Insiders</string>
        <key>url</key>
        <string>www.microsoftedgeinsider.com</string>
      </dict>
      <dict>
        <key>name</key>
        <string>Microsoft Edge</string>
        <key>url</key>
        <string>www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge</string>
      </dict>
    </array>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Microsoft Edge links</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9213">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9213">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9214">ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9214">ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9215">検索エンジンを管理する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9215">Manage Search Engines</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9216">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9216">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9217">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9217">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9218">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9218">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9219">最大 10 個の検索エンジンを一覧に設定でき、そのうちの 1 つは既定の検索エンジンとしてマークする必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9219">Lets you configure a list of up to 10 search engines, one of which must be marked as the default search engine.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9220">エンコードを指定する必要はありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9220">You do not need to specify the encoding.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9221">Microsoft Edge 80 以降では、suggest_url と image_search_url パラメーターはオプションです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9221">Starting in Microsoft Edge 80, the suggest_url and image_search_url parameters are optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9222">オプションのパラメーターである image_search_post_params (コンマで区切られた名前と値のペアで構成されています) は、Microsoft Edge 80 から利用可能です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9222">The optional parameter, image_search_post_params (consists of comma-separated name/value pairs), is available starting in Microsoft Edge 80.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9223">Microsoft Edge 83 以降では、allow_search_engine_discovery というオプションのパラメーターを使用して、検索エンジンの検出を有効にすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9223">Starting in Microsoft Edge 83, you can enable search engine discovery with the allow_search_engine_discovery optional parameter.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9224">このパラメーターは、一覧の最初の項目である必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9224">This parameter must be the first item in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9225">allow_search_engine_discovery を指定していない場合、検索エンジンの検出は既定で無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9225">If allow_search_engine_discovery is not specified, search engine discovery will be disabled by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9226">Microsoft Edge 84 以降、このポリシーは、検索プロバイダーの検出を許可するために推奨されるポリシーとして設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9226">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy to allow search provider discovery.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9227">省略可能なパラメーター allow_search_engine_discovery を追加する必要はありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9227">You do not need to add the allow_search_engine_discovery optional parameter.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9228">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、ユーザーは一覧で任意の検索エンジンを追加、削除、または変更することができなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9228">If you enable this policy, users can't add, remove, or change any search engine in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9229">ユーザーは、一覧で任意の検索エンジンを既定の検索エンジンとして設定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9229">Users can set their default search engine to any search engine in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9230">このポリシーを無効にしているか、構成していない場合、ユーザーは検索エンジンの一覧を必要に応じて変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9230">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can modify the search engines list as desired.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9231">[DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) ポリシーが設定されている場合、このポリシー (ManagedSearchEngines) は無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9231">If the [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policy is set, this policy (ManagedSearchEngines) is ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9232">このポリシーの適用を完了するには、ユーザーはブラウザーを再起動する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9232">The user must restart their browser to finish applying this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9233">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9233">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9234">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9234">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9235">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9235">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9236">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9236">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9237">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9237">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9238">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9238">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9239">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9239">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9240">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9240">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9241">GP 固有の名前: ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9241">GP unique name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9242">GP 名: 検索エンジンを管理する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9242">GP name: Manage Search Engines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9243">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9243">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9244">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9244">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9245">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9245">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9246">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9246">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9247">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9247">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9248">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9248">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9249">値の名前: ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9249">Value Name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9250">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9250">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9251">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9251">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedSearchEngines = [
  {
    "allow_search_engine_discovery": true
  }, 
  {
    "is_default": true, 
    "keyword": "example1.com", 
    "name": "Example1", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example1.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example1.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "image_search_post_params": "content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}", 
    "image_search_url": "https://www.example2.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", 
    "keyword": "example2.com", 
    "name": "Example2", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example2.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example2.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "encoding": "UTF-8", 
    "image_search_url": "https://www.example3.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", 
    "keyword": "example3.com", 
    "name": "Example3", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example3.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example3.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "keyword": "example4.com", 
    "name": "Example4", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example4.com/search?q={searchTerms}"
  }
]
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9252">コンパクト サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9252">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedSearchEngines = [{"allow_search_engine_discovery": true}, {"is_default": true, "keyword": "example1.com", "name": "Example1", "search_url": "https://www.example1.com/search?q={searchTerms}", "suggest_url": "https://www.example1.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"}, {"image_search_post_params": "content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}", "image_search_url": "https://www.example2.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", "keyword": "example2.com", "name": "Example2", "search_url": "https://www.example2.com/search?q={searchTerms}", "suggest_url": "https://www.example2.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"}, {"encoding": "UTF-8", "image_search_url": "https://www.example3.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", "keyword": "example3.com", "name": "Example3", "search_url": "https://www.example3.com/search?q={searchTerms}", "suggest_url": "https://www.example3.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"}, {"keyword": "example4.com", "name": "Example4", "search_url": "https://www.example4.com/search?q={searchTerms}"}]
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9253">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9253">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9254">基本設定キーの名前: ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9254">Preference Key Name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9255">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9255">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ManagedSearchEngines</key>

    <string>https://www.example1.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>

    <string>https://www.example1.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>image_search_post_params</key>
    <string>content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}</string>
    <key>image_search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example2.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload</string>
    <key>keyword</key>
    <string>example2.com</string>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Example2</string>
    <key>search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example2.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>
    <key>suggest_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example2.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>encoding</key>
    <string>UTF-8</string>
    <key>image_search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example3.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload</string>
    <key>keyword</key>
    <string>example3.com</string>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Example3</string>
    <key>search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example3.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>
    <key>suggest_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example3.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>keyword</key>
    <string>example4.com</string>
    <key>name</key>
    <string>Example4</string>
    <key>search_url</key>
    <string>https://www.example4.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9256">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9256">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9257">MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9257">MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9258">プロキシ サーバーへの同時接続の最大数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9258">Maximum number of concurrent connections to the proxy server</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9259">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9259">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9260">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9260">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9261">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9261">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9262">プロキシ サーバーへの同時接続の最大数を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9262">Specifies the maximum number of simultaneous connections to the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9263">プロキシ サーバーの中には、クライアントごとの同時接続数が多い場合に処理することができないものがあります。このポリシーをより低い値に設定することで、この問題を解決することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9263">Some proxy servers can't handle a high number of concurrent connections per client - you can solve this by setting this policy to a lower value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9264">このポリシーの値は、100 以下で 6 以上である必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9264">The value of this policy should be lower than 100 and higher than 6.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9265">既定値は 32 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9265">The default value is 32.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9266">一部の Web アプリは、ハングしている GET で多くの接続を消費することが知られています。最大接続数を 32 以下に下げると、こういった種類の Web アプリがあまりにも多く開かれている場合、ブラウザー ネットワークのハングにつながる場合があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9266">Some web apps are known to consume many connections with hanging GETs - lowering the maximum connections below 32 may lead to browser networking hangs if too many of these kind of web apps are open.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9267">このポリシーを構成していない場合、既定値 (32) が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9267">If you don't configure this policy, the default value (32) is used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9268">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9268">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9269">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9269">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9270">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9270">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9271">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9271">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9272">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9272">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9273">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9273">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9274">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9274">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9275">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9275">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9276">GP 固有の名前: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9276">GP unique name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9277">GP 名: プロキシ サーバーへの同時接続の最大数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9277">GP name: Maximum number of concurrent connections to the proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9278">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9278">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9279">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9279">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9280">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9280">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9281">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9281">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9282">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9282">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9283">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9283">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9284">値の名前: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9284">Value Name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9285">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9285">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9286">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9286">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000020
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9287">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9287">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9288">基本設定キーの名前: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9288">Preference Key Name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9289">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9289">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>32</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9290">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9290">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9291">MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9291">MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9292">Google Cast がすべての IP アドレスのキャスト デバイスに接続できるようにする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9292">Allow Google Cast to connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9293">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9293">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9294">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9294">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9295">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9295">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9296">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、Google Cast は RFC1918/RFC4193 のプライベート アドレスだけでなく、すべての IP アドレスのキャスト デバイスに接続できるようになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9296">Enable this policy to let Google Cast connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses, not just RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9297">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、RFC1918/RFC4193 のプライベート アドレスのキャスト デバイスに Google Cast を制限します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9297">Disable this policy to restrict Google Cast to Cast devices on RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9298">このポリシーを構成していない場合、CastAllowAllIPs 機能を有効にしない限り、Google Cast は RFC1918/RFC4193 のプライベート アドレス上の Cast デバイスにのみ接続します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9298">If you don't configure this policy, Google Cast connects to Cast devices on RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses only, unless you enable the CastAllowAllIPs feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9299">[EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) ポリシーが無効になっている場合、このポリシーには何の効果もありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9299">If the [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) policy is disabled, then this policy has no effect.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9300">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9300">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9301">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9301">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9302">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9302">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9303">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9303">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9304">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9304">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9305">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9305">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9306">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9306">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9307">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9307">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9308">GP 固有の名前: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9308">GP unique name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9309">GP 名: Google Cast がすべての IP アドレスのキャスト デバイスに接続できるようにする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9309">GP name: Allow Google Cast to connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9310">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9310">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9311">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9311">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9312">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9312">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9313">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9313">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9314">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9314">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9315">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9315">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9316">値の名前: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9316">Value Name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9317">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9317">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9318">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9318">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9319">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9319">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9320">基本設定キーの名前: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9320">Preference Key Name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9321">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9321">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9322">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9322">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9323">MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9323">MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9324">使用状況とクラッシュ関連のデータレポートを有効にする (廃止)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9324">Enable usage and crash-related data reporting (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9325">不使用: このポリシーは廃止されており、Microsoft Edge 88 以降は機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9325">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9326">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9326">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9327">Windows と macOS での 77 以降、88 まで</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9327">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 88</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9328">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9328">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9329">このポリシーはサポートされなくなりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9329">This policy is no longer supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9330">このポリシーは [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) に置き換えられ (Windows 7、Windows 8、および macOS)、Windows 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)) でテレメトリが許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9330">It is replaced by [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) (for Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS) and Allow Telemetry on Win 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9331">このポリシーによって、Microsoft Edge の使用状況およびクラッシュに関連するデータの Microsoft への送信が有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9331">This policy enables reporting of usage and crash-related data about Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9332">使用状況およびクラッシュに関連するデータのレポートを Microsoft に送信するには、このポリシーを有効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9332">Enable this policy to send reporting of usage and crash-related data to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9333">このデータを Microsoft に送信しない場合は、このポリシーを無効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9333">Disable this policy to not send the data to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9334">いずれの場合でも、ユーザーがこの設定を変更または上書きすることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9334">In both cases, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9335">Windows 10 では、このポリシーを構成していない場合、Microsoft Edge は Windows 診断データの設定を既定値として設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9335">On Windows 10, if you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the Windows diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9336">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、Windows 診断データの設定が［拡張］または［完全］に設定されている場合にのみ、Microsoft Edge は使用状況データを送信します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9336">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge will only send usage data if the Windows Diagnostic data setting is set to Enhanced or Full.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9337">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、Microsoft Edge は使用状況データを送信しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9337">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will not send usage data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9338">クラッシュに関連するデータは、Windows 診断データの設定に基づいて送信されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9338">Crash-related data is sent based on the Windows Diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9339">Windows 診断データの設定については、「[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)」を参照してください</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9339">Learn more about Windows Diagnostic data settings at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9340">Windows 7、Windows 8、macOS では、このポリシーによって、使用状況とクラッシュに関連するデータの送信が制御されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9340">On Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS, this policy controls sending usage and crash-related data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9341">このポリシーを構成しない場合、Microsoft Edge は既定でユーザーの設定に従います。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9341">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9342">このポリシーを有効にするには、[SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) を有効に設定する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9342">To enable this policy,[SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) must be set to Enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9343">[MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) または [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) が構成されていないか、または無効になっている場合は、このデータは Microsoft に送信されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9343">If [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) or [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) is Not Configured or Disabled, this data will not be sent to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9344">このポリシーは、Microsoft Active Directory ドメインに参加している Windows インスタンス、デバイス管理用に登録されている Windows 10 Pro または Enterprise インスタンス、もしくは MDM を使用するか MDM を使用してドメインに参加する macOS インスタンスでのみ利用可能です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9344">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9345">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9345">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9346">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9346">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9347">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9347">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9348">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9348">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9349">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9349">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9350">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9350">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9351">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9351">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9352">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9352">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9353">一意の GP 名: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9353">GP unique name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9354">GP 名: 使用状況とクラッシュ関連のデータレポートを有効にする (廃止)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9354">GP name: Enable usage and crash-related data reporting (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9355">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9355">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9356">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9356">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9357">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9357">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9358">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9358">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9359">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9359">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9360">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9360">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9361">値の名前: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9361">Value Name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9362">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9362">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9363">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9363">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9364">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9364">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9365">基本設定キーの名前: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9365">Preference Key Name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9366">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9366">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9367">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9367">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9368">NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9368">NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9369">ネイティブ ウィンドウ オクルージョンを有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9369">Enable Native Window Occlusion</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9370">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9370">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9371">Windows での 84 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9371">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9372">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9372">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9373">Microsoft Edge のネイティブ ウィンドウ オクルージョンを有効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9373">Enables native window occlusion in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9374">この設定を有効にしている場合、CPU と電力の消費を削減するために、Microsoft Edge はウィンドウが他のウィンドウに覆われていることを検出したときにピクセルの描画作業を中断します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9374">If you enable this setting, to reduce CPU and power consumption Microsoft Edge will detect when a window is covered by other windows, and will suspend work painting pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9375">この設定を無効にしている場合、ウィンドウが他のウィンドウに覆われていることを Microsoft Edge は検出しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9375">If you disable this setting Microsoft Edge will not detect when a window is covered by other windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9376">このポリシーが設定されていない場合、ウィンドウが覆われていることについての検出は有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9376">If this policy is left not set, window hiding detection will be enabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9377">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9377">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9378">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9378">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9379">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9379">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9380">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9380">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9381">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9381">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9382">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9382">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9383">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9383">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9384">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9384">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9385">GP 固有の名前: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9385">GP unique name: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9386">GP 名: ネイティブ ウィンドウ オクルージョンを有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9386">GP name: Enable Native Window Occlusion</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9387">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9387">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9388">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9388">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9389">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9389">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9390">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9390">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9391">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9391">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9392">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9392">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9393">値の名前: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9393">Value Name: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9394">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9394">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9395">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9395">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```
