<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9808">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9808">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9809">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9809">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9810">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9810">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9811">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9811">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9812">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9812">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9813">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9813">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9814">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9814">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9815">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9815">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9816">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9816">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9817">GP 固有の名前: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9817">GP unique name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9818">GP 名: 互換性のないサイトを Internet Explorer から Microsoft Edgeにリダイレクトする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9818">GP name: Redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9819">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9819">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9820">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9820">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9821">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9821">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9822">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9822">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9823">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9823">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9824">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9824">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9825">GP 固有の名前: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9825">Value Name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9826">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9826">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9827">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9827">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9828">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9828">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9829">RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9829">RelaunchNotification</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9830">保留中の更新についてブラウザーの再起動が推奨されている、または必要であることをユーザーに通知する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9830">Notify a user that a browser restart is recommended or required for pending updates</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9831">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9831">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9832">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9832">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9833">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9833">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9834">保留中の更新を適用するために、Microsoft Edge を再起動する必要があることをユーザーに通知します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9834">Notify users that they need to restart Microsoft Edge to apply a pending update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9835">このポリシーを構成していない場合、Microsoft Edge のトップ メニュー バーの右端に [リサイクル] アイコンが追加され、更新プログラムを適用するためにユーザーにブラウザーの再起動を促すメッセージを表示します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9835">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge adds a recycle icon at the far right of the top menu bar to prompt users to restart the browser to apply the update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9836">このポリシーを有効にして “推奨“ に設定している場合、再起動を勧める内容の警告がユーザーに対して繰り返し表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9836">If you enable this policy and set it to 'Recommended', a recurring warning prompts users that a restart is recommended.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9837">ユーザーは、この警告を無視して、再起動を延期することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9837">Users can dismiss this warning and defer the restart.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9838">このポリシーを “必須“ に設定している場合、通知期間が過ぎると自動的にブラウザーが再起動されることを確認する内容の警告がユーザーに対して繰り返し表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9838">If you set the policy to 'Required', a recurring warning prompts users that the browser will be restarted automatically as soon as a notification period passes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9839">既定の期間は 7 日です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9839">The default period is seven days.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9840">この期間は、[RelaunchNotificationPeriod](#relaunchnotificationperiod) ポリシーで構成することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9840">You can configure this period with the [RelaunchNotificationPeriod](#relaunchnotificationperiod) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9841">ユーザーのセッションは、ブラウザーの再起動時に復元されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9841">The user's session is restored when the browser restarts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9842">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9842">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9843">推奨 (1) = 推奨 - 再起動が推奨されていることを示すメッセージをユーザーに対して繰り返し表示する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9843">Recommended (1) = Recommended - Show a recurring prompt to the user indicating that a restart is recommended</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9844">必須 (2) = 必須 - 再起動が必須であることを示すメッセージをユーザーに対して繰り返し表示する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9844">Required (2) = Required - Show a recurring prompt to the user indicating that a restart is required</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9845">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9845">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9846">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9846">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9847">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9847">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9848">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9848">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9849">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9849">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9850">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9850">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9851">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9851">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9852">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9852">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9853">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9853">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9854">GP 固有の名前: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9854">GP unique name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9855">GP 名: 保留中の更新についてブラウザーの再起動が推奨されている、または必要であることをユーザーに通知する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9855">GP name: Notify a user that a browser restart is recommended or required for pending updates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9856">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9856">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9857">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9857">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9858">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9858">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9859">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9859">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9860">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9860">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9861">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9861">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9862">値の名前: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9862">Value Name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9863">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9863">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9864">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9864">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9865">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9865">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9866">基本設定キーの名前: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9866">Preference Key Name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9867">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9867">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9868">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9868">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9869">RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9869">RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9870">更新通知の期間を設定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9870">Set the time period for update notifications</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9871">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9871">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9872">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9872">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9873">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9873">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9874">保留中の更新プログラムを適用するために Microsoft Edge の再起動が必要な場合に、その内容をユーザーに通知する期間をミリ秒単位で設定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9874">Allows you to set the time period, in milliseconds, over which users are notified that Microsoft Edge must be relaunched to apply a pending update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9875">この期間の間、ユーザーには更新が必要であることが繰り返し通知されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9875">Over this time period, the user will be repeatedly informed of the need for an update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9876">Microsoft Edge では、通知期間の 3 分の 1 が経過するとアプリ メニューが変化し、再起動が必要であることを通知します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9876">In Microsoft Edge the app menu changes to indicate that a relaunch is needed once one third of the notification period passes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9877">この通知は、通知期間の 3 分の 2 が経過すると色が変化し、全通知期間が経過すると再び色が変化します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9877">This notification changes color once two thirds of the notification period passes, and again once the full notification period has passed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9878">[RelaunchNotification](#relaunchnotification) ポリシーで有効になっている追加の通知は、これと同じスケジュールに従います。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9878">The additional notifications enabled by the [RelaunchNotification](#relaunchnotification) policy follow this same schedule.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9879">設定されていない場合、既定の期間である 604800000 ミリ秒 (1週間) が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9879">If not set, the default period of 604800000 milliseconds (one week) is used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9880">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9880">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9881">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9881">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9882">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9882">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9883">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9883">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9884">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9884">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9885">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9885">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9886">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9886">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9887">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9887">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9888">GP 固有の名前: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9888">GP unique name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9889">GP 名: 更新通知の期間を設定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9889">GP name: Set the time period for update notifications</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9890">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9890">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9891">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9891">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9892">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9892">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9893">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9893">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9894">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9894">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9895">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9895">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9896">値の名前: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9896">Value Name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9897">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9897">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9898">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9898">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x240c8400
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9899">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9899">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9900">基本設定キーの名前: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9900">Preference Key Name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9901">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9901">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>604800000</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9902">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9902">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9903">RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9903">RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9904">レンダラー コードの整合性を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9904">Enable renderer code integrity</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9905">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9905">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9906">Windows での 78 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9906">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9907">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9907">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9908">ポリシーを [有効] に設定するか、設定を解除すると、レンダラーのコード整合性が有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9908">Setting the policy to Enabled or leaving it unset turns Renderer Code Integrity on.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9909">ポリシーを無効に設定すると、Microsoft Edge のセキュリティと安定性に有害な影響が及び、不明で、潜在的に危険なコードが Microsoft Edge のレンダラー プロセス内に読み込まれる可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9909">Setting the policy to Disabled has a detrimental effect on Microsoft Edge's security and stability as unknown and potentially hostile code can load inside Microsoft Edge's renderer processes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9910">Microsoft Edge のレンダラー プロセス内で実行する必要があるサード パーティ製ソフトウェアとの互換性の問題がある場合にのみ、ポリシーをオフにします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9910">Only turn off the policy if there are compatibility issues with third-party software that must run inside Microsoft Edge's renderer processes.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9911">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9911">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9912">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9912">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9913">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9913">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9914">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9914">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9915">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9915">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9916">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9916">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9917">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9917">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9918">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9918">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9919">GP 固有の名前: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9919">GP unique name: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9920">GP 名: レンダラー コードの整合性を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9920">GP name: Enable renderer code integrity</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9921">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9921">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9922">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9922">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9923">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9923">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9924">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9924">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9925">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9925">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9926">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9926">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9927">値の名前: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9927">Value Name: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9928">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9928">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9929">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9929">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9930">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9930">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9931">RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9931">RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9932">ローカル トラスト アンカーにオンラインでの OCSP/CRL チェックが必要かどうかを指定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9932">Specify if online OCSP/CRL checks are required for local trust anchors</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9933">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9933">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9934">Windows での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9934">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9935">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9935">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9936">オンラインでの失効チェック (OCSP/CRLチェック) を必須にするかどうかを制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9936">Control whether online revocation checks (OCSP/CRL checks) are required.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9937">Microsoft Edge が失効状態の情報を取得できない場合、これらの証明書は失効したものとして扱われます ("ハード フェイル")。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9937">If Microsoft Edge can't get revocation status information, these certificates are treated as revoked ("hard-fail").</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9938">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、Microsoft Edge では、検証に成功し、ローカルにインストールされた CA 証明書によって署名されたサーバー証明書の失効チェックが常に行われます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9938">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge always performs revocation checking for server certificates that successfully validate and are signed by locally-installed CA certificates.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9939">このポリシーを構成していないか、無効にしている場合、Microsoft Edge は、既存のオンラインでの失効チェックの設定を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9939">If you don't configure or disable this policy, then Microsoft Edge uses the existing online revocation checking settings.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9940">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9940">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9941">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9941">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9942">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9942">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9943">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9943">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9944">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9944">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9945">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9945">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9946">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9946">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9947">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9947">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9948">GP 固有の名前: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9948">GP unique name: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9949">GP 名: ローカル トラスト アンカーにオンラインでの OCSP/CRL チェックが必要かどうかを指定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9949">GP name: Specify if online OCSP/CRL checks are required for local trust anchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9950">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9950">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9951">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9951">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9952">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9952">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9953">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9953">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9954">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9954">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9955">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9955">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9956">値の名前: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9956">Value Name: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9957">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9957">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9958">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9958">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9959">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9959">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9960">ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9960">ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9961">Web サービスを使用したナビゲーション エラーの解決を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9961">Enable resolution of navigation errors using a web service</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9962">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9962">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9963">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9963">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9964">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9964">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9965">ホテルや空港の Wi-Fi などの場合に、Microsoft Edge が Web サービスにデータレス接続を発行して、ネットワークの接続性を調べることができるようにします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9965">Allow Microsoft Edge to issue a dataless connection to a web service to probe networks for connectivity in cases like hotel and airport Wi-Fi.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9966">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、ネットワーク接続性テストに Web サービスが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9966">If you enable this policy, a web service is used for network connectivity tests.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9967">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、Microsoft Edge はネイティブ API を使用して、ネットワークの接続性とナビゲーションの問題の解決を試みます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9967">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses native APIs to try to resolve network connectivity and navigation issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9968">**注**: Windows 8 以降のバージョンの Windows を除き、Microsoft Edge は*常に*ネイティブ API を使用して接続性の問題を解決します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9968">**Note**: Except on Windows 8 and later versions of Windows, Microsoft Edge *always* uses native APIs to resolve connectivity issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9969">このポリシーを構成していない場合、Microsoft Edge は、edge://settings/privacy のサービスで設定されているユーザー設定を尊重します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9969">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge respects the user preference that's set under Services at edge://settings/privacy.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9970">具体的には、ユーザーがオン/オフを切り替えることができる [**Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors**] (Web サービスを使用してナビゲーション エラーを解決する) トグルがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9970">Specifically, there's a **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** toggle, which the user can switch on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9971">このポリシー (ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService) を有効にしている場合、[**Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors**] (Web サービスを使用してナビゲーション エラーを解決する) の設定はオンになっていますが、ユーザーがトグルを使用して設定を変更することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9971">Be aware that if you have enabled this policy (ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService), the **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** setting is turned on, but the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9972">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、[**Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors**] (Web サービスを使用してナビゲーション エラーを解決する) の設定はオフになっており、ユーザーがトグルを使用して設定を変更することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9972">If you have disabled this policy, the **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** setting is turned off, and the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9973">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9973">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9974">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9974">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9975">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9975">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9976">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9976">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9977">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9977">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9978">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9978">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9979">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9979">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9980">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9980">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9981">GP 固有の名前: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9981">GP unique name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9982">GP 名: Web サービスを使用したナビゲーション エラーの解決を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9982">GP name: Enable resolution of navigation errors using a web service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9983">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9983">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9984">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9984">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9985">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9985">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9986">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9986">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9987">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9987">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9988">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9988">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9989">値の名前: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9989">Value Name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9990">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9990">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9991">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9991">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9992">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9992">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9993">基本設定キーの名前: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9993">Preference Key Name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9994">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9994">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9995">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9995">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9996">RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9996">RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9997">Microsoft Edge のプライマリ アカウントとして使用できるアカウントを制限する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9997">Restrict which accounts can be used as Microsoft Edge primary accounts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9998">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9998">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-9999">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-9999">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10000">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10000">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10001">Microsoft Edge でブラウザーのプライマリ アカウントとして設定できるアカウント (Sync オプトイン フローで選択されたアカウント) を決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10001">Determines which accounts can be set as browser primary accounts in Microsoft Edge (the account that is chosen during the Sync opt-in flow).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10002">ユーザーがこのパターンに一致しないユーザー名でブラウザーのプライマリ アカウントを構成しようとした場合、ユーザーはブロックされ、適切なエラー メッセージが表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10002">If a user tries to configure a browser primary account with a username that doesn't match this pattern, they are blocked and will get the appropriate error message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10003">パターンに Perl 形式の正規表現を使用して、このポリシーを複数のアカウントに一致するように構成することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10003">You can configure this policy to match multiple accounts using a Perl style regular expression for the pattern.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10004">パターン一致では、大文字と小文字が区別されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10004">Note that pattern matches are case sensitive.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10005">使用する正規表現ルールの詳細については、https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2133903を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10005">For more information about the regular expression rules that are used, refer to https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2133903.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10006">このポリシーを構成していないか、このポリシーを空白のままにしている場合、ユーザーは Microsoft Edge で任意のアカウントをブラウザーのプライマリ アカウントとして設定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10006">If you don't configure this policy or leave it blank, users can set any account as a browser primary account in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10007">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10007">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10008">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10008">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10009">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10009">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10010">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10010">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10011">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10011">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10012">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10012">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10013">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10013">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10014">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10014">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10015">GP 固有の名前: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10015">GP unique name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10016">GP 名: Microsoft Edge のプライマリ アカウントとして使用できるアカウントを制限する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10016">GP name: Restrict which accounts can be used as Microsoft Edge primary accounts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10017">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10017">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10018">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10018">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10019">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10019">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10020">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10020">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10021">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10021">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10022">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10022">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10023">値の名前: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10023">Value Name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10024">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10024">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10025">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10025">Example value:</span></span>

```
".*@contoso.com"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10026">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10026">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10027">基本設定キーの名前: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10027">Preference Key Name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10028">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10028">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>.*@contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10029">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10029">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10030">RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10030">RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10031">ローミング プロファイル ディレクトリを設定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10031">Set the roaming profile directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10032">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10032">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10033">Windows での 85 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10033">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10034">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10034">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10035">プロファイルのローミング コピーを格納するために使用するディレクトリを構成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10035">Configures the directory to use to store the roaming copy of profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10036">このポリシーを有効にすると、[RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) ポリシーも有効にしている限り、Microsoft Edge は提供されたディレクトリを使用してプロファイルのローミング コピーを保存します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10036">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory to store a roaming copy of the profiles, as long as you've also enabled the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10037">[RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) ポリシーを無効にするか、構成しない場合、このポリシーに格納されている値は使用されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10037">If you disable the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy or don't configure it, the value stored in this policy isn't used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10038">使用できる変数の一覧については、「[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)」を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10038">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables you can use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10039">このポリシーを構成していない場合、既定のローミング プロファイル パスが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10039">If you don't configure this policy, the default roaming profile path is used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10040">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10040">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10041">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10041">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10042">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10042">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10043">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10043">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10044">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10044">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10045">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10045">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10046">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10046">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10047">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10047">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10048">GP 固有の名前: RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10048">GP unique name: RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10049">GP 名: ローミング プロファイル ディレクトリを設定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10049">GP name: Set the roaming profile directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10050">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10050">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10051">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10051">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10052">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10052">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10053">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10053">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10054">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10054">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10055">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10055">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10056">値の名前: RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10056">Value Name: RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10057">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10057">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10058">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10058">Example value:</span></span>

```
"${roaming_app_data}\\edge-profile"
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10059">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10059">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10060">RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10060">RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10061">Microsoft Edge プロファイル データのローミング コピーの使用を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10061">Enable using roaming copies for Microsoft Edge profile data</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10062">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10062">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10063">Windows での 85 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10063">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10064">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10064">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10065">Windows でローミング プロファイルを使用するには、このポリシーを有効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10065">Enable this policy to use roaming profiles on Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10066">Microsoft Edge プロファイルに保存されている設定 (お気に入りと基本設定) は、ローミング ユーザー プロファイル フォルダー (または管理者が [RoamingProfileLocation](#roamingprofilelocation) ポリシーを通じて指定した場所) に保存されているファイルにも保存されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10066">The settings stored in Microsoft Edge profiles (favorites and preferences) are also saved to a file stored in the Roaming user profile folder (or the location specified by the administrator through the [RoamingProfileLocation](#roamingprofilelocation) policy).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10067">このポリシーを無効にした場合、または構成しない場合は、通常のローカル プロファイルだけが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10067">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, only the regular local profiles are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10068">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) はクラウド同期を無効にするだけで、このポリシーには影響しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10068">The [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) only disables cloud synchronization and has no impact on this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10069">ローミング ユーザー プロファイルの使用の詳細については、[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058) を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10069">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058) for more information on using roaming user profiles.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10070">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10070">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10071">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10071">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10072">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10072">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10073">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10073">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10074">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10074">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10075">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10075">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10076">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10076">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10077">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10077">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10078">GP 固有の名前: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10078">GP unique name: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10079">GP 名: Microsoft Edge プロファイル データのローミング コピーの使用を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10079">GP name: Enable using roaming copies for Microsoft Edge profile data</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10080">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10080">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10081">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10081">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10082">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10082">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10083">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10083">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10084">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10084">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10085">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10085">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10086">値の名前: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10086">Value Name: RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10087">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10087">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10088">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10088">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10089">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10089">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10090">RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10090">RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10091">Adobe Flash のコンテンツ設定をすべてのコンテンツに拡張する (不使用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10091">Extend Adobe Flash content setting to all content (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10092">不使用: このポリシーは廃止されており、Microsoft Edge 87 以降は機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10092">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10093">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10093">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10094">Windows と macOS での 77 以降、87 まで</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10094">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10095">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10095">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10096">Flash は Microsoft Edge でサポートされなくなったため、このポリシーは機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10096">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10097">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、ユーザーまたはエンタープライズ ポリシーによってコンテンツ設定で Adobe Flash を許可するように設定されている Web サイトに埋め込まれているすべての Adobe Flash コンテンツが実行されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10097">If you enable this policy, all Adobe Flash content embedded in websites that are set to allow Adobe Flash in the content settings -- either by the user or by enterprise policy -- will run.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10098">これには、その他のオリジンおよび/または小さなコンテンツからのコンテンツが含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10098">This includes content from other origins and/or small content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10099">Adobe Flash の実行を許可する Web サイトを制御するには、[DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting)、[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls)、[PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) ポリシーの仕様を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10099">To control which websites are allowed to run Adobe Flash, see the specifications in the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting), [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls), and [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10100">このポリシーを無効にしているか、構成していない場合、その他のオリジン (すぐ上で挙げた 3 つのポリシーで指定されていないサイト) からの Adobe Flash コンテンツや、小さなコンテンツがブロックされる可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10100">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, Adobe Flash content from other origins (from sites that aren't specified in the three policies mentioned immediately above) or small content might be blocked.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10101">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10101">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10102">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10102">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10103">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10103">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10104">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10104">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10105">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10105">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10106">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10106">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10107">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10107">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10108">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10108">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10109">GP 固有の名前: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10109">GP unique name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10110">GP 名: Adobe Flash のコンテンツ設定をすべてのコンテンツに拡張する (不使用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10110">GP name: Extend Adobe Flash content setting to all content (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10111">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10111">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10112">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10112">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10113">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10113">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10114">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10114">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10115">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10115">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10116">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10116">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10117">値の名前: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10117">Value Name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10118">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10118">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10119">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10119">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10120">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10120">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10121">基本設定キーの名前: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10121">Preference Key Name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10122">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10122">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10123">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10123">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10124">SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10124">SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10125">HTTPS の警告ページから続行できるようにする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10125">Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10126">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10126">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10127">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10127">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10128">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10128">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10129">Microsoft Edge では、SSL エラーが発生しているサイトにユーザーがアクセスすると、警告ページが表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10129">Microsoft Edge shows a warning page when users visit sites that have SSL errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10130">このポリシーを有効にしているか、構成していない (既定) 場合、ユーザーはこれらの警告ページをクリック スルーできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10130">If you enable or don't configure (default) this policy, users can click through these warning pages.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10131">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、ユーザーは警告ページをクリックしてもブロックされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10131">If you disable this policy, users are blocked from clicking through any warning page.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10132">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10132">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10133">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10133">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10134">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10134">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10135">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10135">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10136">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10136">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10137">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10137">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10138">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10138">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10139">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10139">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10140">GP 固有の名前: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10140">GP unique name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10141">GP 名: HTTPS の警告ページから続行できるようにする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10141">GP name: Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10142">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10142">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10143">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10143">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10144">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10144">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10145">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10145">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10146">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10146">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10147">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10147">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10148">値の名前: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10148">Value Name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10149">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10149">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10150">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10150">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10151">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10151">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10152">基本設定キーの名前: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10152">Preference Key Name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10153">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10153">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10154">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10154">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10155">SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10155">SSLVersionMin</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10156">最小限の TLS バージョンを有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10156">Minimum TLS version enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10157">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10157">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10158">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10158">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10159">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10159">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10160">TLS の最小限のサポート バージョンを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10160">Sets the minimum supported version of TLS.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10161">このポリシーを構成しない場合、Microsoft Edge では TLS 1.0 と TLS 1.1 にエラーが表示されますが、ユーザーはこれを回避することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10161">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will show an error for TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1, but the user will be able to bypass it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10162">このポリシーを有効にすると、Microsoft Edge は指定されたバージョンより前のバージョンの SSL/TLS を使用しなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10162">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge won't use any version of SSL/TLS lower than the specified version.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10163">認識されない値は、無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10163">Any unrecognized value is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10164">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10164">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10165">TLSv1 (tls1) = TLS 1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10165">TLSv1 (tls1) = TLS 1.0</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10166">TLSv 1.1 (tls 1.1) = TLS 1.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10166">TLSv1.1 (tls1.1) = TLS 1.1</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10167">TLSv 1.2 (tls 1.2) = TLS 1.2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10167">TLSv1.2 (tls1.2) = TLS 1.2</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10168">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10168">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10169">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10169">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10170">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10170">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10171">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10171">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10172">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10172">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10173">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10173">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10174">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10174">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10175">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10175">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10176">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10176">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10177">GP 固有の名前: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10177">GP unique name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10178">GP 名: 最小限の TLS バージョンを有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10178">GP name: Minimum TLS version enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10179">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10179">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10180">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10180">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10181">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10181">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10182">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10182">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10183">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10183">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10184">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10184">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10185">値の名前: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10185">Value Name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10186">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10186">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10187">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10187">Example value:</span></span>

```
"tls1"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10188">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10188">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10189">基本設定キーの名前: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10189">Preference Key Name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10190">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10190">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>tls1</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10191">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10191">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10192">SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10192">SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10193">Microsoft Edge の終了時に cookie を保存する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10193">Save cookies when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10194">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10194">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10195">Windows と macOS での 86 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10195">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10196">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10196">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10197">このポリシーを有効にすると、ブラウザーの終了時に、指定した cookie のセットが削除されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10197">When this policy is enabled, the specified set of cookies is exempt from deletion when the browser closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10198">このポリシーは、次の場合にのみ有効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10198">This policy is only effective when:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10199">'cookie およびその他のサイト データ' の切り替えは、[設定/プライバシー]、[サービス/終了時に閲覧データをクリア]、または</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10199">The 'Cookies and other site data' toggle is configured in Settings/Privacy and services/Clear browsing data on close or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10200">ポリシー [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) が有効な場合、または</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10200">The policy [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) is enabled or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10201">ポリシー [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) が ' セッションの間、cookie を保持する ' に設定されている場合です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10201">The policy [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) is set to 'Keep cookies for the duration of the session'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10202">セッション間で cookie が保存される URL パターンに基づいて、サイト一覧を定義することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10202">You can define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that will have their cookies preserved across sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10203">注: ユーザーは、URL を追加または削除するために cookie サイト一覧を引き続き編集できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10203">Note: Users can still edit the cookie site list to add or remove URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10204">ただし、管理者が追加した URL は削除できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10204">However, they can't remove URLs that have been added by an Admin.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10205">このポリシーを有効にすると、ブラウザーが終了したときに cookie のリストがクリアされません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10205">If you enable this policy, the list of cookies won't be cleared when the browser closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10206">このポリシー設定を無効にするか、または構成しなかった場合は、ユーザーの個人構成が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10206">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the user's personal configuration is used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10207">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10207">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10208">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10208">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10209">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10209">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10210">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10210">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10211">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10211">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10212">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10212">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10213">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10213">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10214">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10214">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10215">GP 固有の名前: SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10215">GP unique name: SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10216">GP 名: Microsoft Edge の終了時に cookie を保存する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10216">GP name: Save cookies when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10217">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10217">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10218">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10218">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10219">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10219">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10220">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10220">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10221">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10221">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10222">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10222">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10223">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10223">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10224">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10224">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10225">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10225">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10226">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10226">Mac information and settings</span></span>
