  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10227">優先順位キー名: SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10227">Preference Key Name: SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10228">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10228">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10229">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10229">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10230">SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10230">SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10231">ブラウザー履歴の保存を無効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10231">Disable saving browser history</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10232">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10232">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10233">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10233">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10234">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10234">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10235">ブラウザーの履歴の保存を無効にし、ユーザーがこの設定を変更できないようにします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10235">Disables saving browser history and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10236">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、閲覧の履歴は保存されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10236">If you enable this policy, browsing history isn't saved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10237">これを無効にすると、タブの同期も無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10237">This also disables tab syncing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10238">このポリシーを無効にしているか、構成していない場合、閲覧の履歴は保存されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10238">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, browsing history is saved.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10239">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10239">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10240">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10240">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10241">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10241">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10242">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10242">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10243">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10243">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10244">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10244">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10245">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10245">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10246">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10246">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10247">GP 固有の名前: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10247">GP unique name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10248">GP 名: ブラウザー履歴の保存を無効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10248">GP name: Disable saving browser history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10249">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10249">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10250">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10250">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10251">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10251">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10252">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10252">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10253">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10253">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10254">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10254">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10255">値の名前: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10255">Value Name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10256">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10256">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10257">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10257">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10258">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10258">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10259">基本設定キーの名前: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10259">Preference Key Name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10260">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10260">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10261">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10261">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10262">ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10262">ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10263">画面キャプチャを許可または拒否する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10263">Allow or deny screen capture</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10264">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10264">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10265">Windows と macOS での 83 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10265">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10266">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10266">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10267">このポリシーを有効にしているか、構成していない場合、Web ページは画面キャプチャに画面の共有 API (たとえば、getDisplayMedia() や デスクトップ キャプチャ拡張 API) を使用することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10267">If you enable this policy, or don't configure this policy, a web page can use screen-share APIs (for example, getDisplayMedia() or the Desktop Capture extension API) for a screen capture.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10268">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、画面の共有 API の呼び出しは失敗します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10268">If you disable this policy, calls to screen-share APIs will fail.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10269">たとえば、Web ベースのオンライン会議を使用している場合、ビデオや画面共有は機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10269">For example, if you're using a web-based online meeting, video or screen sharing will not work.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10270">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10270">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10271">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10271">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10272">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10272">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10273">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10273">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10274">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10274">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10275">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10275">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10276">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10276">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10277">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10277">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10278">GP 固有の名前: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10278">GP unique name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10279">GP 名: 画面キャプチャを許可または拒否する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10279">GP name: Allow or deny screen capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10280">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10280">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10281">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10281">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10282">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10282">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10283">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10283">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10284">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10284">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10285">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10285">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10286">値の名前: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10286">Value Name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10287">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10287">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10288">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10288">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10289">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10289">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10290">基本設定キーの名前: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10290">Preference Key Name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10291">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10291">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10292">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10292">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10293">ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10293">ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10294">URL フラグメントで指定されたテキストへのスクロールを有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10294">Enable scrolling to text specified in URL fragments</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10295">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10295">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10296">Windows と macOS での 83 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10296">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10297">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10297">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10298">この機能により、Web ページの読み込みが終了した後にハイパーリンクやアドレス バーの URL ナビゲーションが、Web ページの特定のテキストをターゲットにしてスクロールできるようになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10298">This feature lets hyperlink and address bar URL navigations target specific text on a web page, which will be scrolled to after the web page finishes loading.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10299">このポリシーを有効にしているか、構成していない場合、URL を介した特定のテキスト フラグメントへの Web ページのスクロールが有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10299">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web page scrolling to specific text fragments via a URL will be enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10300">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、URL を介した特定のテキスト フラグメントへの Web ページのスクロールは無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10300">If you disable this policy, web page scrolling to specific text fragments via a URL will be disabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10301">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10301">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10302">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10302">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10303">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10303">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10304">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10304">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10305">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10305">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10306">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10306">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10307">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10307">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10308">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10308">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10309">GP 固有の名前: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10309">GP unique name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10310">GP 名: URL フラグメントで指定されたテキストへのスクロールを有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10310">GP name: Enable scrolling to text specified in URL fragments</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10311">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10311">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10312">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10312">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10313">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10313">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10314">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10314">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10315">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10315">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10316">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10316">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10317">値の名前: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10317">Value Name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10318">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10318">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10319">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10319">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10320">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10320">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10321">基本設定キーの名前: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10321">Preference Key Name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10322">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10322">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10323">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10323">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10324">SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10324">SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10325">検索候補を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10325">Enable search suggestions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10326">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10326">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10327">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10327">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10328">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10328">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10329">Microsoft Edge のアドレス バーと自動提案一覧での Web 検索候補を有効にし、ユーザーがこのポリシーを変更できないようにします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10329">Enables web search suggestions in Microsoft Edge's Address Bar and Auto-Suggest List and prevents users from changing this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10330">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、Web 検索候補は使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10330">If you enable this policy, web search suggestions are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10331">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、Web 検索候補は使用されませんが、ローカルの履歴やお気に入りの提案は表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10331">If you disable this policy, web search suggestions are never used, however local history and local favorites suggestions still appear.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10332">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、入力した文字も訪問した URL も、Microsoft へのテレメトリには含まれません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10332">If you disable this policy, neither the typed characters, nor the URLs visited will be included in telemetry to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10333">このポリシーを設定していない場合、検索候補は有効になりますが、ユーザーはそれを変更することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10333">If this policy is left not set, search suggestions are enabled but the user can change that.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10334">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10334">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10335">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10335">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10336">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10336">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10337">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10337">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10338">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10338">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10339">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10339">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10340">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10340">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10341">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10341">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10342">GP 固有の名前: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10342">GP unique name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10343">GP 名: 検索候補を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10343">GP name: Enable search suggestions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10344">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10344">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10345">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10345">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10346">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10346">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10347">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10347">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10348">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10348">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10349">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10349">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10350">値の名前: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10350">Value Name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10351">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10351">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10352">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10352">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10353">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10353">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10354">基本設定キーの名前: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10354">Preference Key Name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10355">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10355">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10356">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10356">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10357">SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10357">SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10358">直接的なセキュリティ キーの構成証明を使用するためのアクセス許可を必要としない Web サイトやドメイン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10358">Websites or domains that don't need permission to use direct Security Key attestation</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10359">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10359">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10360">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10360">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10361">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10361">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10362">セキュリティ キーからの構成証明書を要求するときに、明示的なユーザーのアクセス許可を必要としない Web サイトやドメインを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10362">Specifies websites and domains that don't need explicit user permission when attestation certificates from security keys are requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10363">さらに、個別の構成証明が使用できることを示すシグナルがセキュリティ キーに送信されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10363">Additionally, a signal is sent to the security key indicating that it can use individual attestation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10364">これが設定されていない場合、サイトがセキュリティ キーの構成証明を要求するたびに、ユーザーに確認を求めるメッセージが表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10364">Without this, users are prompted each time a site requests attestation of security keys.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10365">サイト (https://contoso.com/some/path) など) は U2F appID としてのみ一致します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10365">Sites (like https://contoso.com/some/path) only match as U2F appIDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10366">ドメイン (contoso.com など) は webauthn RP ID としてのみ一致します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10366">Domains (like contoso.com) only match as webauthn RP IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10367">指定されたサイトの U2F と webauthn API の両方をカバーするには、appID URL とドメインの両方をリスト化する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10367">To cover both U2F and webauthn APIs for a given site, you need to list both the appID URL and domain.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10368">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10368">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10369">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10369">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10370">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10370">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10371">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10371">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10372">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10372">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10373">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10373">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10374">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10374">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10375">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10375">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10376">GP 固有の名前: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10376">GP unique name: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10377">GP 名: 直接的なセキュリティ キーの構成証明を使用するためのアクセス許可を必要としない Web サイトやドメイン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10377">GP name: Websites or domains that don't need permission to use direct Security Key attestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10378">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10378">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10379">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10379">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10380">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10380">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10381">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10381">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10382">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10382">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10383">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10383">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10384">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10384">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10385">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10385">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10386">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10386">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation\1 = "https://contoso.com"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10387">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10387">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10388">基本設定キーの名前: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10388">Preference Key Name: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10389">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10389">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10390">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10390">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10391">SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10391">SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10392">すべてのイントラネット サイトを Internet Explorer に送る</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10392">Send all intranet sites to Internet Explorer</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10393">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10393">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10394">Windows での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10394">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10395">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10395">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10396">Internet Explorer モードで最適なエクスペリエンスを構成する方法については、「[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)」を参照してください</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10396">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10397">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10397">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10398">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10398">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10399">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10399">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10400">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10400">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10401">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10401">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10402">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10402">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10403">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10403">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10404">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10404">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10405">GP 固有の名前: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10405">GP unique name: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10406">GP 名: すべてのイントラネット サイトを Internet Explorer に送る</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10406">GP name: Send all intranet sites to Internet Explorer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10407">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10407">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10408">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10408">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10409">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10409">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10410">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10410">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10411">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10411">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10412">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10412">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10413">値の名前: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10413">Value Name: SendIntranetToInternetExplorer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10414">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10414">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10415">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10415">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10416">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10416">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10417">SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10417">SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10418">Microsoft サービスを向上させるためにサイト情報を送信する (廃止)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10418">Send site information to improve Microsoft services (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10419">不使用: このポリシーは廃止されており、Microsoft Edge 88 以降は機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10419">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10420">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10420">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10421">Windows と macOS での 77 以降、88 まで</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10421">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 88</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10422">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10422">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10423">このポリシーはサポートされなくなりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10423">This policy is no longer supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10424">このポリシーは [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) に置き換えられ (Windows 7、Windows 8、および macOS)、Windows 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)) でテレメトリが許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10424">It is replaced by [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) (for Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS) and Allow Telemetry on Win 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10425">このポリシーでは、検索などのサービスの品質を向上させるために Microsoft Edge で訪問した Web サイトに関する情報を Microsoft に送信できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10425">This policy enables sending info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft to improve services like search.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10426">Microsoft Edge でアクセスした Web サイトに関する情報を Microsoft に送信する場合は、このポリシーを有効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10426">Enable this policy to send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10427">Microsoft Edge でアクセスした Web サイトに関する情報を Microsoft に送信しない場合は、このポリシーを無効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10427">Disable this policy to not send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10428">いずれの場合でも、ユーザーがこの設定を変更または上書きすることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10428">In both cases, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10429">Windows 10 では、このポリシーを構成していない場合、Microsoft Edge は Windows 診断データの設定を既定値として設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10429">On Windows 10, if you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the Windows diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10430">このポリシーが有効になっている場合、Microsoft Edge は、Windows 診断データの設定が [完全] に設定されている場合にのみ、Microsoft Edge でアクセスした Web サイトに関する情報を送信します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10430">If this policy is enabled Microsoft Edge will only send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge if the Windows Diagnostic data setting is set to Full.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10431">このポリシーが無効になっている場合、Microsoft Edge はアクセスした Web サイトに関する情報を送信しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10431">If this policy is disabled Microsoft Edge will not send info about websites visited.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10432">Windows 診断データの設定については、「[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)」を参照してください</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10432">Learn more about Windows Diagnostic data settings: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10433">Windows 7、windows 8、macOS では、このポリシーはアクセスした Web サイトに関する情報の送信を制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10433">On Windows 7, windows 8, and macOS this policy controls sending info about websites visited.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10434">このポリシーを構成しない場合、Microsoft Edge は既定でユーザーの設定に従います。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10434">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10435">このポリシーを有効にするには、 [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) を有効に設定する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10435">To enable this policy, [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) must be set to Enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10436">[SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) または [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) が構成されていないか、または無効になっている場合は、このデータは Microsoft に送信されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10436">If [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) or [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) is Not Configured or Disabled, this data will not be sent to Microsoft.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10437">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10437">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10438">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10438">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10439">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10439">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10440">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10440">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10441">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10441">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10442">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10442">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10443">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10443">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10444">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10444">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10445">一意の GP 名: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10445">GP unique name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10446">GP 名: Microsoft サービスを向上させるためにサイト情報を送信する (廃止)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10446">GP name: Send site information to improve Microsoft services (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10447">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10447">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10448">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10448">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10449">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10449">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10450">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10450">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10451">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10451">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10452">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10452">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10453">値の名前: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10453">Value Name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10454">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10454">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10455">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10455">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10456">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10456">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10457">基本設定キーの名前: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10457">Preference Key Name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10458">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10458">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10459">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10459">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10460">SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10460">SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10461">特定のサイトでのセンサーへのアクセスを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10461">Allow access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10462">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10462">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10463">Windows と macOS での 86 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10463">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10464">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10464">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10465">モーションセンサーや光センサーなどのセンサーにアクセスして使用できるサイトのリストを URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10465">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can access and use sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10466">このポリシーを構成していない場合、 [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値またはユーザーの個人用の構成がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10466">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10467">このポリシーと一致しない URL のパターンの場合、以下が優先順位となります： [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) ポリシー (一致している場合)、 [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合)、またはユーザーの個人用設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10467">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10468">このポリシーで定義されている URL パターンは、 [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) ポリシーで構成されているものと競合することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10468">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10469">URL を許可することも、ブロックすることもできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10469">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10470">有効な URL パターンの詳細については、[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) をご覧ください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10470">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10471">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10471">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10472">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10472">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10473">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10473">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10474">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10474">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10475">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10475">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10476">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10476">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10477">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10477">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10478">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10478">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10479">GP 固有の名前: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10479">GP unique name: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10480">GP 名: 特定のサイトのセンサーへのアクセスを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10480">GP name: Allow access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10481">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10481">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10482">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10482">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10483">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10483">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10484">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10484">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10485">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10485">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10486">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10486">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10487">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10487">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10488">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10488">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10489">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10489">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10490">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10490">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10491">基本設定キー名: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10491">Preference Key Name: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10492">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10492">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10493">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10493">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10494">SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10494">SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10495">特定のサイトでのセンサーへのアクセスをブロックする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10495">Block access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10496">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10496">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10497">Windows と macOS での 86 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10497">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10498">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10498">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10499">モーションセンサーや光センサーなどのセンサーにアクセスできないサイトのリストを、URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10499">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't access sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10500">このポリシーを構成していない場合、 [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値またはユーザーの個人用の構成がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10500">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10501">このポリシーと一致しない URL のパターンの場合、次の優先順位が使用されます。 [SensorsAllowedForUrls Urls](#sensorsallowedforurls)ポリシー (一致するものがある場合)、[DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (設定されている場合)、またはユーザーの個人用設定です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10501">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10502">このポリシーで定義されている URL パターンは、 [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) ポリシーで構成されているものと競合することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10502">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10503">URL を許可することも、ブロックすることもできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10503">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10504">有効な URL パターンの詳細については、[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) をご覧ください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10504">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10505">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10505">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10506">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10506">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10507">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10507">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10508">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10508">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10509">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10509">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10510">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10510">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10511">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10511">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10512">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10512">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10513">GP 固有の名前: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10513">GP unique name: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10514">GP 名: 特定のサイトのセンサーへのアクセスをブロックする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10514">GP name: Block access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10515">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10515">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10516">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10516">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10517">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10517">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10518">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10518">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10519">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10519">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10520">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10520">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10521">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10521">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10522">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10522">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10523">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10523">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10524">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10524">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10525">基本設定キーの名前: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10525">Preference Key Name: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10526">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10526">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10527">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10527">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10528">SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10528">SerialAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10529">特定のサイトでのシリアル API を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10529">Allow the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10530">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10530">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10531">Windows と macOS での 86 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10531">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10532">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10532">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10533">シリアルポートへのアクセスをユーザーに対して確認することができるサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10533">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can ask the user for access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10534">このポリシーを構成していない場合、[DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値または、ユーザーの個人用の構成がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10534">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10535">このポリシーと一致しない URL のパターンの場合、以下が優先順位です：[SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) ポリシー (一致している場合)、 [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合)、またはユーザーの個人用設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10535">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10536">このポリシーで定義されている URL パターンは、 [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) ポリシーで構成されているものと競合することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10536">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10537">URL を許可することも、ブロックすることもできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10537">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10538">有効な URL パターンの詳細については、[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) をご覧ください</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10538">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10539">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10539">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10540">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10540">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10541">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10541">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10542">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10542">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10543">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10543">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10544">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10544">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10545">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10545">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10546">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10546">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10547">GP 固有の名前: SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10547">GP unique name: SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10548">GP 名: 特定のサイトのシリアル API を許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10548">GP name: Allow the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10549">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10549">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10550">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10550">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10551">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10551">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10552">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10552">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10553">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10553">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10554">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10554">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10555">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10555">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10556">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10556">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10557">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10557">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10558">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10558">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10559">基本設定キーの名前: SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10559">Preference Key Name: SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10560">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10560">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10561">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10561">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10562">SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10562">SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10563">特定のサイトでのシリアル API をブロックする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10563">Block the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10564">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10564">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10565">Windows と macOS での 86 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10565">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10566">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10566">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10567">シリアルポートへのアクセス権の付与をユーザーに対して確認することができないサイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10567">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't ask the user to grant them access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10568">このポリシーを構成していない場合、[DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合) からのグローバルな既定値または、ユーザーの個人用の構成がすべてのサイトで使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10568">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10569">このポリシーと一致しない URL のパターンの場合、以下の優先順位が使用されます： [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) ポリシー (一致している場合)、 [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) ポリシー (設定されている場合)、またはユーザーの個人用設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10569">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10570">このポリシーの URL パターンは、[WebUsbAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) ポリシーで構成されたものと競合することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10570">The URL patterns in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10571">URL を許可することも、ブロックすることもできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10571">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10572">有効な URL パターンの詳細については、[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) をご覧ください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10572">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10573">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10573">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10574">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10574">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10575">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10575">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10576">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10576">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10577">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10577">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10578">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10578">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10579">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10579">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10580">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10580">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10581">GP 固有の名前: SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10581">GP unique name: SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10582">GP 名: 特定のサイトのシリアル API をブロックする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10582">GP name: Block the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10583">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10583">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10584">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10584">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10585">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10585">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10586">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10586">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10587">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10587">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10588">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10588">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10589">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10589">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10590">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10590">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10591">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10591">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10592">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10592">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10593">基本設定キーの名前: SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10593">Preference Key Name: SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10594">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10594">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10595">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10595">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10596">ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10596">ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10597">Microsoft Rewards のエクスペリエンスを表示する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10597">Show Microsoft Rewards experiences</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10598">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10598">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10599">Windows と macOS での 88 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10599">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10600">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10600">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10601">Microsoft Rewards のエクスペリエンスと通知を表示します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10601">Show Microsoft Rewards experience and notifications.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10602">このポリシーを有効にした場合:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10602">If you enable this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10603">検索とポイント獲得を利用している Microsoft アカウント ユーザー (Azure AD アカウントを除く) は、Microsoft Edge のユーザー プロファイルに Microsoft Rewards のエクスペリエンスが表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10603">Microsoft account users (excludes Azure AD accounts) in search and earn markets will see the Microsoft Rewards experience in their Microsoft Edge user profile.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10604">Microsoft Edge の設定での Microsoft Rewards の設定は有効になり、オンになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10604">The setting to enable Microsoft Rewards in Microsoft Edge settings will be enabled and toggled on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10605">このポリシーを無効にした場合:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10605">If you disable this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10606">検索とポイント獲得を利用している Microsoft アカウント ユーザー (Azure AD アカウントを除く) は、Microsoft Edge のユーザー プロファイルに Microsoft Rewards のエクスペリエンスが表示されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10606">Microsoft account users (excludes Azure AD accounts) in search and earn markets will not see the Microsoft Rewards experience in their Microsoft Edge user profile.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10607">Microsoft Edge の設定での Microsoft Rewards の設定は無効になり、オフになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10607">The setting to enable Microsoft Rewards in Microsoft Edge settings will be disabled and toggled off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10608">このポリシーを構成しない場合:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10608">If you don't configure this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10609">検索とポイント獲得を利用している Microsoft アカウント ユーザー (Azure AD アカウントを除く) は、Microsoft Edge のユーザー プロファイルに Microsoft Rewards のエクスペリエンスが表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10609">Microsoft account users (excludes Azure AD accounts) in search and earn markets will see the Microsoft Rewards experience in their Microsoft Edge user profile.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10610">Microsoft Edge の設定での Microsoft Rewards の設定は有効になり、オンになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10610">The setting to enable Microsoft Rewards in Microsoft Edge settings will be enabled and toggled on.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10611">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10611">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10612">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10612">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10613">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10613">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10614">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10614">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10615">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10615">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10616">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10616">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10617">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10617">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10618">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10618">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10619">GP 固有の名前: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10619">GP unique name: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10620">GP 名: Microsoft Rewards エクスペリエンスを表示する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10620">GP name: Show Microsoft Rewards experiences</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10621">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10621">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10622">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10622">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10623">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10623">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10624">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10624">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10625">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10625">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10626">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10626">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10627">値の名前: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10627">Value Name: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10628">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10628">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10629">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10629">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10630">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10630">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10631">基本設定キーの名前: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10631">Preference Key Name: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10632">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10632">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10633">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10633">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10634">ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10634">ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
