  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10635">お気に入り バーにMicrosoft Office のショートカットを表示する (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10635">Show Microsoft Office shortcut in favorites bar (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10636">非推奨: このポリシーは推奨されなくなっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10636">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10637">現在はサポートされていますが、将来のリリースで廃止されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10637">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10638">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10638">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10639">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10639">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10640">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10640">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10641">このポリシーは、運用要件の変更のため、期待どおりに動作しませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10641">This policy didn't work as expected due to changes in operational requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10642">そのため、使用されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10642">Therefore it's deprecated and should not be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10643">お気に入り バーに Office.com へのショートカットを表示するどうかを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10643">Specifies whether to include a shortcut to Office.com in the favorites bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10644">Microsoft Edge にサインインしているユーザーの場合、ショートカットはユーザーを Microsoft Office のアプリやドキュメントへと移動させます。このポリシーを有効にしているか、構成していない場合、ユーザーはお気に入り バーのコンテキスト メニューのトグルを変更することで、ショートカットを表示するかどうかを選択することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10644">For users signed into Microsoft Edge the shortcut takes users to their Microsoft Office apps and docs. If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can choose whether to see the shortcut by changing the toggle in the favorites bar context menu.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10645">このポリシーを無効にすると、ショートカットが表示されなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10645">If you disable this policy, the shortcut isn't shown.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10646">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10646">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10647">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10647">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10648">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10648">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10649">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10649">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10650">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10650">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10651">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10651">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10652">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10652">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10653">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10653">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10654">GP 固有の名前: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10654">GP unique name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10655">GP 名: お気に入り バーに Microsoft Office のショートカットを表示する（非推奨）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10655">GP name: Show Microsoft Office shortcut in favorites bar (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10656">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10656">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10657">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10657">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10658">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10658">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10659">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10659">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10660">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10660">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10661">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10661">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10662">値の名前: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10662">Value Name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10663">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10663">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10664">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10664">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10665">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10665">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10666">基本設定キーの名前: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10666">Preference Key Name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10667">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10667">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10668">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10668">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10669">SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10669">SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10670">Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) のサポートを有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10670">Enable Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) support</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10671">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10671">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10672">Windows と macOS での 78 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10672">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10673">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10673">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10674">Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) のサポートを有効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10674">Enable support for Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10675">このポリシーを設定していないか、有効にしている場合、Microsoft Edge は Signed HTTP Exchange として提供されている Web コンテンツを受け入れます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10675">If this policy isn't set or enabled, Microsoft Edge will accept web contents served as Signed HTTP Exchanges.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10676">このポリシーを無効に設定している場合、Signed HTTP Exchange を読み込むことはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10676">If this policy is set to disabled, Signed HTTP Exchanges can't be loaded.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10677">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10677">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10678">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10678">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10679">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10679">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10680">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10680">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10681">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10681">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10682">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10682">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10683">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10683">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10684">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10684">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10685">GP 固有の名前: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10685">GP unique name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10686">GP 名: Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) のサポートを有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10686">GP name: Enable Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) support</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10687">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10687">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10688">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10688">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10689">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10689">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10690">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10690">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10691">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10691">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10692">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10692">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10693">値の名前: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10693">Value Name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10694">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10694">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10695">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10695">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10696">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10696">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10697">基本設定キーの名前: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10697">Preference Key Name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10698">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10698">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10699">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10699">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10700">SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10700">SitePerProcess</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10701">すべてのサイトでのサイトの分離を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10701">Enable site isolation for every site</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10702">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10702">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10703">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10703">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10704">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10704">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10705">"SitePerProcess" ポリシーは、すべてのサイトを分離する既定の動作をユーザーがオプトアウトしないようにするために使用することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10705">The 'SitePerProcess' policy can be used to prevent users from opting out of the default behavior of isolating all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10706">[IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) ポリシーを使用して、さらに詳細な追加のオリジンを分離することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10706">Note that you can also use the [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) policy to isolate additional, finer-grained origins.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10707">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、各サイトが独自のプロセスで実行する既定の動作をユーザーがオプトアウトすることができなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10707">If you enable this policy, users can't opt out of the default behavior where each site runs in its own process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10708">このポリシーを無効にしているか、構成していない場合、ユーザーはサイトの分離をオプトアウトすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10708">If you disable or don't configure this policy, a user can opt out of site isolation.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10709">(たとえば edge://flags の "サイトの分離を無効にする" エントリを使用して) ポリシーを無効にしたり、または構成しなかったりしても、サイトの分離はオフにはなりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10709">(For example, by using "Disable site isolation" entry in edge://flags.)  Disabling the policy or not configuring the policy doesn't turn off Site Isolation.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10710">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10710">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10711">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10711">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10712">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10712">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10713">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10713">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10714">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10714">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10715">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10715">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10716">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10716">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10717">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10717">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10718">GP 固有の名前: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10718">GP unique name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10719">GP 名: すべてのサイトでのサイトの分離を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10719">GP name: Enable site isolation for every site</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10720">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10720">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10721">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10721">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10722">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10722">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10723">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10723">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10724">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10724">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10725">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10725">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10726">値の名前: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10726">Value Name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10727">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10727">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10728">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10728">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10729">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10729">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10730">基本設定キーの名前: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10730">Preference Key Name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10731">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10731">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10732">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10732">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10733">SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10733">SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10734">Configure Speech Recognition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10734">Configure Speech Recognition</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10735">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10735">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10736">Windows と macOS での 87 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10736">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10737">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10737">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10738">Set whether websites can use the W3C Web Speech API to recognize speech from the user.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10738">Set whether websites can use the W3C Web Speech API to recognize speech from the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10739">Microsoft Edge 実装では、Azure の認識サービスを使用しているため、音声データはコンピューターから離脱します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10739">The Microsoft Edge implementation of the Web Speech API uses Azure Cognitive Services, so voice data will leave the machine.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10740">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web-based applications that use the Web Speech API can use Speech Recognition.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10740">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web-based applications that use the Web Speech API can use Speech Recognition.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10741">If you disable this policy, Speech Recognition is not available through the Web Speech API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10741">If you disable this policy, Speech Recognition is not available through the Web Speech API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10742">この機能の詳細については、以下を参照してください。SpeechRecognition API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10742">Read more about this feature here: SpeechRecognition API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10743">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10743">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10744">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10744">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10745">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10745">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10746">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10746">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10747">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10747">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10748">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10748">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10749">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10749">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10750">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10750">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10751">GP unique name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10751">GP unique name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10752">GP name: Configure Speech Recognition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10752">GP name: Configure Speech Recognition</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10753">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10753">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10754">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10754">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10755">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10755">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10756">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10756">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10757">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10757">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10758">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10758">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10759">Value Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10759">Value Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10760">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10760">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10761">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10761">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10762">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10762">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10763">Preference Key Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10763">Preference Key Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10764">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10764">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10765">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10765">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10766">SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10766">SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10767">スペルチェックを有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10767">Enable spellcheck</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10768">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10768">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10769">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10769">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10770">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10770">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10771">このポリシーを有効にしているか、構成していない場合、ユーザーはスペルチェックを使用することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10771">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the user can use spellcheck.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10772">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、ユーザーはスペルチェックを使用できなくなり、[SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) ポリシーと [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) ポリシーも無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10772">If you disable this policy, the user can't use spellcheck and the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) and [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) policies are also disabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10773">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10773">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10774">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10774">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10775">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10775">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10776">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10776">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10777">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10777">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10778">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10778">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10779">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10779">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10780">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10780">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10781">GP 固有の名前: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10781">GP unique name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10782">GP 名: スペルチェックを有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10782">GP name: Enable spellcheck</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10783">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10783">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10784">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10784">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10785">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10785">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10786">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10786">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10787">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10787">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10788">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10788">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10789">値の名前: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10789">Value Name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10790">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10790">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10791">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10791">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10792">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10792">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10793">基本設定キーの名前: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10793">Preference Key Name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10794">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10794">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10795">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10795">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10796">SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10796">SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10797">特定のスペルチェック言語を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10797">Enable specific spellcheck languages</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10798">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10798">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10799">Windows での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10799">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10800">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10800">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10801">スペルチェックに使用する異なる言語を有効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10801">Enables different languages for spellcheck.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10802">認識されない言語を指定している場合には、その言語は無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10802">Any language that you specify that isn't recognized is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10803">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、指定されている言語やユーザーが有効にした言語に対してスペルチェックが有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10803">If you enable this policy, spellcheck is enabled for the languages specified, as well as any languages the user has enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10804">このポリシーを構成していないか、または無効の場合、ユーザーのスペルチェックの設定は変更されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10804">If you don't configure or disable this policy, there's no change to the user's spellcheck preferences.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10805">[SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) ポリシーが無効になっている場合、このポリシーには何の効果もありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10805">If the [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) policy is disabled, this policy will have no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10806">"SpellcheckLanguage" ポリシーと [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) ポリシーの両方に言語が含まれている場合、スペルチェック言語は有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10806">If a language is included in both the 'SpellcheckLanguage' and the [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) policy, the spellcheck language is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10807">サポートされている言語は、以下の通りです: af、bg、ca、cs、cy、da、de、el、en-AU、en-CA、en-GB、en-US、es、es-419、es-AR、es-ES、es-MX、es-US、et、fa、fo、fr、he、hi、hr、hu、id、it、ko、lt、lv、nb、nl、pl、pt-BR、pt-PT、ro、ru、sh、sk、sl、sq、sr、sv、ta、tg、tr、uk、vi。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10807">The supported languages are: af, bg, ca, cs, cy, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10808">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10808">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10809">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10809">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10810">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10810">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10811">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10811">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10812">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10812">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10813">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10813">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10814">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10814">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10815">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10815">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10816">GP 固有の名前: SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10816">GP unique name: SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10817">GP 名: 特定のスペルチェック言語を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10817">GP name: Enable specific spellcheck languages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10818">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10818">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10819">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10819">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10820">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10820">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10821">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10821">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10822">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10822">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10823">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10823">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10824">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10824">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10825">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10825">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10826">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10826">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage\1 = "fr"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage\2 = "es"

```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10827">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10827">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10828">SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10828">SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10829">スペルチェック言語の無効化を強制する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10829">Force disable spellcheck languages</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10830">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10830">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10831">Windows での 78 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10831">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10832">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10832">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10833">スペルチェック言語の無効化を強制します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10833">Force-disables spellcheck languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10834">そのリスト内の認識されない言語は、無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10834">Unrecognized languages in that list will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10835">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、指定した言語に対するスペルチェックは無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10835">If you enable this policy, spellcheck will be disabled for the languages specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10836">ユーザーは、リストにない言語のスペルチェックも有効または無効にすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10836">The user can still enable or disable spellcheck for languages not in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10837">このポリシーを構成しないか、または無効にする場合、ユーザーのスペルチェックの設定は変更されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10837">If you do not set this policy, or disable it, there will be no change to the user's spellcheck preferences.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10838">[SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) ポリシーが無効に設定されている場合、このポリシーには何の効果もありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10838">If the [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) policy is set to disabled, this policy will have no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10839">[SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) ポリシーと "SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist" ポリシーの両方に言語が含まれている場合、スペルチェック言語は有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10839">If a language is included in both the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) and the 'SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist' policy, the spellcheck language is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10840">現在サポートされている言語は、以下の通りです: af、bg、ca、cs、da、de、el、en-AU、en-CA、en-GB、en-US、es、es-419、es-AR、es-ES、es-MX、es-US、et、fa、fo、fr、he、hi、hr、hu、id、it、ko、lt、lv、nb、nl、pl、pt-BR、pt-PT、ro、ru、sh、sk、sl、sq、sr、sv、ta、tg、tr、uk、vi。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10840">The currently supported languages are: af, bg, ca, cs, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10841">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10841">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10842">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10842">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10843">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10843">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10844">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10844">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10845">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10845">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10846">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10846">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10847">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10847">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10848">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10848">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10849">GP 固有の名前: SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10849">GP unique name: SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10850">GP 名: スペルチェック言語の無効化を強制する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10850">GP name: Force disable spellcheck languages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10851">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10851">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10852">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10852">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10853">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10853">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10854">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10854">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10855">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10855">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10856">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10856">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10857">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10857">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10858">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10858">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10859">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10859">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist\1 = "fr"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist\2 = "es"

```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10860">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10860">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10861">StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10861">StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10862">混在したコンテンツに対するより厳密な扱いを有効にする (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10862">Enable stricter treatment for mixed content (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10863">非推奨: このポリシーは推奨されなくなっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10863">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10864">現在はサポートされていますが、将来のリリースで廃止されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10864">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10865">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10865">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10866">Windows と macOS での 81 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10866">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10867">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10867">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10868">このポリシーは、企業の Web コンテンツが、混在したコンテンツのより厳密な扱いと互換していないことが判明した場合に、Web コンテンツの更新に時間を割くための短期のメカニズムとしてのみ機能することを目的としているため、推奨されていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10868">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with stricter mixed content treatment.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10869">Microsoft Edge バージョン 85 では機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10869">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 85.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10870">このポリシーでは、混在したコンテンツ (HTTPS サイト内の HTTP コンテンツ) のブラウザーでの処理を制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10870">This policy controls the treatment for mixed content (HTTP content in HTTPS sites) in the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10871">このポリシーを true に設定しているか、設定していない場合、音声と動画の混在したコンテンツは自動的に HTTPS へとアップグレードされ (つまり、リソースが HTTPS で利用できない場合でも、フォールバックなしで URL が HTTPS として書き換えられます)、画像の混在したコンテンツの URL バーには「セキュリティ保護なし」という警告が表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10871">If you set this policy to true or not set, audio and video mixed content will be automatically upgraded to HTTPS (that is, the URL will be rewritten as HTTPS, without a fallback if the resource isn't available over HTTPS) and a 'Not Secure' warning will be shown in the URL bar for image mixed content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10872">このポリシーを false に設定している場合、音声と動画では自動アップグレードが無効になり、画像では警告が表示されなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10872">If you set the policy to false, auto upgrades will be disabled for audio and video, and no warning will be shown for images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10873">このポリシーは、音声、動画、画像以外の混在したコンテンツには影響しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10873">This policy does not affect other types of mixed content other than audio, video, and images.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10874">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10874">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10875">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10875">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10876">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10876">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10877">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10877">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10878">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10878">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10879">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10879">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10880">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10880">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10881">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10881">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10882">GP 固有の名前: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10882">GP unique name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10883">GP 名: 混在したコンテンツに対するより厳密な扱いを有効にする (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10883">GP name: Enable stricter treatment for mixed content (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10884">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10884">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10885">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10885">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10886">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10886">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10887">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10887">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10888">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10888">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10889">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10889">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10890">値の名前: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10890">Value Name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10891">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10891">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10892">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10892">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10893">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10893">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10894">基本設定キーの名前: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10894">Preference Key Name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10895">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10895">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10896">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10896">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10897">SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10897">SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10898">サポートされていない OS の警告を非表示にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10898">Suppress the unsupported OS warning</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10899">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10899">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10900">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10900">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10901">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10901">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10902">サポート対象外のコンピューターまたはオペレーティング システムで Microsoft Edge が実行されている場合に表示される警告を抑制します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10902">Suppresses the warning that appears when Microsoft Edge is running on a computer or operating system that is no longer supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10903">このポリシーを false に設定しているか、設定していない場合、そういったサポート対象外のコンピューターやオペレーティング システムに対しては警告が表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10903">If this policy is false or unset, the warnings will appear on such unsupported computers or operating systems.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10904">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10904">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10905">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10905">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10906">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10906">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10907">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10907">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10908">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10908">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10909">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10909">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10910">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10910">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10911">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10911">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10912">GP 固有の名前: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10912">GP unique name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10913">GP 名: サポートされていない OS の警告を非表示にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10913">GP name: Suppress the unsupported OS warning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10914">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10914">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10915">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10915">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10916">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10916">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10917">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10917">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10918">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10918">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10919">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10919">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10920">値の名前: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10920">Value Name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10921">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10921">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10922">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10922">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10923">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10923">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10924">基本設定キーの名前: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10924">Preference Key Name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10925">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10925">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10926">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10926">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10927">SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10927">SyncDisabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10928">Microsoft 同期サービスを使用してデータの同期を無効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10928">Disable synchronization of data using Microsoft sync services</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10929">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10929">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10930">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10930">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10931">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10931">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10932">Microsoft Edge でのデータ同期を無効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10932">Disables data synchronization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10933">また、このポリシーにより、同期に対する同意を確認するメッセージも表示されなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10933">This policy also prevents the sync consent prompt from appearing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10934">このポリシーはクラウド同期のみを無効にし、[RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) ポリシーには影響しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10934">This policy disables cloud synchronization only and has no impact on the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10935">このポリシーを設定していないか、推奨通りに適用していない場合、ユーザーは同期のオン/オフを切り替えることができるようになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10935">If you don't set this policy or apply it as recommended, users will be able to turn sync on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10936">このポリシーを必須として適用している場合、ユーザーは同期をオンにすることができなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10936">If you apply this policy as mandatory, users will not be able to turn sync on.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10937">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10937">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10938">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10938">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10939">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10939">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10940">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10940">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10941">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10941">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10942">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10942">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10943">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10943">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10944">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10944">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10945">GP 固有の名前: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10945">GP unique name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10946">GP 名: Microsoft 同期サービスを使用してデータの同期を無効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10946">GP name: Disable synchronization of data using Microsoft sync services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10947">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10947">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10948">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10948">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10949">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10949">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10950">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10950">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10951">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10951">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10952">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10952">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10953">値の名前: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10953">Value Name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10954">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10954">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10955">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10955">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10956">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10956">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10957">基本設定キーの名前: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10957">Preference Key Name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10958">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10958">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10959">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10959">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10960">SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10960">SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10961">同期から除外される種類の一覧を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10961">Configure the list of types that are excluded from synchronization</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10962">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10962">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10963">Windows と macOS での 83 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10963">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10964">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10964">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10965">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、指定されたすべてのデータの種類が同期から除外されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10965">If you enable this policy all the specified data types will be excluded from synchronization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10966">このポリシーを使用して、Microsoft Edge 同期サービスにアップロードされるデータの種類を制限することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10966">This policy can be used to limit the type of data uploaded to the Microsoft Edge synchronization service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10967">このポリシーには、次のデータの種類のいずれかを指定することができます: "favorites"、"settings"、"passwords"、"addressesAndMore"、"extensions"、"history"、"openTabs"、および "collections"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10967">You can provide one of the following data types for this policy: "favorites", "settings", "passwords", "addressesAndMore", "extensions", "history", "openTabs", and "collections".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10968">これらのデータの種類の名前は、大文字と小文字を区別します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10968">Note that these data type names are case sensitive.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10969">ユーザーが無効なデータの種類を上書きすることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10969">Users will not be able to override the disabled data types.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10970">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10970">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10971">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10971">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10972">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10972">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10973">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10973">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10974">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10974">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10975">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10975">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10976">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10976">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10977">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10977">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10978">GP 固有の名前: SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10978">GP unique name: SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10979">GP 名: 同期から除外される種類の一覧を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10979">GP name: Configure the list of types that are excluded from synchronization</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10980">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10980">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10981">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10981">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10982">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10982">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10983">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10983">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10984">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10984">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10985">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10985">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10986">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10986">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10987">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10987">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10988">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10988">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled\1 = "favorites"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10989">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10989">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10990">基本設定キーの名前: SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10990">Preference Key Name: SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10991">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10991">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>favorites</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10992">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10992">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10993">TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10993">TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10994">ローカル トラスト アンカーの TLS 1.3 セキュリティ機能を有効にする (不使用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10994">Enable a TLS 1.3 security feature for local trust anchors (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10995">不使用: このポリシーは廃止されており、Microsoft Edge 85 以降は機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10995">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 85.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10996">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10996">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10997">Windows と macOS での 81 以降、85 まで</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10997">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 85</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10998">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10998">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-10999">このポリシーは、企業が影響を受けるプロキシをアップグレードする時間を確保するための短期メカニズムとして機能することを目的としていたため、機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-10999">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to upgrade affected proxies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11000">このポリシーでは、ダウングレード攻撃から接続を保護する TLS 1.3 のセキュリティ機能を制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11000">This policy controls a security feature in TLS 1.3 that protects connections against downgrade attacks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11001">これには下位互換性があり、準拠している TLS 1.2 サーバーやプロキシへの接続には影響しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11001">It is backwards-compatible and will not affect connections to compliant TLS 1.2 servers or proxies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11002">しかし、一部の TLS インターセプト プロキシの古いバージョンには実装上の欠陥があり、互換性がありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11002">However, older versions of some TLS-intercepting proxies have an implementation flaw which causes them to be incompatible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11003">このポリシーを有効にしているか、設定していない場合、Microsoft Edge はすべての接続に対してこれらのセキュリティ保護を有効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11003">If you enable this policy or don't set it, Microsoft Edge will enable these security protections for all connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11004">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、Microsoft Edge は、ローカルにインストールされた CA 証明書で認証された接続に対して、これらのセキュリティ保護を無効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11004">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will disable these security protections for connections authenticated with locally-installed CA certificates.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11005">これらの保護は、公的に信頼されている CA 証明書で認証された接続に対しては常に有効になっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11005">These protections are always enabled for connections authenticated with publicly-trusted CA certificates.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11006">このポリシーは、影響を受けるプロキシのテストやそれらのアップグレードに使用される場合があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11006">This policy can be used to test for any affected proxies and upgrade them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11007">影響を受けるプロキシは、ERR_TLS13_DOWNGRADE_DETECTED のエラー コードとともに接続に失敗することが予想されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11007">Affected proxies are expected to fail connections with an error code of ERR_TLS13_DOWNGRADE_DETECTED.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11008">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11008">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11009">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11009">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11010">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11010">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11011">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11011">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11012">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11012">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11013">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11013">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11014">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11014">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11015">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11015">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11016">GP 固有の名前: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11016">GP unique name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11017">GP 名: ローカル トラスト アンカーの TLS 1.3 セキュリティ機能を有効にする (不使用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11017">GP name: Enable a TLS 1.3 security feature for local trust anchors (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11018">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11018">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11019">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11019">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11020">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11020">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11021">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11021">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11022">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11022">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11023">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11023">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11024">値の名前: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11024">Value Name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11025">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11025">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11026">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11026">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11027">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11027">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11028">基本設定キーの名前: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11028">Preference Key Name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11029">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11029">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11030">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11030">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11031">TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11031">TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11032">無効にする TLS 暗号スイートを指定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11032">Specify the TLS cipher suites to disable</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11033">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11033">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11034">Windows と macOS での 85 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11034">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11035">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11035">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11036">TLS 接続に対して無効になっている暗号スイートのリストを構成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11036">Configure the list of cipher suites that are disabled for TLS connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11037">このポリシーを構成する場合、TLS 接続を確立するときに、構成済みの暗号スイートのリストが使用されることはありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11037">If you configure this policy, the list of configured cipher suites will not be used when establishing TLS connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11038">このポリシーを構成しない場合は、ブラウザーによって、使用する TLS 暗号スイートが選択されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11038">If you don't configure this policy, the browser will choose which TLS cipher suites to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11039">無効にする暗号スイート値は、16 ビット 16 進値として指定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11039">Cipher suite values to be disabled are specified as 16-bit hexadecimal values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11040">これらの値は、Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) レジストリによって割り当てられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11040">The values are assigned by the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) registry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11041">TLS 1.3 暗号スイート TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 (0x1301) は TLS 1.3 に必要です。このポリシーでは無効にすることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11041">The TLS 1.3 cipher suite TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 (0x1301) is required for TLS 1.3 and can't be disabled by this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11042">このポリシーは、QUIC ベースの接続には影響しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11042">This policy does not affect QUIC-based connections.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11043">QUIC は、[QuicAllowed](#quicallowed) ポリシーによってオフにすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11043">QUIC can be turned off via the [QuicAllowed](#quicallowed) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11044">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11044">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11045">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11045">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11046">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11046">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11047">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11047">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11048">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11048">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11049">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11049">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11050">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11050">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11051">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11051">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11052">GP 固有の名前: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11052">GP unique name: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11053">GP 名: 無効にする TLS 暗号スイートを指定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11053">GP name: Specify the TLS cipher suites to disable</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11054">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11054">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11055">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11055">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
