  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11056">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11056">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11057">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11057">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11058">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11058">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11059">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11059">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11060">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11060">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11061">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11061">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11062">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11062">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\1 = "0x1303"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\2 = "0xcca8"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\3 = "0xcca9"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11063">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11063">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11064">基本設定キーの名前: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11064">Preference Key Name: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11065">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11065">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>0x1303</string>
  <string>0xcca8</string>
  <string>0xcca9</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11066">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11066">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11067">TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11067">TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11068">バックグラウンド タブのフリーズを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11068">Allow freezing of background tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11069">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11069">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11070">Windows と macOS での 79 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11070">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11071">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11071">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11072">Microsoft Edge がバックグラウンドにあるタブを 5 分以上フリーズさせることができるかどうかを制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11072">Controls whether Microsoft Edge can freeze tabs that are in the background for at least 5 minutes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11073">タブのフリーズは、CPU、バッテリー、メモリの使用量を削減します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11073">Tab freezing reduces CPU, battery, and memory usage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11074">Microsoft Edge では、通知の表示、サウンドの再生、動画のストリーミングなど、バックグラウンドで役に立つ作業を行うタブのフリーズを回避するためにヒューリスティックを使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11074">Microsoft Edge uses heuristics to avoid freezing tabs that do useful work in the background, such as display notifications, play sound, and stream video.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11075">このポリシーを有効にしているか、構成していない場合、バックグラウンドで少なくとも 5 分以上経過したタブがフリーズする可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11075">If you enable or don't configure this policy, tabs that have been in the background for at least 5 minutes might be frozen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11076">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、タブはフリーズしません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11076">If you disable this policy, no tabs will be frozen.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11077">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11077">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11078">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11078">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11079">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11079">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11080">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11080">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11081">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11081">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11082">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11082">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11083">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11083">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11084">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11084">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11085">GP 固有の名前: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11085">GP unique name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11086">GP 名: バックグラウンド タブのフリーズを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11086">GP name: Allow freezing of background tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11087">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11087">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11088">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11088">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11089">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11089">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11090">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11090">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11091">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11091">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11092">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11092">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11093">値の名前: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11093">Value Name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11094">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11094">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11095">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11095">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11096">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11096">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11097">基本設定キーの名前: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11097">Preference Key Name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11098">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11098">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11099">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11099">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11100">TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11100">TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11101">_blank を対象とするリンクに window.opener を設定しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11101">Do not set window.opener for links targeting _blank</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11102">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11102">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11103">Windows と macOS での 88 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11103">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11104">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11104">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11105">このポリシーを有効にするか、設定しないままにした場合、アンカーで rel="opener" が指定されていない限り、window.opener プロパティは null に設定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11105">If you enable this policy or leave it unset, the window.opener property is set to null unless the anchor specifies rel="opener".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11106">このポリシーを無効にした場合、_blank を対象とするポップアップが (JavaScript 経由で) ポップアップを開くことを要求するページにアクセスすることが許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11106">If you disable this policy, popups that target _blank are permitted to access (via JavaScript) the page that requested to open the popup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11107">このポリシーは、Microsoft Edge バージョン 95 で廃止されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11107">This policy will be obsoleted in Microsoft Edge version 95.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11108">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11108">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11109">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11109">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11110">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11110">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11111">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11111">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11112">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11112">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11113">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11113">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11114">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11114">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11115">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11115">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11116">一意の GP 名: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11116">GP unique name: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11117">GP 名: _blank を対象とするリンクに window.opener を設定しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11117">GP name: Do not set window.opener for links targeting _blank</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11118">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11118">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11119">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11119">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11120">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11120">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11121">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11121">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11122">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11122">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11123">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11123">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11124">値の名前: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11124">Value Name: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11125">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11125">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11126">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11126">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11127">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11127">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11128">Preference Key Name: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11128">Preference Key Name: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11129">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11129">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11130">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11130">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11131">TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11131">TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11132">ブラウザーのタスク マネージャーで終了プロセスを有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11132">Enable ending processes in the Browser task manager</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11133">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11133">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11134">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11134">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11135">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11135">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11136">このポリシーを有効にしているか、構成していない場合、ユーザーはブラウザーのタスク マネージャーでプロセスを終了することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11136">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can end processes in the Browser task manager.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11137">無効にしている場合、ユーザーはプロセスを終了することができず、ブラウザーのタスク マネージャーの [プロセスの終了] ボタンが無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11137">If you disable it, users can't end processes, and the End process button is disabled in the Browser task manager.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11138">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11138">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11139">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11139">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11140">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11140">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11141">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11141">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11142">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11142">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11143">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11143">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11144">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11144">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11145">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11145">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11146">GP 固有の名前: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11146">GP unique name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11147">GP 名: ブラウザーのタスク マネージャーで終了プロセスを有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11147">GP name: Enable ending processes in the Browser task manager</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11148">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11148">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11149">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11149">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11150">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11150">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11151">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11151">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11152">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11152">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11153">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11153">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11154">値の名前: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11154">Value Name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11155">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11155">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11156">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11156">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11157">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11157">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11158">基本設定キーの名前: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11158">Preference Key Name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11159">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11159">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11160">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11160">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11161">TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11161">TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11162">Microsoft Edge インスタンス 1 つあたりの使用可能メモリ (MB) の制限を設定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11162">Set limit on megabytes of memory a single Microsoft Edge instance can use</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11163">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11163">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11164">Windows と macOS での 80 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11164">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11165">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11165">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11166">メモリを節約するためにタブが破棄される前に、単一の Microsoft Edge インスタンスが使用できるメモリの容量を構成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11166">Configures the amount of memory that a single Microsoft Edge instance can use before tabs start getting discarded to save memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11167">タブが使用していたメモリは解放され、切り替え時にはタブを再読み込みする必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11167">The memory used by the tab will be freed and the tab will have to be reloaded when switched to.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11168">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、制限を超えたときにブラウザーはメモリを節約するためにタブの破棄を開始します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11168">If you enable this policy, the browser will start to discard tabs to save memory once the limitation is exceeded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11169">ただし、ブラウザが常に制限以下で動作するという保証はありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11169">However, there is no guarantee that the browser is always running under the limit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11170">1024 未満の値は、1024 へと切り上げられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11170">Any value under 1024 will be rounded up to 1024.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11171">このポリシーを設定していない場合、ブラウザーは、コンピューターの物理メモリ量が少ないことが検出された場合にのみ、メモリの節約を試みます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11171">If you don't set this policy, the browser will only attempt to save memory when it has detected that the amount of physical memory on its machine is low.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11172">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11172">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11173">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11173">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11174">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11174">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11175">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11175">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11176">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11176">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11177">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11177">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11178">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11178">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11179">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11179">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11180">GP 固有の名前: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11180">GP unique name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11181">GP 名: Microsoft Edge インスタンス 1 つあたりの使用可能メモリ (MB) の制限を設定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11181">GP name: Set limit on megabytes of memory a single Microsoft Edge instance can use</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11182">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11182">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11183">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11183">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11184">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11184">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11185">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11185">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11186">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11186">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11187">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11187">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11188">値の名前: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11188">Value Name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11189">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11189">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11190">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11190">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000800
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11191">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11191">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11192">基本設定キーの名前: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11192">Preference Key Name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11193">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11193">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2048</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11194">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11194">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11195">TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11195">TrackingPrevention</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11196">ユーザーの Web 閲覧アクティビティの追跡のブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11196">Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11197">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11197">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11198">Windows と macOS での 78 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11198">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11199">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11199">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11200">ユーザーの Web 閲覧アクティビティを追跡する Web サイトをブロックするかどうかを決定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11200">Lets you decide whether to block websites from tracking users' web-browsing activity.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11201">このポリシーを無効にしているか、構成していない場合、ユーザーは追跡防止のレベルを独自に設定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11201">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, users can set their own level of tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11202">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11202">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11203">TrackingPreventionOff (0) = オフ (追跡防止なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11203">TrackingPreventionOff (0) = Off (no tracking prevention)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11204">TrackingPreventionBasic (1) = 基本 (有害なトラッカーをブロックし、コンテンツや広告はカスタマイズされます)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11204">TrackingPreventionBasic (1) = Basic (blocks harmful trackers, content and ads will be personalized)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11205">TrackingPreventionBalanced (2) = バランス (有害なトラッカーとユーザーが訪問したことのないサイトからのトラッカーをブロックします。コンテンツと広告は、あまりカスタマイズされません)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11205">TrackingPreventionBalanced (2) = Balanced (blocks harmful trackers and trackers from sites user has not visited; content and ads will be less personalized)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11206">TrackingPreventionStrict (3) = 厳密 (すべてのサイトからの有害なトラッカーと大多数のトラッカーをブロックします。コンテンツと広告は、最小限のもののみカスタマイズされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11206">TrackingPreventionStrict (3) = Strict (blocks harmful trackers and majority of trackers from all sites; content and ads will have minimal personalization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11207">サイトの一部が動作しない可能性があります)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11207">Some parts of sites might not work)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11208">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11208">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11209">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11209">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11210">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11210">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11211">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11211">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11212">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11212">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11213">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11213">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11214">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11214">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11215">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11215">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11216">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11216">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11217">GP 固有の名前: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11217">GP unique name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11218">GP 名: ユーザーの Web 閲覧アクティビティの追跡のブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11218">GP name: Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11219">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11219">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11220">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11220">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11221">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11221">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11222">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11222">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11223">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11223">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11224">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11224">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11225">値の名前: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11225">Value Name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11226">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11226">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11227">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11227">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11228">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11228">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11229">基本設定キーの名前: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11229">Preference Key Name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11230">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11230">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11231">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11231">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11232">TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11232">TranslateEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11233">翻訳を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11233">Enable Translate</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11234">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11234">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11235">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11235">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11236">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11236">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11237">Microsoft Edge で、統合された Microsoft 翻訳サービスを有効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11237">Enables the integrated Microsoft translation service on Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11238">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、Microsoft Edge では、統合された翻訳ポップアップが必要に応じて表示され、右クリック コンテキスト メニューに翻訳オプションが表示されることで、ユーザーに翻訳機能が提供されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11238">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge offers translation functionality to the user by showing an integrated translate flyout when appropriate, and a translate option on the right-click context menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11239">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、すべての組み込み翻訳機能が無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11239">Disable this policy to disable all built-in translate features.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11240">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ユーザーは翻訳機能を使用するかどうかを選択することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11240">If you don't configure the policy, users can choose whether to use the translation functionality or not.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11241">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11241">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11242">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11242">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11243">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11243">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11244">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11244">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11245">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11245">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11246">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11246">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11247">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11247">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11248">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11248">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11249">GP 固有の名前: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11249">GP unique name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11250">GP 名: 翻訳を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11250">GP name: Enable Translate</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11251">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11251">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11252">GP パス (推奨): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge - 既定の設定 (ユーザーが上書き可能)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11252">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11253">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11253">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11254">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11254">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11255">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11255">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11256">パス (推奨): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11256">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11257">値の名前: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11257">Value Name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11258">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11258">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11259">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11259">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11260">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11260">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11261">基本設定キーの名前: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11261">Preference Key Name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11262">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11262">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11263">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11263">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11264">URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11264">URLAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11265">許可されている URL の一覧を定義する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11265">Define a list of allowed URLs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11266">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11266">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11267">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11267">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11268">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11268">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11269">ポリシーを設定すると、[URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) の例外として、リストされた URL へのアクセスが提供されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11269">Setting the policy provides access to the listed URLs, as exceptions to [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11270">[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) に従って、URL パターンを書式設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11270">Format the URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11271">このポリシーを使用して、制限付きブロック一覧の例外を開くことができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11271">You can use this policy to open exceptions to restrictive block lists.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11272">たとえば、ブロック一覧に "\*" を含めることですべての要求をブロックし、その上でこのポリシーを使用して限定した URL 一覧へのアクセスを許可することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11272">For example, you can include '\*' in the block list to block all requests, and then use this policy to allow access to a limited list of URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11273">このポリシーを使用して、特定のスキーム、他のドメインのサブドメイン、ポート、特定のパスに対する例外を開くことができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11273">You can use this policy to open exceptions to certain schemes, subdomains of other domains, ports, or specific paths.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11274">最も具体的なフィルターが、URL がブロックされるか、または許可されるかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11274">The most specific filter determines if a URL is blocked or allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11275">許可一覧は、ブロック一覧よりも優先されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11275">The allowed list takes precedence over the block list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11276">このポリシーは 1000 エントリに制限されており、それ以降のエントリは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11276">This policy is limited to 1000 entries; subsequent entries are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11277">このポリシーを使用すると、ブラウザーは、"tel:" や "ssh:" のようなプロトコルのプロトコル ハンドラーとして登録されている外部アプリケーションを自動的に呼び出すことができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11277">This policy also allows the browser to automatically invoke external applications registered as protocol handlers for protocols like "tel:" or "ssh:".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11278">このポリシーを構成していない場合、[URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) ポリシーのブロック リストに例外はなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11278">If you don't configure this policy, there are no exceptions to the block list in the [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11279">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11279">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11280">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11280">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11281">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11281">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11282">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11282">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11283">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11283">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11284">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11284">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11285">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11285">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11286">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11286">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11287">GP 固有の名前: URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11287">GP unique name: URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11288">GP 名: 許可されている URL の一覧を定義する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11288">GP name: Define a list of allowed URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11289">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11289">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11290">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11290">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11291">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11291">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11292">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11292">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11293">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11293">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11294">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11294">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11295">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11295">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11296">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11296">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11297">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11297">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\3 = "hosting.com/good_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11298">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11298">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11299">基本設定キーの名前: URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11299">Preference Key Name: URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11300">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11300">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/good_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11301">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11301">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11302">URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11302">URLBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11303">URL の一覧へのアクセスをブロックする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11303">Block access to a list of URLs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11304">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11304">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11305">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11305">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11306">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11306">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11307">ブロックされている (ユーザーが読み込むことができない) サイトの一覧を URL パターンに基づいて定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11307">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked (your users can't load them).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11308">[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322) に従って、URL パターンを書式設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11308">Format the URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11309">[URLAllowlist](#urlallowlist) ポリシーで、例外を定義することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11309">You can define exceptions in the [URLAllowlist](#urlallowlist) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11310">これらのポリシーは 1000 エントリに制限されており、それ以降のエントリは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11310">These policies are limited to 1000 entries; subsequent entries are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11311">内部の "edge://\*" URL をブロックすることは、お勧めできません。予期しないエラーを引き起こす場合があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11311">Note that blocking internal 'edge://\*' URLs isn't recommended - this may lead to unexpected errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11312">このポリシーは、JavaScript による動的なページの更新を防止するものではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11312">This policy doesn't prevent the page from updating dynamically through JavaScript.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11313">たとえば、"contoso.com/abc" をブロックしても、ページが更新されない限り、ユーザーは "contoso.com" にアクセスし、"contoso.com/abc" へのリンクをクリックして訪問することができる可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11313">For example, if you block 'contoso.com/abc', users might still be able to visit 'contoso.com' and click on a link to visit 'contoso.com/abc', as long as the page doesn't refresh.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11314">このポリシーを構成していない場合、ブロックされる URL はなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11314">If you don't configure this policy, no URLs are blocked.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11315">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11315">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11316">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11316">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11317">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11317">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11318">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11318">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11319">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11319">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11320">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11320">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11321">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11321">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11322">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11322">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11323">GP 固有の名前: URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11323">GP unique name: URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11324">GP 名: URL の一覧へのアクセスのブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11324">GP name: Block access to a list of URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11325">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11325">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11326">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11326">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11327">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11327">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11328">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11328">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11329">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11329">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11330">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11330">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11331">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11331">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11332">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11332">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11333">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11333">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\3 = "hosting.com/bad_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\6 = "file://*"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\7 = "custom_scheme:*"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\8 = "*"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11334">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11334">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11335">基本設定キーの名前: URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11335">Preference Key Name: URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11336">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11336">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/bad_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
  <string>file://*</string>
  <string>custom_scheme:*</string>
  <string>*</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11337">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11337">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11338">UpdatePolicyOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11338">UpdatePolicyOverride</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11339">Microsoft Edge で利用できる更新プログラムを Microsoft Edge Update でどのように処理するかを指定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11339">Specifies how Microsoft Edge Update handles available updates from Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11340">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11340">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11341">macOS での 89 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11341">On macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11342">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11342">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11343">このポリシーを有効にした場合、Microsoft Edge Update では、以下のオプションの構成方法に従って Microsoft Edge の更新プログラムを処理します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11343">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Update handles Microsoft Edge updates according to how you configure the following options:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11344">[自動サイレント更新のみ]: 更新プログラムは、定期的な更新チェックで検出された場合にのみ適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11344">Automatic silent updates only: Updates are applied only when they're found by the periodic update check.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11345">[手動更新のみ]: 更新プログラムは、ユーザーが実行した手動更新チェックで検出された場合にのみ適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11345">Manual updates only: Updates are applied only when the user runs a manual update check.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11346">(アプリによっては、このオプション用のインターフェイスがない場合もあります。)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11346">(Not all apps provide an interface for this option.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11347">手動で更新する場合は、Microsoft Autoupdate を使用して、更新プログラムを定期的に確認してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11347">If you select manual updates, make sure you periodically check for updates by using Microsoft Autoupdate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11348">このポリシーを有効にして構成しない場合、Microsoft Edge Update は自動的に更新プログラムを確認します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11348">If you don't enable and configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Update automatically checks for updates.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11349">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11349">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11350">automatic-silent-only (automatic-silent-only) = 更新プログラムは、定期的な更新チェックで検出された場合にのみ適用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11350">automatic-silent-only (automatic-silent-only) = Updates are applied only when they're found by the periodic update check.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11351">manual-only (manual-only) = 更新が適用されるのは、ユーザーが手動更新チェックを実行した場合のみです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11351">manual-only (manual-only) = Updates are applied only when the user runs a manual update check.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11352">(アプリによっては、このオプション用のインターフェイスがない場合もあります。)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11352">(Not all apps provide an interface for this option.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11353">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11353">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11354">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11354">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11355">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11355">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11356">推奨にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11356">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11357">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11357">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11358">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11358">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11359">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11359">String</span></span>

  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11360">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11360">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11361">基本設定キーの名前: UpdatePolicyOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11361">Preference Key Name: UpdatePolicyOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11362">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11362">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>automatic-silent-only</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11363">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11363">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11364">UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11364">UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11365">ユーザー エージェント クライアント ヒント機能を有効にする (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11365">Enable the User-Agent Client Hints feature (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11366">非推奨: このポリシーは推奨されなくなっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11366">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11367">現在はサポートされていますが、将来のリリースで廃止されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11367">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11368">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11368">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11369">Windows と macOS での 86 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11369">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11370">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11370">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11371">このポリシーは、企業の Web コンテンツが ユーザーエージェント クライアントのヒント機能と互換していないことが判明した場合に、Web コンテンツの更新に時間を割くための短期のメカニズムとしてのみ機能することを目的としているため、推奨されていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11371">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with the User-Agent Client Hints feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11372">Microsoft Edge バージョン 89 では機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11372">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 89.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11373">ユーザー エージェント クライアント ヒント機能を有効にすると、ユーザー ブラウザー (ブラウザーのバージョンなど) と環境 (システム アーキテクチャなど) に関する情報を提供する細かな要求ヘッダーが送信されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11373">When enabled the User-Agent Client Hints feature sends granular request headers that provide information about the user browser (for example, the browser version) and environment (for example, the system architecture).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11374">これは追加機能ですが、新しいヘッダーにより、要求に含まれる文字を制限している一部の Web サイトが破損する場合があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11374">This is an additive feature, but the new headers may break some websites that restrict the characters that requests may contain.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11375">このポリシーを有効にした場合、または構成しなかった場合は、ユーザー エージェント クライアント ヒント機能は有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11375">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the User-Agent Client Hints feature is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11376">このポリシーを無効にすると、この機能は使用できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11376">If you disable this policy, this feature is unavailable.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11377">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11377">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11378">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11378">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11379">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11379">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11380">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11380">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11381">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11381">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11382">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11382">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11383">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11383">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11384">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11384">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11385">GP 固有の名前: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11385">GP unique name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11386">GP 名: ユーザー エージェント クライアント ヒント機能を有効にする (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11386">GP name: Enable the User-Agent Client Hints feature (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11387">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11387">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11388">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11388">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11389">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11389">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11390">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11390">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11391">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11391">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11392">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11392">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11393">値の名前: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11393">Value Name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11394">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11394">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11395">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11395">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11396">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11396">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11397">プリファレンス キーの名前: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11397">Preference Key Name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11398">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11398">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11399">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11399">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11400">UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11400">UserDataDir</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11401">ユーザー データ ディレクトリを設定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11401">Set the user data directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11402">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11402">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11403">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11403">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11404">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11404">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11405">ユーザー データを保存するディレクトリを設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11405">Set the directory to use for storing user data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11406">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、ユーザーが "--user-data-dir" コマンドライン フラグを設定したかどうかにかかわらず、Microsoft Edge は指定されたディレクトリを使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11406">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the specified directory regardless of whether the user has set the '--user-data-dir' command-line flag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11407">このポリシーを有効にしていない場合、既定のプロファイル パスが使用されますが、ユーザは "--user-data-dir" フラグを使用してそれを上書きすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11407">If you don't enable this policy, the default profile path is used, but the user can override it by using the '--user-data-dir' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11408">プロファイルのディレクトリは、プロファイル パスの下の edge://version/ にあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11408">Users can find the directory for the profile at edge://version/ under profile path.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11409">データの損失やその他のエラーを避けるために、ボリュームのルート ディレクトリや別の目的で使用されているディレクトリには、このポリシーを構成しないでください。なぜなら、Microsoft Edge がコンテンツを管理しているからです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11409">To avoid data loss or other errors, don't configure this policy to a volume's root directory or to a directory that's used for other purposes, because Microsoft Edge manages its contents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11410">使用できる変数の一覧については、「[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041)」を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11410">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables that can be used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11411">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11411">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11412">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11412">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11413">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11413">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11414">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11414">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11415">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11415">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11416">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11416">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11417">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11417">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11418">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11418">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11419">GP 固有の名前: UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11419">GP unique name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11420">GP 名: ユーザー データ ディレクトリを設定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11420">GP name: Set the user data directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11421">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11421">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11422">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11422">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11423">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11423">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11424">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11424">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11425">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11425">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11426">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11426">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11427">値の名前: UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11427">Value Name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11428">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11428">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11429">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11429">Example value:</span></span>

```
"${users}/${user_name}/Edge"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11430">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11430">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11431">基本設定キーの名前: UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11431">Preference Key Name: UserDataDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11432">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11432">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>${users}/${user_name}/Edge</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11433">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11433">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11434">UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11434">UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11435">緊急ロールバック時の使用のために保持するユーザーデータのスナップショット数を制限します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11435">Limits the number of user data snapshots retained for use in case of emergency rollback</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11436">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11436">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11437">Windows での 86 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11437">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11438">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11438">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11439">主要なバージョンの更新の後、Microsoft Edge では、一時的なバージョンロールバックを必要とするような緊急事態に備えて、ユーザーの閲覧データの部分的スナップショットを作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11439">Following each major version update, Microsoft Edge will create a snapshot of parts of the user's browsing data to use in case of a later emergency that requires a temporary version rollback.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11440">ユーザーが対応するスナップショットを持つバージョンについて一時的なロールバックを実行すると、スナップショット内のデータが復元されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11440">If a temporary rollback is performed to a version for which a user has a corresponding snapshot, the data in the snapshot is restored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11441">これにより、ユーザーがブックマークやオートフィルデータなどの設定を保持できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11441">This lets users keep settings such as bookmarks and autofill data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11442">このポリシーを設定しない場合、既定値の3スナップショットが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11442">If you don't set this policy, the default value of 3 snapshots is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11443">このポリシーが設定されている場合、ユーザーが設定した制限数に応じて、古いスナップショットが削除されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11443">If you set this policy, old snapshots are deleted as needed to respect the limit you set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11444">このポリシーを0に設定すると、スナップショットは作成されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11444">If you set this policy to 0, no snapshots are taken.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11445">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11445">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11446">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11446">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11447">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11447">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11448">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11448">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11449">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11449">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11450">Integer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11450">Integer</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11451">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11451">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11452">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11452">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11453">GP 固有の名前: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11453">GP unique name: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11454">GP 名: 緊急ロールバックの場合に使用されるユーザーデータのスナップショット数を制限します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11454">GP name: Limits the number of user data snapshots retained for use in case of emergency rollback</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11455">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11455">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11456">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11456">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11457">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11457">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11458">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11458">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11459">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11459">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11460">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11460">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11461">値の名前: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11461">Value Name: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11462">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11462">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11463">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11463">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000003
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11464">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11464">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11465">UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11465">UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11466">ユーザー フィードバックを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11466">Allow user feedback</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11467">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11467">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11468">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11468">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11469">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11469">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11470">Microsoft Edge では、Edge フィードバック機能 (既定で有効) を使用して、ユーザーがフィードバック、提案、顧客アンケートを送信したり、ブラウザーの問題を報告したりすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11470">Microsoft Edge uses the Edge Feedback feature (enabled by default) to allow users to send feedback, suggestions or customer surveys and to report any issues with the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11471">また、既定では、ユーザーは Edge フィードバック機能を無効にする (オフにする) ことはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11471">Also, by default, users can't disable (turn off) the Edge Feedback feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11472">このポリシーを有効にしているか、設定していない場合、ユーザーは Edge フィードバックを呼び出すことができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11472">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can invoke Edge Feedback.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11473">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、ユーザーは Edge フィードバックを呼び出すことができません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11473">If you disable this policy, users can't invoke Edge Feedback.</span></span>
