  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11474">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11474">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11475">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11475">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11476">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11476">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11477">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11477">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11478">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11478">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11479">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11479">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11480">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11480">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11481">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11481">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11482">GP 固有の名前: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11482">GP unique name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11483">GP 名: ユーザー フィードバックを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11483">GP name: Allow user feedback</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11484">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11484">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11485">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11485">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11486">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11486">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11487">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11487">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11488">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11488">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11489">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11489">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11490">値の名前: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11490">Value Name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11491">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11491">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11492">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11492">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11493">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11493">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11494">基本設定キーの名前: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11494">Preference Key Name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11495">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11495">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11496">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11496">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11497">VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11497">VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11498">ブラウザーの側面にあるタブの垂直レイアウトの可用性を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11498">Configures availability of a vertical layout for tabs on the side of the browser</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11499">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11499">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11500">Windows と macOS での 88 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11500">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11501">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11501">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11502">タブがブラウザーの上部ではなく側面に垂直に配置されている別のレイアウトにユーザーがアクセスできるかどうかを構成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11502">Configures whether a user can access an alternative layout where tabs are vertically aligned on the side of the browser instead of at the top.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11503">複数のタブが開いている場合、このレイアウトによってタブの表示と管理が容易になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11503">When there are several tabs open, this layout provides better tab viewing and management.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11504">サイト タイトルの視認性が向上し、整列されたアイコンをスキャンしやすくなり、タブを管理および閉じるためのスペースが増えました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11504">There's better visibility of the site titles, it's easier to scan aligned icons, and there's more space to manage and close tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11505">このポリシーを無効にすると、ユーザーは垂直タブ レイアウトをオプションとして使用できなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11505">If you disable this policy, then the vertical tab layout will not be available as an option for users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11506">このポリシーを有効または無効にしても、タブ レイアウトは最上部に表示されますが、ユーザーは側面の垂直タブをオンにすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11506">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the tab layout will still be at the top, but a user has the option to turn on vertical tabs on the side.</span></span>


  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11507">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11507">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11508">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11508">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11509">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11509">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11510">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11510">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11511">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11511">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11512">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11512">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11513">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11513">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11514">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11514">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11515">GP 固有の名前: VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11515">GP unique name: VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11516">GP 名: ブラウザーの側面にあるタブの垂直レイアウトの可用性を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11516">GP name: Configures availability of a vertical layout for tabs on the side of the browser</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11517">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11517">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11518">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11518">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11519">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11519">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11520">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11520">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11521">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11521">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11522">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11522">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11523">GP 固有の名前: VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11523">Value Name: VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11524">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11524">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11525">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11525">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11526">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11526">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11527">基本設定キーの名前: VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11527">Preference Key Name: VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11528">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11528">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11529">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11529">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11530">VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11530">VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11531">ビデオ キャプチャの許可またはブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11531">Allow or block video capture</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11532">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11532">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11533">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11533">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11534">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11534">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11535">サイトが動画をキャプチャできるかどうかを制御します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11535">Control whether sites can capture video.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11536">有効にしているか、構成していない場合 (既定)、ユーザーは [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) ポリシーの一覧で構成されている URL を持つサイトを除くすべてのサイトでビデオ キャプチャ アクセスについて確認を求められますが、一覧で構成されている URL を持つサイトでは、確認を求めるメッセージなしでアクセスが許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11536">If enabled or not configured (default), the user will be asked about video capture access for all sites except those with URLs configured in the [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) policy list, which will be granted access without prompting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11537">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、ユーザーに確認を求めるメッセージは表示されず、ビデオ キャプチャは [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) ポリシーで構成されている URL に対してのみ許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11537">If you disable this policy, the user isn't prompted, and video capture is only available to URLs configured in [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11538">このポリシーは内蔵カメラだけでなく、あらゆる種類のビデオ入力に影響します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11538">This policy affects all types of video inputs, not only the built-in camera.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11539">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11539">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11540">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11540">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11541">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11541">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11542">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11542">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11543">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11543">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11544">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11544">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11545">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11545">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11546">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11546">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11547">GP 固有の名前: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11547">GP unique name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11548">GP 名: ビデオ キャプチャの許可またはブロック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11548">GP name: Allow or block video capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11549">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11549">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11550">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11550">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11551">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11551">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11552">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11552">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11553">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11553">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11554">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11554">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11555">値の名前: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11555">Value Name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11556">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11556">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11557">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11557">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11558">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11558">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11559">基本設定キーの名前: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11559">Preference Key Name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11560">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11560">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11561">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11561">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11562">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11562">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11563">アクセス許可を要求することなくビデオ キャプチャ デバイスにアクセスできるサイト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11563">Sites that can access video capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11564">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11564">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11565">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11565">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11566">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11566">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11567">URL パターンに基づいて、ユーザーにアクセス許可を求めずにビデオ キャプチャ デバイスを使用することができる Web サイトを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11567">Specify websites, based on URL patterns, that can use video capture devices without asking the user for permission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11568">この一覧のパターンは、要求 URL のセキュリティ オリジンと照合されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11568">Patterns in this list are matched against the security origin of the requesting URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11569">それらが一致する場合、サイトには自動的にビデオ キャプチャ デバイスへのアクセス許可が付与されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11569">If they match, the site is automatically granted access to video capture devices.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11570">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11570">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11571">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11571">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11572">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11572">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11573">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11573">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11574">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11574">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11575">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11575">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11576">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11576">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11577">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11577">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11578">GP 固有の名前: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11578">GP unique name: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11579">GP 名: アクセス許可を要求することなくビデオ キャプチャ デバイスにアクセスできるサイト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11579">GP name: Sites that can access video capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11580">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11580">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11581">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11581">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11582">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11582">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11583">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11583">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11584">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11584">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11585">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11585">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11586">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11586">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11587">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11587">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11588">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11588">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls\2 = "https://[*.]contoso.edu/"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11589">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11589">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11590">基本設定キーの名前: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11590">Preference Key Name: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11591">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11591">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>https://[*.]contoso.edu/</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11592">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11592">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11593">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11593">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11594">WPAD の最適化を設定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11594">Set WPAD optimization</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11595">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11595">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11596">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11596">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11597">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11597">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11598">Microsoft Edge で、WPAD (Web プロキシ自動発見) の最適化をオフにすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11598">Allows you to turn off WPAD (Web Proxy Auto-Discovery) optimization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11599">このポリシーを無効にしている場合、WPAD の最適化は無効になり、ブラウザーは DNS ベースの WPAD サーバーにより長く待機させられるようになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11599">If you disable this policy, WPAD optimization is disabled, which makes the browser wait longer for DNS-based WPAD servers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11600">ポリシーを有効にしているか、構成していない場合、WPAD の最適化が有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11600">If you enable or don't configure the policy, WPAD optimization is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11601">このポリシーが有効かどうかや、有効にするための方法に関係なく、ユーザーが WPAD の最適化設定を変更することはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11601">Independent of whether or how this policy is enabled, the WPAD optimization setting cannot be changed by users.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11602">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11602">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11603">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11603">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11604">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11604">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11605">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11605">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11606">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11606">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11607">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11607">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11608">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11608">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11609">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11609">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11610">GP 固有の名前: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11610">GP unique name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11611">GP 名: WPAD の最適化を設定する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11611">GP name: Set WPAD optimization</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11612">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11612">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11613">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11613">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11614">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11614">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11615">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11615">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11616">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11616">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11617">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11617">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11618">値の名前: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11618">Value Name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11619">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11619">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11620">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11620">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11621">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11621">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11622">基本設定キーの名前: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11622">Preference Key Name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11623">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11623">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11624">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11624">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11625">WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11625">WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11626">強制インストールする Web アプリの一覧を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11626">Configure list of force-installed Web Apps</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11627">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11627">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11628">Windows と macOS での 80 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11628">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11629">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11629">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11630">このポリシーを構成して、ユーザーの操作なしでサイレント インストールし、ユーザーがアンインストールまたはオフにできない Web アプリの一覧を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11630">Configure this policy to specify a list of web apps that install silently, without user interaction, and which users can't uninstall or turn off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11631">ポリシーの各リスト アイテムは、必須のメンバー URL (インストールする Web アプリの URL) を持つオブジェクトです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11631">Each list item of the policy is an object with a mandatory member: url (the URL of the web app to install)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11632">3 つのオプション メンバー:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11632">and 3 optional members:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11633">default_launch_container (新しいタブで Web アプリが開くウィンドウ モードが既定に指定されます。)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11633">default_launch_container (specifies the window mode that the web app opens with-a new tab is the default.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11634">create_desktop_shortcut (Linux および Windows デスクトップ ショートカットを作成する場合は True。)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11634">create_desktop_shortcut (True if you want to create Linux and Windows desktop shortcuts.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11635">override_app_name (Microsoft Edge 89 以降、プログレッシブ Web アプリではない場合はアプリ名を上書きできます。または、プログレッシブ Web アプリの場合は一時的にインストールされますが、インストールを完了する前に認証が必要なアプリ名です。)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11635">override_app_name (Starting with Microsoft Edge 89, allows you to override the app name if it is not a Progressive Web App (PWA), or the app name that is temporarily installed if it is a PWA but authentication is required before the installation can be completed.)</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11636">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11636">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11637">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11637">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11638">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11638">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11639">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11639">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11640">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11640">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11641">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11641">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11642">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11642">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11643">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11643">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11644">GP 固有の名前: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11644">GP unique name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11645">GP 名: 強制インストールする Web アプリの一覧を構成する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11645">GP name: Configure list of force-installed Web Apps</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11646">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11646">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11647">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11647">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11648">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11648">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11649">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11649">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11650">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11650">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11651">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11651">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11652">値の名前: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11652">Value Name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11653">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11653">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11654">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11654">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebAppInstallForceList = [
  {
    "create_desktop_shortcut": true, 
    "default_launch_container": "window", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/maps"
  }, 
  {
    "default_launch_container": "tab", 
    "url": "https://app.contoso.edu"
  }, 
  {
    "default_launch_container": "window", 
    "override_app_name": "Editor", 
    "url": "https://app.contoso.com/editor"
  }
]
```

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11655">コンパクト サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11655">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebAppInstallForceList = [{"create_desktop_shortcut": true, "default_launch_container": "window", "url": "https://www.contoso.com/maps"}, {"default_launch_container": "tab", "url": "https://app.contoso.edu"}, {"default_launch_container": "window", "override_app_name": "Editor", "url": "https://app.contoso.com/editor"}]
  ```
  

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11656">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11656">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11657">基本設定キーの名前: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11657">Preference Key Name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11658">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11658">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>WebAppInstallForceList</key>
<array>
  <dict>
```
