  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11659">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11659">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11660">WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11660">WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11661">Microsoft Edge で Web キャプチャ機能を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11661">Enable web capture feature in Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11662">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11662">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11663">Windows と macOS での 87 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11663">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11664">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11664">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11665">Microsoft Edge の Web キャプチャ機能を有効にします。これにより、ユーザーが Web コンテンツをキャプチャし、インクツールを使用してキャプチャに注釈を付けることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11665">Enables the web capture feature in Microsoft Edge that allows users to capture web content and annotate the capture using inking tools.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11666">このポリシーを有効にするか、構成しない場合、Web キャプチャ オプションはコンテキスト メニュー、[その他の設定] メニューに表示され、キーボード ショートカットのCTRL + SHIFT + Sを使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11666">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the Web capture option shows up in the context menu, Settings and more menu, and by using the keyboard shortcut, CTRL+SHIFT+S.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11667">このポリシーを無効にすると、ユーザーは Microsoft Edge の Web キャプチャ機能にアクセスできなくなります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11667">If you disable this policy, users can't access the web capture feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11668">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11668">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11669">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11669">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11670">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11670">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11671">動的なポリシーの更新: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11671">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11672">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11672">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11673">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11673">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11674">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11674">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11675">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11675">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11676">GP 固有の名前: WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11676">GP unique name: WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11677">GP 名: Microsoft Edge で Web キャプチャ機能を有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11677">GP name: Enable web capture feature in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11678">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11678">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11679">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11679">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11680">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11680">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11681">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11681">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11682">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11682">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11683">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11683">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11684">値の名前: WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11684">Value Name: WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11685">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11685">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11686">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11686">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11687">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11687">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11688">基本設定キーの名前: WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11688">Preference Key Name: WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11689">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11689">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11690">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11690">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11691">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11691">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11692">M84 まで Web コンポーネント v0 API をもう一度有効にする (不使用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11692">Re-enable Web Components v0 API until M84 (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11693">不使用: このポリシーは廃止されており、Microsoft Edge 84 以降は機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11693">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11694">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11694">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11695">Windows と macOS での 80 以降、84 まで</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11695">On Windows and macOS since 80, until 84</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11696">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11696">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11697">このポリシーは、Microsoft Edge バージョン 85 までこれらの機能を選択的に再度有効にすることができるため、機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11697">This policy doesn't work because this policy allowed these features to be selectively re-enabled until Microsoft Edge version 85.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11698">Web Components v0 API (Shadow DOM v0、Custom Elements v0、HTML Imports) は 2018 年に非推奨となっており、Microsoft Edge バージョン 80 以降は既定で無効化されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11698">The Web Components v0 APIs (Shadow DOM v0, Custom Elements v0, and HTML Imports) were deprecated in 2018, and have been disabled by default starting in Microsoft Edge version 80.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11699">このポリシーを True に設定している場合、すべてのサイトで Web Components v0 の機能が有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11699">If you set this policy is set to True, the Web Components v0 features will be enabled for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11700">このポリシーを false に設定しているか、設定していない場合、Web Components v0 の機能は Microsoft Edge バージョン 80 以降は既定で無効化されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11700">If you set this policy to False or don't set this policy, the Web Components v0 features will be disabled by default, starting in Microsoft Edge version 80.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11701">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11701">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11702">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11702">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11703">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11703">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11704">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11704">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11705">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11705">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11706">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11706">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11707">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11707">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11708">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11708">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11709">GP 固有の名前: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11709">GP unique name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11710">GP 名: M84 まで Web コンポーネント v0 API をもう一度有効にする (不使用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11710">GP name: Re-enable Web Components v0 API until M84 (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11711">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11711">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11712">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11712">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11713">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11713">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11714">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11714">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11715">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11715">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11716">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11716">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11717">値の名前: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11717">Value Name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11718">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11718">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11719">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11719">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11720">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11720">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11721">基本設定キーの名前: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11721">Preference Key Name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11722">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11722">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11723">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11723">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11724">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11724">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11725">WebDriver が互換性のないポリシーを上書きすることを許可する (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11725">Allow WebDriver to Override Incompatible Policies (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11726">非推奨: このポリシーは推奨されなくなっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11726">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11727">現在はサポートされていますが、将来のリリースで廃止されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11727">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11728">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11728">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11729">Windows と macOS での 77 以降、84 まで</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11729">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 84</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11730">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11730">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11731">WebDriver は既存のすべてのポリシーと互換性を持つようになったため、このポリシーは機能しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11731">This policy doesn't work because WebDriver is now compatible with all existing policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11732">このポリシーでは、WebDriver 機能のユーザーがその操作を妨げる可能性のあるポリシーを上書きすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11732">This policy allows users of the WebDriver feature to override policies which can interfere with its operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11733">現在このポリシーは、[SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) と [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) ポリシーを無効にしています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11733">Currently this policy disables [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) and [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11734">このポリシーを有効にしている場合、WebDriver は互換性のないポリシーを上書きすることができるようになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11734">If the policy is enabled, WebDriver will be able to override incomaptible policies.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11735">このポリシーを無効にしているか、構成していない場合、WebDriver が互換性のないポリシーを上書きすることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11735">If the policy is disabled or not configured, WebDriver will not be allowed to override incompatible policies.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11736">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11736">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11737">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11737">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11738">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11738">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11739">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11739">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11740">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11740">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11741">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11741">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11742">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11742">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11743">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11743">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11744">GP 固有の名前: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11744">GP unique name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11745">GP 名: WebDriver が互換性のないポリシーを上書きすることを許可する (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11745">GP name: Allow WebDriver to Override Incompatible Policies (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11746">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11746">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11747">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11747">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11748">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11748">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11749">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11749">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11750">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11750">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11751">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11751">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11752">値の名前: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11752">Value Name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11753">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11753">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11754">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11754">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11755">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11755">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11756">基本設定キーの名前: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11756">Preference Key Name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11757">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11757">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11758">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11758">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11759">WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11759">WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11760">WebRTC で従来の TLS/DTLS ダウングレードを許可する (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11760">Allow legacy TLS/DTLS downgrade in WebRTC (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11761">非推奨: このポリシーは推奨されなくなっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11761">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11762">現在はサポートされていますが、将来のリリースで廃止されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11762">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11763">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11763">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11764">Windows と macOS での 88 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11764">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11765">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11765">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11766">このポリシーを有効にすると、WebRTC ピア接続は、TLS/DTLS (DTLS 1.0、TLS 1.0、および TLS 1.1) プロトコルの不使用バージョンにダウングレードできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11766">If you enable this policy, WebRTC peer connections can downgrade to obsolete versions of the TLS/DTLS (DTLS 1.0, TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1) protocols.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11767">このポリシーを無効にするか、設定しない場合、これらの TLS/DTLS バージョンは無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11767">If you disable or don't set this policy, these TLS/DTLS versions are disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11768">このポリシーは一時的なものであり、Microsoft Edge の将来のバージョンで削除される予定です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11768">This policy is temporary and will be removed in a future version of Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11769">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11769">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11770">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11770">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11771">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11771">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11772">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11772">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11773">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11773">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11774">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11774">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11775">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11775">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11776">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11776">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11777">GP 固有の名前: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11777">GP unique name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11778">GP 名: WebRTC で従来の TLS/DTLS ダウングレードを許可する (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11778">GP name: Allow legacy TLS/DTLS downgrade in WebRTC (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11779">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11779">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11780">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11780">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11781">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11781">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11782">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11782">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11783">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11783">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11784">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11784">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11785">値の名前: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11785">Value Name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11786">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11786">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11787">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11787">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11788">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11788">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11789">基本設定キーの名前: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11789">Preference Key Name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11790">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11790">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11791">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11791">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11792">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11792">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11793">WebRTC によるローカル IP アドレスの公開を管理する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11793">Manage exposure of local IP addressess by WebRTC</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11794">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11794">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11795">Windows と macOS での 80 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11795">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11796">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11796">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11797">WebRTC が公開する必要があるローカル IP アドレスのオリジン (URL) やホスト名のパターン ("*contoso.com*" など) の一覧を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11797">Specifies a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns (like "*contoso.com*") for which local IP address should be exposed by WebRTC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11798">このポリシーを有効にし、オリジン (URL) やホスト名のパターンの一覧を設定している場合、edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns が有効になっているときに、WebRTC は一覧のパターンに一致するローカル IP アドレスを公開します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11798">If you enable this policy and set a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns, when edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Enabled, WebRTC will expose the local IP address for cases that match patterns in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11799">このポリシーを無効にしているか、構成していない状態で、edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns が有効になっている場合、WebRTC はローカル IP アドレスを公開しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11799">If you disable or don't configure this policy, and edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Enabled, WebRTC will not expose local IP addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11800">ローカル IP アドレスは、mDNS ホスト名で隠されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11800">The local IP address is concealed with an mDNS hostname.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11801">このポリシーを有効または無効にしているか、構成していない状態で、edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns が無効になっている場合、WebRTC はローカル IP アドレスを公開します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11801">If you enable, disable, or don't configure this policy, and edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Disabled, WebRTC will expose local IP addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11802">このポリシーは、管理者が必要とする可能性のあるローカル IP アドレスの保護を弱めます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11802">Please note that this policy weakens the protection of local IP addresses that might be needed by administrators.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11803">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11803">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11804">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11804">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11805">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11805">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11806">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11806">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11807">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11807">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11808">文字列のリスト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11808">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11809">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11809">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11810">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11810">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11811">GP 固有の名前: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11811">GP unique name: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11812">GP 名: WebRTC によるローカル IP アドレスの公開を管理する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11812">GP name: Manage exposure of local IP addressess by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11813">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11813">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11814">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11814">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11815">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11815">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11816">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11816">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11817">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11817">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11818">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11818">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11819">値の名前: 1、2、3、...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11819">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11820">値の種類: REG_SZ の一覧</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11820">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11821">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11821">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls\2 = "*contoso.com*"

```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11822">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11822">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11823">基本設定キーの名前: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11823">Preference Key Name: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11824">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11824">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>*contoso.com*</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11825">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11825">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11826">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11826">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11827">WebRTC によるローカル IP アドレスの公開を制限する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11827">Restrict exposure of local IP address by WebRTC</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11828">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11828">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11829">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11829">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11830">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11830">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11831">ユーザーのローカル IP アドレスを WebRTC が公開するかどうかを設定することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11831">Allows you to set whether or not WebRTC exposes the user's local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11832">このポリシーを "AllowAllInterfaces" または "AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces" に設定している場合、WebRTC はローカル IP アドレスを公開します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11832">If you set this policy to "AllowAllInterfaces" or "AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces", WebRTC exposes the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11833">このポリシーを "AllowPublicInterfaceOnly" または "DisableNonProxiedUdp" に設定している場合、WebRTC はローカル IP アドレスを公開しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11833">If you set this policy to "AllowPublicInterfaceOnly" or "DisableNonProxiedUdp", WebRTC doesn't expose the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11834">このポリシーを設定していないか、無効にしている場合、WebRTC はローカル IP アドレスを公開します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11834">If you don't set this policy, or if you disable it, WebRTC exposes the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11835">ポリシー オプション マッピング:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11835">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11836">AllowAllInterfaces (既定) = すべてのインターフェイスを許可します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11836">AllowAllInterfaces (default) = Allow all interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11837">これは、ローカル IP アドレスを公開します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11837">This exposes the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11838">AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces (default_public_and_private_interfaces) = HTTP の既定のルート上でパブリック インターフェイスとプライベート インターフェイスを許可します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11838">AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces (default_public_and_private_interfaces) = Allow public and private interfaces over http default route.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11839">これは、ローカル IP アドレスを公開します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11839">This exposes the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11840">AllowPublicInterfaceOnly (default_public_interface_only) = HTTP の既定のルート上でパブリック インターフェイスを許可します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11840">AllowPublicInterfaceOnly (default_public_interface_only) = Allow public interface over http default route.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11841">これは、ローカル IP アドレスを公開しません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11841">This doesn't expose the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11842">DisableNonProxiedUdp (disable_non_proxied_udp) = プロキシ サーバーが UDP をサポートしていない限り、TCP を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11842">DisableNonProxiedUdp (disable_non_proxied_udp) = Use TCP unless proxy server supports UDP.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11843">これは、ローカル IP アドレスを公開しません</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11843">This doesn't expose the local IP address</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11844">このポリシーを構成する場合は、上記の情報を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11844">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11845">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11845">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11846">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11846">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11847">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11847">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11848">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11848">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11849">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11849">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11850">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11850">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11851">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11851">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11852">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11852">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11853">GP 固有の名前: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11853">GP unique name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11854">GP 名: WebRTC によるローカル IP アドレスの公開を制限する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11854">GP name: Restrict exposure of local IP address by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11855">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11855">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11856">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11856">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11857">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11857">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11858">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11858">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11859">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11859">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11860">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11860">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11861">値の名前: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11861">Value Name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11862">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11862">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11863">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11863">Example value:</span></span>

```
"default"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11864">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11864">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11865">基本設定キーの名前: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11865">Preference Key Name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11866">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11866">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>default</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11867">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11867">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11868">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11868">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11869">WebRTC が使用するローカル UDP ポートの範囲を制限する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11869">Restrict the range of local UDP ports used by WebRTC</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11870">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11870">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11871">Windows と macOS での 77 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11871">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11872">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11872">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11873">WebRTC が使用する UDP ポートの範囲を、指定したポート間隔に制限します (エンドポイントを含む)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11873">Restricts the UDP port range used by WebRTC to a specified port interval (endpoints included).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11874">このポリシーを構成することで、WebRTC が使用できるローカル UDP ポートの範囲を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11874">By configuring this policy, you specify the range of local UDP ports that WebRTC can use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11875">このポリシーを構成していないか、空の文字列または無効なポート範囲に対して設定した場合、WebRTC は任意の利用可能なローカル UDP ポートを使用することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11875">If you don't configure this policy, or if you set it to an empty string or invalid port range, WebRTC can use any available local UDP port.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11876">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11876">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11877">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11877">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11878">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11878">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11879">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11879">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11880">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11880">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11881">String</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11881">String</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11882">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11882">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11883">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11883">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11884">GP 固有の名前: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11884">GP unique name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11885">GP 名: WebRTC が使用するローカル UDP ポートの範囲を制限する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11885">GP name: Restrict the range of local UDP ports used by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11886">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11886">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11887">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11887">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11888">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11888">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11889">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11889">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11890">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11890">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11891">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11891">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11892">値の名前: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11892">Value Name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11893">値の種類: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11893">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11894">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11894">Example value:</span></span>

```
"10000-11999"
```

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11895">Mac の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11895">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11896">基本設定キーの名前: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11896">Preference Key Name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11897">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11897">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>10000-11999</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11898">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11898">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11899">WebWidgetAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11899">WebWidgetAllowed</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11900">Web ウィジェットを有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11900">Enable the Web widget</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11901">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11901">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11902">Windows での 88 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11902">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11903">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11903">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11904">Web ウィジェットを有効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11904">Enables the Web widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11905">有効にすると、ユーザーはウィジェットを使用してデスクトップやアプリケーションから Web を検索することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11905">When enabled, users can use the widget to search the web from their desktop or from an application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11906">このウィジェットは、Web 提案を表示し、すべての Web 検索を Microsoft Edge で開く検索ボックスを提供します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11906">The widget provides a search box that shows web suggestions and opens all web searches in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11907">検索ボックスは、検索 (Powered by Bing) と URL の提案を提供します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11907">The search box provides search (powered by Bing) and URL suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11908">ウィジェットにはフィード タイルも含まれており、ユーザーがクリックすると新しい Microsoft Edge ブラウザーのタブやウィンドウで msn.com の詳細情報を閲覧することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11908">The widget also includes feed tiles that users can click to see more information on msn.com in a new Microsoft Edge browser tab or window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11909">フィード タイルには広告が含まれている場合があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11909">The feed tiles may include ads.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11910">ウィジェットは、Microsoft Edge の設定か Microsoft Edge の [その他のツール] メニューから起動することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11910">The widget can be launched from the Microsoft Edge settings or from the "More tools" menu in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11911">このポリシーを有効にしているか、または構成していない場合、Web ウィジェットはすべてのプロファイルで自動的に有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11911">If you enable or don't configure this policy: The Web widget will be automatically enabled for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11912">Microsoft Edge の設定では、ウィジェットを起動するためのオプションが表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11912">In the Microsoft Edge settings, users will see option to launch the widget.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11913">Microsoft Edge の設定では、ユーザーに対して Windows の起動時にウィジェットを実行するためのメニュー項目が表示されます (自動起動)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11913">In the Microsoft Edge settings, users will see the menu item to run the widget at Windows startup (auto-start).</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11914">起動時にウィジェットを有効にするオプションは、[WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) ポリシーが有効な場合に切り替えられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11914">The option to enable the widget at startup will be toggled on if the [WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) policy is enabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11915">[WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) が無効になっているか、または構成されていない場合、起動時にウィジェットを有効にするオプションはオフに切り替えられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11915">If the [WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) is disabled or not configured, the option to enable the widget at startup will be toggled off.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11916">ユーザーに対しては、Microsoft Edge の [その他のツール] メニューからウィジェットを起動するためのメニュー項目が表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11916">Users will see the menu item to launch the widget from the Microsoft Edge "More tools" menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11917">ユーザーは [その他のツール] からウィジェットを起動することができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11917">Users can launch the widget from "More tools".</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11918">ウィジェットは、システム トレイの "終了" オプションでオフにするか、タスク バーからウィジェットを閉じることでオフにすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11918">The widget can be turned off by the "Quit" option in the System tray or by closing the widget from the taskbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11919">自動起動が有効になっている場合、システムの再起動時にウィジェットも再起動されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11919">The widget will be restarted on system reboot if auto-start is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11920">このポリシーを無効にすると、Web ウィジェットはすべてのプロファイルで無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11920">If you disable this policy: The Web widget will be disabled for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11921">Microsoft Edge の設定からウィジェットを起動するオプションは無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11921">The option to launch the widget from Microsoft Edge Settings will be disabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11922">Windows の起動時にウィジェットを起動するオプション (自動起動) は無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11922">The option to launch start the widget at Windows startup (auto-start) will be disabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11923">Microsoft Edge の [その他のツール] メニューからウィジェットを起動するオプションは無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11923">The option to launch the widget from Microsoft Edge "More tools" menu will be disabled.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11924">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11924">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11925">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11925">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11926">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11926">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11927">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11927">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11928">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11928">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11929">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11929">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11930">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11930">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11931">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11931">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11932">GP 固有の名前: WebWidgetAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11932">GP unique name: WebWidgetAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11933">GP 名: Web ウィジェットを有効にする</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11933">GP name: Enable the Web widget</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11934">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11934">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11935">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11935">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11936">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11936">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11937">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11937">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11938">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11938">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11939">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11939">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11940">値の名前: WebWidgetAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11940">Value Name: WebWidgetAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11941">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11941">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11942">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11942">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11943">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11943">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11944">WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11944">WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11945">Windows の起動時に Web ウィジェットを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11945">Allow the Web widget at Windows startup</span></span>

  
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11946">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11946">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11947">Windows での 88 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11947">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11948">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11948">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11949">Windows の起動時に Web ウィジェットが起動するようにします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11949">Allows the Web widget to start running at Windows startup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11950">有効にしている場合: 既定で Windows の起動時に Web ウィジェットが起動します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11950">If you enable: The Web widget will start running at Windows startup by default.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11951">[WebWidgetAllowed](#webwidgetallowed) ポリシーを介してウィジェットが無効化されている場合、このポリシーは Windows の起動時にウィジェットを起動しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11951">If the widget is disabled via [WebWidgetAllowed](#webwidgetallowed) policy, this policy will not start the widget on Windows startup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11952">このポリシーを無効している場合: Web ウィジェットはすべてのプロファイルで Windows の起動時に起動しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11952">If you disable this policy: The Web widget will not start at Windows startup for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11953">Windows の起動時にウィジェットを起動するオプションは、Microsoft Edge の設定で無効化され、オフに切り替えられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11953">The option to start the widget at Windows startup will be disabled and toggled off in Microsoft Edge settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11954">このポリシーを構成していない場合: Web ウィジェットはすべてのプロファイルで Windows の起動時に起動しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11954">If you don't configure the policy: The Web widget will not start at Windows startup for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11955">Windows の起動時にウィジェットを起動するオプションは、Microsoft Edge の設定でオフに切り替えられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11955">The option to start the widget at Windows startup will be toggled off in Microsoft Edge settings.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11956">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11956">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11957">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11957">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11958">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11958">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11959">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11959">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11960">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11960">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11961">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11961">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11962">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11962">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11963">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11963">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11964">GP 固有の名前: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11964">GP unique name: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11965">GP 名: Windows の起動時に Web ウィジェットを許可する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11965">GP name: Allow the Web widget at Windows startup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11966">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11966">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11967">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11967">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11968">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11968">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11969">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11969">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11970">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11970">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11971">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11971">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11972">値の名前: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11972">Value Name: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11973">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11973">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11974">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11974">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11975">ページのトップへ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11975">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11976">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11976">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11977">Windows プロキシ リゾルバーを使用する (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11977">Use Windows proxy resolver (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11978">非推奨: このポリシーは推奨されなくなっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11978">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11979">現在はサポートされていますが、将来のリリースで廃止されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11979">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11980">サポートされているバージョン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11980">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11981">Windows での 84 以降</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11981">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11982">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11982">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11983">このポリシーは、将来のリリースで同様の機能に置き換えられるため、廃止されました。https://crbug.com/1032820 を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11983">This policy is deprecated because it will be superseded by a similar feature in a future release, see https://crbug.com/1032820.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11984">Windows を使用して、Microsoft Edge に組み込まれているプロキシ リゾルバーの代わりに、すべてのブラウザー ネットワークのプロキシを解決します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11984">Use Windows to resolve proxies for all browser networking instead of the proxy resolver built into Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11985">Windows プロキシ リゾルバーは、DirectAccess/NRPT などの Windows プロキシ機能を有効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11985">The Windows proxy resolver enables Windows proxy features such as DirectAccess/NRPT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11986">このポリシーには、https://crbug.com/644030 で説明される問題が含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11986">This policy comes with the problems described by https://crbug.com/644030.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11987">[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) ポリシーを介して設定された PAC ファイルを含む、PAC ファイルが Windows コードによりフェッチおよび実行されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11987">It causes PAC files to be fetched and executed by Windows code, including PAC files set via the [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11988">PAC ファイルのネットワーク フェッチは Microsoft Edge コードの代わりに Windows 経由で発生するので、[DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) などのネットワーク ポリシーは PAC ファイルのネットワーク フェッチには適用されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11988">Since Network Fetches for the PAC file happen via Windows instead of Microsoft Edge code, network policies such as [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) will not apply to network fetches for a PAC file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11989">このポリシーを有効にすると、Windows プロキシ リゾルバーが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11989">If you enable this policy, the Windows proxy resolver will be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11990">このポリシーを無効にするか、構成しない場合は、Microsoft Edge プロキシ リゾルバーが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11990">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the Microsoft Edge proxy resolver will be used.</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11991">サポートされている機能:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11991">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11992">必須にすることができるか: はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11992">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11993">推奨にすることができるか: いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11993">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11994">動的なポリシーの更新: いいえ - ブラウザの再起動が必要</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11994">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11995">［データの種類］:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11995">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11996">ブール値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11996">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11997">Windows の情報と設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11997">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11998">グループ ポリシー (ADMX) 情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11998">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-11999">GP 固有の名前: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-11999">GP unique name: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-12000">GP 名: Windows プロキシ リゾルバーを使用する (非推奨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-12000">GP name: Use Windows proxy resolver (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-12001">GP パス (必須): 管理用テンプレート/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-12001">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-12002">GP パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-12002">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-12003">GP ADMX ファイル名: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-12003">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-12004">Windows レジストリの設定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-12004">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-12005">パス (必須): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-12005">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-12006">パス (推奨): なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-12006">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-12007">値の名前: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-12007">Value Name: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-12008">値の種類: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-12008">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <span data-ttu-id="5cb3a-12009">サンプル値:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5cb3a-12009">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```
